<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>FAMILY FORMICIDAE</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Family <span style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicariae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB> Latreille,
1809: 124. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicidae as family: Latreille, 1809: 124 [Formicariae]; Leach,
1815: 147 [Formicarides]; Stephens, 1829: 356 [first spelling as Formicidae];
Haliday, 1836: 331; Westwood, 1839: 217; Swainson &amp; Shuckard, 1840: 171;
Nylander, 1846a: 877; Foerster, 1850a: 1 [Formicariae]; Mayr, 1855: 275
[Formicina]; Smith, F. 1857a: 52; Smith, F. 1858b: 1; Mayr, 1861: 21; Mayr,
1865: 6; Heer, 1867: 6 [Formicaria]; Forel, 1870: 307 [Formicinae]; Forel,
1874: 19 [Formicariae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 1; Forel, 1899c: 1; Ruzsky, 1902d: 5
[Formicarii]; Bingham, 1903: 1; Ruzsky, 1905b: 91 [Formicariae or Formicidae];
Ashmead, 1905b: 384; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamilies of Formicidae
(extant)</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: Aenictinae, Aenictogitoninae,
Agroecomyrmecinae, Amblyoponinae, Aneuretinae, Cerapachyinae, Dolichoderinae,
Dorylinae, Ecitoninae, Ectatomminae, Formicinae, Heteroponerinae,
Leptanillinae, Leptanilloidinae, Martialinae, Myrmeciinae, Myrmicinae,
Paraponerinae, Ponerinae, Proceratiinae, Pseudomyrmecinae<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>.</b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamilies of Formicidae
(extinct)</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *Armaniinae, *Brownimeciinae,
*Formiciinae, *Sphecomyrminae.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Formicidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Condylodon, Hypochira,
Noonilla</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Formicidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>*Calyptites, *Eoformica,
*Gerontoformica, *Klondikia, *Kohlsimyrma, *Myanmyrma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) excluded
from Formicidae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:green'>Formila, Scyphodon</span></i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) excluded
from Formicidae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:green'>Cariridris, *Cretacoformica, *Myrmicium,
*Palaeomyrmex, *Promyrmicium</span></i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus-group <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomina nuda</i> in Formicidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Ancylognathus,
Hypopheidole, Leptoxenus, Myrmegis, Pergandea, Salticomorpha, Titusia</span></i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>FAMILY <span style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span>
REFERENCES, WORLD </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>WORLD CATALOGUES</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 1
(Formicidae); Mayr, 1863: 394 (Formicidae); Dalla Torre, 1893: 1 (Formicidae);
Emery, 1910b: 3 (Dorylinae); Emery, 1911d: 2 (Ponerinae); Emery, 1913a: 2
(Dolichoderinae); Emery, 1921f: 3, Emery, 1922e: 95 and Emery, 1924d: 207
(Myrmicinae); Emery, 1925b: 2 (Formicinae); Shattuck, 1994: 1 (Aneuretinae and
Dolichoderinae); Bolton, 1995b: 7 (Formicidae).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>WORLD SYNOPTIC
CLASSIFICATIONS</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1893a:
161 (Formicidae); Emery, 1895j: 764 (Formicidae); Emery, 1896e: 173
(Formicidae); Ashmead, 1905b: 381 (Formicidae); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134 (Formicidae);
Emery, 1910b: 3 (Dorylinae); Emery, 1911d: 2 (Ponerinae); Emery, 1913a: 2
(Dolichoderinae); Forel, 1917: 235 (Formicidae); Emery, 1921f: 3 and Emery,
1922e: 95 (Myrmicinae); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 631 (Formicidae); Emery, 1924d:
207 (Myrmicinae); Emery, 1925b: 2 (Formicinae); Brown, 1973b: 165, 178
(Formicidae); Snelling, 1981: 387 (Formicidae); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1985: 256 (Formicidae); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77 (Formicidae);
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 9 (Formicidae); Bolton, 1994: 12 (Formicidae);
Bolton, 2003: 4 (Formicidae); Engel &amp; Grimaldi, 2005: 4 (Formicidae); Ward,
2007a: 549 (Formicidae).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>WORLD
IDENTIFICATION KEYS</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1896e:
173 (Formicidae subfamilies and genera); Emery, 1910b: 4 (Dorylinae tribes and
genera); Emery, 1911d: 4 (Ponerinae tribes and genera); Emery, 1913a: 6
(Dolichoderinae tribes and genera); Escherich, 1917: 2 (Formicidae
subfamilies); Emery, 1921f: 9, 12, 16 (Myrmicinae tribes and genera); Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 631 (Formicidae subfamilies, tribes and genera); Emery, 1925b: 7
(Formicinae tribes and genera); Clark, 1951: 14 (Formicidae subfamilies);
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1972a: 42 (Formicidae subfamilies); Snelling,
1981: 386 (Formicidae subfamilies); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 33
(Formicidae subfamilies and genera); Bolton, 1990c: 1361 (Formicidae
subfamilies); Shattuck, 1992c: 20 (Dolichoderinae genera); Ward, 1990: 464
(Pseudomyrmecinae genera); Brothers &amp; Finnamore, 1993: 218 (Formicidae
subfamilies); Bolton, 1994: 7 (Formicidae subfamilies and genera); Bolton,
2003: 11 (revision of subfamilies).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>MORPHOLOGY OF
FORMICIDAE</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1878: 339
(proventriculus); Janet, 1902: 25 (general anatomy); Pietschker, 1910: 1 (brain
structure); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 13 (general morphology, anatomy); Emery,
1913c: 577 (venation); Wheeler, W.M. 1918c: 293 (larvae); Janet, 1923: 5
(anatomical drawings synopsis); Bugnion, 1930: 85 (mouthparts); Brown &amp;
Nutting, 1950: 113 (venation); Gregg, 1953a: 328 (promesonotal suture
motility); Eisner, 1957: 439 (proventriculus); Gotwald, 1969: 1 (mouthparts and
gaster); Crozier, 1970: 109 (karyology); Markl, 1973: 258 (stridulitrum);
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 45 (larvae); Hölldobler &amp; Engel,
1979: 285 and Hölldobler &amp; Engel-Siegel, 1982: 113 (tergal and sternal glands);
Imai, Baroni Urbani, Kubota et al. 1984: 5 (karyology); Imai, Brown, Kubota et
al. 1984: 66 (karyology); Imai, Kubota, Brown, et al. 1985: 46 (karyology);
Hölldobler &amp; Engel-Siegel, 1985: 201 (metapleural gland); Billen, 1986: 165
(Dufour's gland); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1986e: 684 (larvae); Brown,
1988h: 17 (malpighian tubule numbers); Caetano, 1988: 129 (digestive tract
anatomy); Francoeur &amp; Loiselle, 1988a: 333 (strigil, evolution); Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 5, 229 (anatomy, exocrine glands); Hashimoto, 1991a: 125
(antennal and labial sensilla); Hashimoto, 1991b: 289 (tibial spurs); Billen,
1993: 4 (exocrine glands); Bolton, 1994: 191 (morphology glossary); Hölldobler,
Obermayer &amp; Peeters, 1996: 157 (metatibial gland); Wenseleers, Schoeters, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1998: 121 (cloacal gland);
Perrault, 1999: 125 (thoracic anatomy); Perrault, 2004: 291 (anterior metasomal
anatomy).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>EVOLUTION AND
PHYLOGENY OF FORMICIDAE</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1920: 52; Emery, 1920d: 370; Donisthorpe, 1922: xlvi; Wheeler, W.M. 1923f: 156;
Wheeler, W.M. 1928f: 124; Stitz, 1936: 211; Morley, 1938: 190; Brown &amp;
Nutting, 1950: 113; Bernard, 1951: 1041; Brown, 1954e: 30; Wilson, Carpenter
&amp; Brown, 1967: 12; Taylor, 1978a: 982; Rasnitsyn, 1980: 45-46 (foldout
page); Lutz, 1986: 213; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 137; Baroni Urbani,
1989: 137; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 26; Hashimoto, 1991a: 125; Hashimoto,
1991b: 289; Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp; Ward, 1992: 301; Shattuck, 1992b: 203;
Brothers &amp; Carpenter, 1993: 227; Ward, 1994: 173; Hashimoto, 1996: 340;
Crozier, Jermiin &amp; Chiotis, 1997: 22; Grimaldi, Agosti &amp; Carpenter,
1997: 25; Perrault, 1999: 125; Brothers, 1999: 233; Grimaldi &amp; Agosti,
2000: 13680; Ohnishi, Imai <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2003: 419; Astruc, Julien, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2004: 880;  Grimaldi &amp; Engel, 2005: 440; Wilson &amp; Hölldobler, 2005:
7411; Brady, Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006:
18172; Moreau, Bell <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 101;
Ouellette, Fisher <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 359;
Rabeling, Brown &amp; Verhaagh, 2008: 14914.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>PALAEONTOLOGY OF
FORMICIDAE</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Scudder, 1891:
682 (fossil taxa catalogue); Handlirsch, 1907: 859 (fossil taxa catalogue);
Burnham, 1979: 108 (fossils in amber checklist); Keilbach, 1982: 272 (fossils
in amber checklist); Spahr, 1987: 41 (fossils in amber checklist); Carpenter,
1992: 490 (fossil genera review); Bolton, 1995b: 4 (fossil taxa checklist, in
catalogue); Grimaldi, Agosti &amp; Carpenter, 1997: 1 (Cretaceous genera in

Rasnitsyn, 2007: 118 (Palaeontological record); Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2009:
1024 (European Upper Eocene amber, synopsis of species).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>NEOTROPICAL</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>AFROTROPICAL AND
MALAGASY</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1891b: 8
(Madagascar genera); Arnold, 1915: 6 (South Africa); Arnold, 1916: 159 (South
Africa); Bolton, 1973a: 321 (West Africa subfamilies &amp; genera); Yoshimura
&amp; Fisher, 2007: 27 (Malagasy subfamilies, males key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>ORIENTAL AND
MALESIAN</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1892j:
219 (India &amp; Sri Lanka); Bingham, 1903: 1 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma);
Wilson &amp; Taylor, 1967: 10 (Polynesia); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 30 (China);
Zhou, 2001b: 21 (China, Guangxi subfamilies); Clouse, 2007b: 190 (Micronesia); Framenau
&amp; Thomas, 2008: 52 (Christmas I.); Terayama, 2009 (Taiwan).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>AUSTRAL</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1905a:
353 (New Zealand); Brown, 1958h: 1 (New Zealand); Brown &amp; Taylor, 1970: 958
(Australia subfamilies); Greenslade, 1979: 10 (South Australia subfamilies);
Taylor, 1991dc: 987 (Australia subfamilies); Shattuck, 1999: 21 (Australia subfamilies
&amp; genera); Andersen, 2000: 14 (northern Australia subfamilies &amp;
genera); Don, W. 2007: 39 (New Zealand).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>GENERA <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>INCERTAE
SEDIS</i> AND EXCLUSIONS FROM <span style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae
sedis</i> in <span style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus</span></b><span lang=EN-GB> *<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>CALYPTITES</span></i></b> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Calyptites</i></b> Scudder, 1877b: 270 [as member of family
Braconidae]. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calyptites
antediluvianum</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calyptites</i> in Braconidae: Scudder, 1891:
629; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 629.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calyptites</i> in Formicidae: Wheeler, W.M.
1911f: 160.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calyptites incertae sedis</i>
in Formicidae: Carpenter, 1930: 21; Brown, 1973b: 179; Bolton, 1995b: 23, 83
(family unresolved).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>CONDYLODON</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon</span></i></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Lund, 1831a: 131. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Condylodon
audouini</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in family
Mutillidae?: Swainson &amp; Shuckard, 1840: 173. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudomyrma</i>: Dalla Torre,
1893: 55. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae?:
Emery, 1921f: 28 (footnote). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> not in
Pseudomyrmecinae, dubiously Ponerinae: Ward, 1990: 471.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon incertae sedis</span></i><span lang=EN-GB>
in Ponerinae: Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 1995b: 146.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylodon incertae sedis</span></i><span lang=EN-GB>
in Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 263.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>EOFORMICA</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Eoformica</i></b> Cockerell, 1921: 38. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoformica eocenica</i> (junior synonym of *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoformica pingue</i>), by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoformica incertae sedis</i>
in Ponerinae: Cockerell, 1921: 38.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoformica</i> in Formicinae,
Oecophyllini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 643.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoformica incertae sedis</i>
in Myrmicinae: Carpenter, 1930: 17; Bolton, 1994: 106; Bolton, 1995b: 188.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoformica incertae sedis</i>
in Formicidae: Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 424.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:green'>Formicites</span></i>
(collective group name) material absorbed into *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Eoformica</i>: Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 424.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>GERONTOFORMICA</span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Gerontoformica</i></b> Nel &amp; Perrault, in Nel, Perrault, Perrichot
&amp; Néraudeau, 2004: 24. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gerontoformica
cretacica</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gerontoformica incertae sedis</i>
in Formicidae: Nel, Perrault, Perrichot &amp; Néraudeau, 2004: 24.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>HYPOCHIRA</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Hypochira</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Buckley, 1866: 169 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica (Hypochira) subspinosa</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypochira</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Formicini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 652.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypochira incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Smith, D.R. 1979: 1422. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypochira</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>:
Dalla Torre, 1893: 192; Agosti, 1994a: 106. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypochira</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as questionable junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Dolichoderus</i>: Emery, 1895c: 338; Emery, 1925b: 271. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypochira incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Bolton, 1995b: 31 (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>unidentifiable taxon</b>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>KLONDIKIA</span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Klondikia</i></b> Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 427. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Klondikia whiteae</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Klondikia incertae sedis</i>
in Formicidae: Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 427. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>KOHLSIMYRMA</span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Kohlsimyrma</i></b> Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 427. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Kohlsimyrma laticeps</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Kohlsimyrma incertae sedis</i> in
Formicidae: Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 427.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYANMYRMA</span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myanmyrma</i></b> Engel &amp; Grimaldi, 2005: 13. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myanmyrma gracilis</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>*Myanmyrma incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Engel &amp; Grimaldi, 2005: 13; Archibald, Cover
&amp; Moreau, 2006: 510.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>NOONILLA</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Noonilla</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Petersen, 1968: 582.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Noonilla copiosa</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Noonilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae: Petersen, 1968: 582; Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 482;
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Noonilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae, Leptanillini: Bolton, 1990b: 276; Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 1995b: 292; </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Noonilla incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Ogata, Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 33. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus references </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Baroni Urbani,
1977c: 482 (review of genus); Ogata, Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 33 (review of
genus).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>SYNTAPHUS</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Syntaphus</i></b> Donisthorpe, 1920: 84. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Syntaphus wheeleri</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Syntaphus</i> in Ponerinae,
Ectatommini: Donisthorpe, 1920: 84; Donisthorpe, 1943g: 730; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 10; Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 1995b: 399.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Syntaphus incertae sedis</i> in Formicidae:
Bolton, 2003: 264.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera excluded from <span style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>The following
were all originally described as members of Formicidae but are now excluded.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>CARIRIDRIS</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Cariridris</i></b> Brandão &amp; Martins-Neto, 1990: 201. Type-species:
*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cariridris bipetiolata</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cariridris incertae sedis</i>
in Myrmeciinae: Brandão &amp; Martins-Neto, 1990: 203; Bolton, 1994: 73;
Bolton, 1995b: 134.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cariridris</i> in Sphecidae:
Verhaagh, 1996: 11; Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 418. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cariridris incertae sedis</i>
in Hymenoptera, Aculeata: Grimaldi, Agosti &amp; Carpenter, 1997: 7.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>CRETACOFORMICA</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Cretacoformica</i></b> Jell &amp; Duncan, 1986: 190. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretacoformica explicata</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretacoformica incertae sedis</i>
in Formicidae: Jell &amp; Duncan, 1986: 190. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretacoformica</i> excluded from Formicidae:
Naumann, 1993: 355.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretacoformica</i> dubiously Formicidae:
Bolton, 1995b: 25, 166.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretacoformica incertae sedis</i>
in Hymenoptera, Apocrita: Grimaldi, Agosti &amp; Carpenter, 1997: 7.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:153.0pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:green'>FORMILA</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formila</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> de Romand, 1846: xxxii.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formila chevrolatii</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formila</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: de Romand, 1846: xxxii; Dalla Torre, 1893: 193.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formila</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Embolemidae: Muesebeck &amp; Walkley, 1951: 1043.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>MYRMICIUM</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrmicium</i></b> Westwood, 1854: 396. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium heerii</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i> in Myrmicinae:
Dalla Torre, 1893: 108 (as *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecium</i>,
incorrect subsequent spelling); Bolton, 1995b: 37 (anachronism). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i> in *Myrmiciidae
(Symphyta): Maa, 1949: 17; Rasnitsyn, 1969: 17; Jarzembowski, 1993: 179. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i> in
*Pseudosiricidae: Handlirsch, 1906: 577; Abe &amp; Smith, D.R. 1991: 53. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i> as junior
synonym of *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudosirex</i>: Handlirsch,
1906: 577.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>: Dalla Torre,
1893: 108; Forel, 1915d: 9. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i> as genus:
Westwood, 1854: 396; Maa, 1949: 17; Rasnitsyn, 1969: 17; Jarzembowski, 1993:
179; Bolton, 1995b: 37. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>PALAEOMYRMEX</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Palaeomyrmex</i></b>
Heer, 1865: 91. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Palaeomyrmex
prodromus</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Palaeomyrmex</i> in Formicidae: Heer, 1865:
91.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Palaeomyrmex</i> in Homoptera: Handlirsch,
1906: 507.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>PROMYRMICIUM</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Promyrmicium</i></b> Baroni Urbani, 1971b: 362. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i>
Heer, 1870: 78; junior homonym of *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i>
Westwood, 1854: 396.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Promyrmicium</i> in
Formicidae, Myrmicinae: Baroni Urbani, 1971b: 362; Bolton, 1994: 106
(anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Promyrmicium</i> in
Ichneumonidae: Birket-Smith, 1977: 8.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:green'>PROMYRMICIUM</span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrmicium</i></b> Heer, 1870: 78. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrmicium boreale</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicium</i>
Westwood, 1854: 396 (*Pseudosiricidae).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:green'>SCYPHODON</span></i> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Scyphodon</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Brues, 1925: 93.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Scyphodon anomalum</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Scyphodon</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae: Petersen, 1968: 591; Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 482;
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; Bolton, 1990b: 277; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson,
1990: 12; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 1995b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Scyphodon incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 259.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Scyphodon incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Hymenoptera, Aculeata: Ogata, Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 33
(excluded from Formicidae).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus references </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Petersen, 1968:
591 (review of genus); Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 482 (review of genus); Ogata,
Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 33 (review of genus).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Unavailable family-group names in <span
style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>ALLOFORMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Alloformicinae Emery, 1925b: 9 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Formicinae]. Section designated to include tribes Melophorini, Myrmelachistini
and Plagiolepidini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Formicinae: Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>EUCAMPONOTINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Eucamponotinae Forel, 1912i: 88 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Camponotinae]. Section designated to include tribes Camponotini, Formicini, Gesomyrmecini,
Oecophyllini and Prenolepidini. Unavailable name, not based on genus rank
taxon. Contained material referable to Formicinae: Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>EUDOLICHODERINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Eudolichoderinae Forel, 1917: 247 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Dolichoderinae]. Section designated to include tribe Tapinomini. Unavailable
name, not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable to
Dolichoderinae: Bolton, 1994: 27.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>EUDORYLINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Eudorylinae Forel, 1917: 239 [as &quot;section&quot; of Dorylinae].
Section designated to include tribe Dorylini. Unavailable name, not based on
genus rank taxon. Contained material referable to Dorylinae: Bolton, 1990c:
1358.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>EUFORMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Euformicinae Emery, 1925b: 37 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Formicinae]. Section designated to include tribes Brachymyrmecini, Camponotini,
Dimorphomyrmicini, Formicini, Gigantiopini, Lasiini, Oecophyllini and
Santschiellini. Unavailable name, not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Formicinae: Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>EUMYRMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Eumyrmicinae Emery, 1914a: 35 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Myrmicinae]. Section designated to include all Myrmicinae except Metaponini and
Pseudomyrmecini. Unavailable name, not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Myrmicinae: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>EXEUPONERINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Exeuponerinae Donisthorpe, 1943d: 438 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Ponerinae]. Section designated to include only <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Pseudoneoponera</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Pachycondyla</i>). Unavailable name, not based on genus rank taxon.
Contained material referable to Ponerini: Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>HETEROFORMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Heteroformicinae Emery, 1925b: 35 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Formicinae]. Section designated to include tribes Myrmecorhynchini and
Myrmoteratini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Formicinae: Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>MESOCAMPONOTINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mesocamponotinae Forel, 1912i: 88 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Camponotinae]. Section designated to include tribes Melophorini and
Plagiolepidini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Formicinae: Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>METADORYLINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Metadorylinae Forel, 1917: 240 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Dorylinae]. Section designated to include tribes Ecitonini and Leptanillini.
Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable
to Ecitoninae and Leptanillinae: Bolton, 1990c: 1357; Bolton, 1994: 70.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>MYCETOMYRMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mycetomyrmicinae Forel, 1917: 246 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Myrmicinae]. Section designated to include tribes Attini and Proattini.
Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable
to Myrmicinae: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>NEOATTINI</span><span lang=EN-GB> [unavailable
name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Neoattini Kusnezov, 1956: 22; Kusnezov, 1964: 62 [as subdivision of
tribe Attini]. Designated to include all attine genera except <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Apterostigma, Mycocepurus, Myrmicocrypta</i>.
Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable
to Attini: Bolton, 2003: 265.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PALEOATTINI</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paleoattini Kusnezov, 1956: 22; Kusnezov, 1964: 62 (alternatively
spelled Palaeoattini, p. 146) [as subdivision of tribe Attini]. Designated to
include genera <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Apterostigma, Mycocepurus,
Myrmicocrypta</i>. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Attini: Bolton, 2003: 265. [Paleoattini: Sosa-Calvo &amp;
Schultz, 2010: 183; unavailable name.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PALEOPONERINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paleoponerinae Forel, 1917: 231 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Ponerinae]. Section designated to include tribe Myrmeciini. Unavailable name;
not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable to Myrmeciini:
Bolton, 1994: 73.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PROCAMPONOTINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Procamponotinae Forel, 1912i: 88 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Camponotinae]. Section designated to include tribe Myrmoteratini. Unavailable
name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable to
Myrmoteratini: Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PRODOLICHODERINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Prodolichoderinae Forel, 1917: 247 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Dolichoderinae]. Section designated to include tribes Aneuretini, Dolichoderini
and Leptomyrmicini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained
material referable to Aneuretinae and Dolichoderinae: Bolton, 1994: 15, 27.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PRODORYLINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB> [unavailable
name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Prodorylinae Emery, 1909c: 355 [as &quot;group&quot; of Ponerinae];
Emery, 1911d: 5 [as &quot;sectio&quot; of Ponerinae]. Group designated to
include tribe Cerapachyini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon.
Contained material referable to Cerapachyinae: Bolton, 1990a: 66.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PROMYRMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Promyrmicinae Forel, 1911h: 446 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Ponerinae]; Emery, 1921f: 19. Section designated to include tribe Metaponini.
Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon. Contained material referable
to Metaponini: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>  Promyrmicinae: Forel, 1917: 240 [incorrect expansion of the above
unavailable name to include tribes Metaponini and Pseudomyrmini]. Unavailable
name.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>  Promyrmicidae: Bernard, 1951: 1053 [incorrectly treated as family,
including only tribe Pseudomyrmini]. Unavailable name.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PROPONERINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proponerinae Emery, 1909c: 355 [as &quot;group&quot; of Ponerinae];
Emery, 1911d: 16 [as &quot;sectio&quot; of Ponerinae]. Group designated to
include tribes Amblyoponini and Proceratiini. Unavailable name; not based on
genus rank taxon. Contained material referable to Ponerinae: Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>RHAGIOMYRMICINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Rhagiomyrmicinae Forel, 1917: 246 [as &quot;section&quot; of
Myrmicinae]. Section designated to include tribes Cataulacini, Cephalotini
[=Cryptocerini] and Dacetini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank taxon.
Contained material referable to Myrmicinae: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>TARAXOPONERINAE</span><span lang=EN-GB>
[unavailable name]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Taraxoponerinae Forel, 1917: 231 [as &quot;section&quot; of Ponerinae].
Section designated to include tribes Ectatommini, Paraponerini, Platythyreini,
Proceratiini and Thaumatomyrmecini. Unavailable name; not based on genus rank
taxon. Contained material referable to Ponerinae: Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus-group <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomina
nuda</i> in <span style='color:red'>FORMICIDAE</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>ANCYLOGNATHUS</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ancylognathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> Lund, 1831a: 121, 135. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ancylognathus lugubris, nomen nudum</i>. [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ancylognathus</i> material referred to <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Eciton</i>: Smith, F. 1855c: 160.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>HYPOPHEIDOLE</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 383, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen
nudum</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>LEPTOXENUS</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptoxenus</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1917:
245 (attributed to Santschi), <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>MYRMEGIS</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmegis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> Rafinesque, 1815: 124, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen
nudum</i>. [Brown, 1973b: 182, places <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmegis</i>
as a junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>, because
the entry in Rafinesque reads, &quot;6. <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmegis</i>
R. <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i> Latr.&quot;] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>PERGANDEA</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pergandea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 382, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen
nudum</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>SALTICOMORPHA</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Salticomorpha</span></i><span lang=EN-GB>
Motschoulsky, 1855: 10, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>TITUSIA</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Titusia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 382, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen
nudum</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB>&nbsp;</span></p>

</div>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>THE DOLICHODEROMORPHS: SUBFAMILIES ANEURETINAE AND
DOLICHODERINAE<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:center'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY <span
style='color:red'>ANEURETINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>ANEURETINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aneuretini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1913a: 6. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretus</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aneuretinae as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Baroni Urbani,
1989: 147.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aneuretinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Clark, 1951: 16 (footnote);
Wilson, Eisner, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1956: 93;
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1972a: 40; Snelling, 1981: 400; Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; Bolton, 1990c: 1361; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16;
Shattuck, 1992b: 201; Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp; Ward, 1992: 315; Shattuck,
1994: 1; Bolton, 1994: 15; Bolton, 1995b: 9. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Aneuretinae as
formicomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 18, 79.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aneuretinae as formicoid subfamily of Formicidae: Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau, Bell, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Aneuretinae as
formicoid dolichoderomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Ward, 2007a: 556.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes of Aneuretinae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>:
Aneuretini, *Pityomyrmecini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae
sedis</i> in Aneuretinae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Burmomyrma, *Cananeuretus</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>ANEURETINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aneuretini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1913a: 6. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretus</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aneuretini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Emery, 1913a: 6; Wheeler,
W.M. 1915h: 71; Forel, 1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 687; Carpenter, 1930:
37; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 181; Brown, 1954e: 29 (in text).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aneuretini as tribe of Aneuretinae: Wilson, Eisner, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1956: 93 (footnote); Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 16; Bolton, 1994: 15; Bolton, 2003: 18. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extant) of
Aneuretini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) of
Aneuretini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretellus,
*Mianeuretus, *Paraneuretus, *Protaneuretus</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily, tribe <span
style='color:red'>Aneuretini</span> and genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Aneuretus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1895e:
461 (diagnosis); Bingham, 1903: 290 (diagnosis); Emery, 1913a: 6 (diagnosis,
catalogue); Wilson, Eisner, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
1956: 81 (diagnosis, review of subfamily and genus); Eisner, 1957: 453
(proventriculus morphology); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1972a: 40
(diagnosis); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 60 (larvae, review &amp;
synthesis); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1990c: 1361 (morphology, status); Shattuck, 1992b: 201
(higher classification, phylogeny); Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp; Ward, 1992: 315
(phylogeny); Shattuck, 1994: 1 (catalogue); Bolton, 1994: 15 (diagnosis,
synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1047 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 9, 20,
63 (catalogue); Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 414 (diagnosis, wingless
impression fossils); Bolton, 2003: 18, 79 (diagnosis, synopsis); Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173
(phylogeny); Moreau, Bell, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006:
102 (phylogeny). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span style='color:red'>Aneuretini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ANEURETELLUS</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Aneuretellus</i></b> Dlussky, 1988: 54. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretellus deformis</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretellus</i> in
Aneuretinae, Aneuretini: Dlussky, 1988: 54; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78;
Shattuck, 1994: 1; Bolton, 1994: 15; Bolton, 2003: 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aneuretus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1893a: cclxxv.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretus simoni</i>, by
monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneuretus</i> also described
as new by Emery, 1893f: 241.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> *<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'>PITYOMYRMECINI</span></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

W.M. 1915h: 98. Type-genus: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Pityomyrmecini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 98;
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Pityomyrmecini as tribe of Formicinae: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 684
(error).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Pityomyrmecini as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Shattuck,
1992c: 5; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Pityomyrmecini as tribe of Aneuretinae: Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn,
2009: 1036 [by implication as type-genus transferred to Aneuretinae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Pityomyrmecini <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i>
in Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2010: 362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PITYOMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Pityomyrmex</i></b> Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 98. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex tornquisti</i>, by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex</i> in
Dolichoderinae, *Pityomyrmecini: Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 98; Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex</i> in
Formicinae, *Pityomyrmecini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 684 (error).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1994: 139; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 90.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex incertae sedis</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2010: 362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pityomyrmex</i> in Aneuretinae: Dlussky
&amp; Rasnitsyn, 2009: 1036.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Pityomyrmex</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1994: 139 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 334 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in <span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b

designation.</span></p>
