<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY <span style='color:red'>DOLICHODERINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span style='color:red'>DOLICHODERINAE</span>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1878: 364. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderinae as family: Emery, 1894g: 378 [Dolichoderidae];
Ashmead, 1905b: 384 [Dolichoderidae]; Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 94
[Dolichoderidae]; Bernard, 1951: 1071 [Dolichoderidae]; Bernard, 1953b: 255
[Dolichoderidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderinae as tribe of Formicidae: André, 1882a: 127
[Dolichoderidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Forel, 1878: 364 [Dolichoderidae];
Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 454 [Dolichoderidae]; Nasonov, 1889: 26
[Dolichoderidae]; Forel, 1892j: 220 [Dolichoderidae]; Forel, 1893a: 165; Dalla
Torre, 1893: 156; Forel, 1895b: 107 [Dolichoderidae]; Emery, 1895j: 771
[subfamily spelled Dolichoderini]; Emery, 1896e: 186; Forel, 1899c: 98;
Bingham, 1903: 288; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142; Emery, 1913a: 2; Arnold, 1915:
143; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 71; Wheeler, 1915g: 811 [Dolichoderides]; Arnold,
1915: 143; Donisthorpe, 1915d: 178; Forel, 1917: 247; Escherich, 1917: 2
[Dolichoderini]; Bondroit, 1918: 86 [Dolichoderitae]; Wheeler, W.M. 1920: 53;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 199; Borgmeier, 1923: 80; Karavaiev, 1936: 163; Smith,
M.R. 1951a: 833; Clark, 1951: 16; Brown, 1954e: 29; Kempf, 1972a: 266; Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1972a: 41; Brown, 1973b: 169; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderinae
as formicomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 18, 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderinae as formicoid subfamily of Formicidae: Brady, Schultz,
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau, Bell, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderinae
as formicoid dolichoderomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Ward, 2007a: 556.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes (extant) of
Dolichoderinae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: Bothriomyrmecini, Dolichoderini, Leptomyrmecini,
Tapinomini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Dolichoderinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *Miomyrmecini, *Zherichiniini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Dolichoderinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alloiomma,
*Asymphylomyrmex, *Elaeomyrmex, *Elaphrodites, *Emplastus, *Eotapinoma,
*Eurymyrmex, *Kotshkorkia, *Leptomyrmula, *Miomyrmex, *Petraeomyrmex, *Proiridomyrmex,
*Protazteca, *Zherichinius</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

and tribes references, world <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>BOTHRIOMYRMECINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:black'>Bothriomyrmecina</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:black'> </span><span lang=EN-GB>Dubovikov, 2005: 92.
Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bothriomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<span
style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmecina as subtribe of Iridomyrmecini: Dubovikov, 2005: 92.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmecini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.45pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:black'>Bothriomyrmecini</span></span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Arnoldius, Bothriomyrmex, Chronoxenus,
Loweriella, Ravavy</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Bothriomyrmecini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:black'>Genus</span><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:red'>
ARNOLDIUS</span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Arnoldius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Dubovikov, 2005: 93.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bothriomyrmex flavus</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Arnoldius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Iridomyrmecini, Bothriomyrmecina: Dubovikov,
2005: 93.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Arnoldius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Bothriomyrmecini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>BOTHRIOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1869c: 117.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bothriomyrmex costae</i>,
by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in
Formicinae: André, 1881b: 64 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Forel, 1878: 380 [Dolichoderidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1879a: 454 [Dolichoderidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 170; Emery, 1895j: 771;
Forel, 1895e: 469; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Emery, 1913a: 27; Forel, 1917: 248;
Bondroit, 1918: 88; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689; all subsequent authors to the
following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Shattuck, 1992c: 54; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 84.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Iridomyrmecini, Bothriomyrmecina: Dubovikov,
2005: 92.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothriomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Bothriomyrmecini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.45pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Bothriomyrmex</span></i> references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.45pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1878: 380 (diagnosis); André, 1882b: 218 (Europe &amp;
Algeria species); Dalla Torre, 1893: 170 (catalogue); Forel, 1895e: 469 (India
&amp; Sri Lanka species key); Bingham, 1903: 305 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma
species key); Emery, 1913a: 27 (diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 690
(subgenera key); Emery, 1925e: 5 (European and Oriental species); Kratochvíl,
1941: 96 (Central Europe species key); Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 96 (Central
Europe species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 187 (Asia checklist); Bernard,
1967: 260 (diagnosis, Western Europe species key); Kutter, 1977c: 175
(Switzerland species key); Arnol'di &amp; Dlussky, 1978: 548 (former European
U.S.S.R. species key); Collingwood, 1978: 87 (Iberian Peninsula species key);
Gösswald, 1985: 316 (Germany species key); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 92
(Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 8 (Australia checklist); Agosti &amp;
Collingwood, 1987b: 279 (Balkans species key); Shattuck, 1992c: 54 (diagnosis,
review of genus); Shattuck, 1994: 31 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1048 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 80 (catalogue); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 119 (China species
key); Seifert, 1996b: 163 (Central Europe species key); Shattuck, 1999: 66
(Australia synopsis); Seifert, 2007: 148 (North and Central Europe species
key).</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bothriomyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bothriomyrmex myops</i>, by
subsequent designation of Donisthorpe, 1944e: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b

lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1878: 364. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Emery, 1913a: 7; Wheeler,
W.M. 1915h: 77; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 688; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>DOLICHODERUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Lund, 1831a: 130.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica attelaboides</i>,
by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 75.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1862: 652 (in key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 9
[Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Forel, 1878: 386 [Dolichoderidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1879a: 455 [Dolichoderidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 156; Forel, 1895b: 107
[Dolichoderidae]; Emery, 1895j: 771; Forel, 1895e: 462; Forel, 1899c: 98;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolichoderus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Emery, 1913a: 7; Wheeler, W.M.
1915h: 77; Forel, 1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 688; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DOLICHODERUS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1855: 377 (attributed
to Foerster). Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
quadripunctata</i>, by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 165.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 57.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1855: 377 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1861: 40 [Formicidae];
Mayr, 1862: 652 (in key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 9 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1868c:
53 [Formicidae]; André, 1874: 168 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Emery, 1913a: 18; Forel, 1917:
247; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mayr, 1855: 377; Mayr, 1865: 9; Mayr, 1868c: 53; Mayr,
1870b: 953; Smith, 1871a: 310; Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Kempf, 1972a: 118; Lattke,
1987b: 259; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; MacKay &amp; Vinson, 1989b: 17;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17; Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 120.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus</i>:
Emery, 1894c: 234; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142; Emery, 1913a: 10; Wheeler, W.M.
1915h: 77; Forel, 1917: 247; Borgmeier, 1923: 84; Clark, 1930b: 252; McAreavey,
1949: 17; Creighton, 1950a: 331; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 182; Kusnezov,
1956: 28; Kusnezov, 1959: 50; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1415; Kupyanskaya, 1990: 154.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hypoclinea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus</i>:
Forel, 1878: 386; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 455; Dalla Torre, 1893: 156;
Bingham, 1903: 291; Brown, 1973b: 181 [provisional]; Shattuck, 1992c: 66;
MacKay, 1993b: 6; Shattuck, 1994: 39; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 1995b: 31;
Bolton, 2003: 85.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Monacis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1862a: 233.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica bispinosa</i>, by subsequent
designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 167.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

247; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB> as genus: Roger, 1862a: 233; Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Brown, 1950e:
249; Kempf, 1959b: 227; Kempf, 1972a: 141; Kempf, 1972c: 253; Dlussky &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

monoceros</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Diabolus</i> Karavaiev junior

400 (Mammalia).]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Diabolus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1935c: 68.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Dolichoderus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 10, 14, 15 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus,
Hypoclinea, Monacis</i> catalogues); Mayr, 1863: 407, 423 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Dolichoderus, Hypoclinea</i> catalogues); Mayr, 1865: 9 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus, Hypoclinea</i> diagnoses);
Mayr, 1867a: 75 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypoclinea</i>
diagnosis); Mayr, 1868c: 54 (*Baltic Amber species key); Mayr, 1870b: 955 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypoclinea</i> species key); Mayr, 1876: 79
(Australia species key); André, 1882b: 225 (Europe &amp; Algeria species);
Mayr, 1886d: 435 (U.S.A. species key); Cresson, 1887: 258 (U.S.A. catalogue);
Dalla Torre, 1893: 156 (catalogue); Forel, 1895e: 462 (India &amp; Sri Lanka
species key); Bingham, 1903: 292 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma species key);
Wheeler, W.M. 1905d: 306 (North America species key); Emery, 1913a: 7
(diagnosis, subgenera key, catalogue); Emery, 1913a: 9, 10 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D. (Monacis), D. (Hypoclinea)</i>,
catalogues); Mann, 1916: 460 (Brazil <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D.
(Dolichoderus)</i> species key); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 688 (subgenera key);
Clark, 1930b: 253 (Australia <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D.
(Hypoclinea)</i> species key); Creighton, 1950a: 333 (North America <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D. (Hypoclinea)</i> species key); Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 181 (Asia checklist); Kempf, 1959b: 230 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monacis</i>, all species revision, key);
Wheeler, J. 1963: 149 (U.S.A., North Dakota species key); Bernard, 1967: 249
(diagnosis); Kempf, 1969: 292 (Neotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D.
(Dolichoderus)</i> species key); Kempf, 1972a: 98, 118, 141 (Neotropical <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolichoderus, Hypoclinea, Monacis</i>,
catalogues); Kempf, 1972c: 253 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monacis</i>
species, additions to 1959a key); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1415 (North America
catalogue); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 93 (Australia catalogue); Taylor,
1987a: 24 (Australia, New Caledonia checklist); Harada, 1987: 602 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monacis</i> species key); Lattke, 1987b: 263
(Neotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D. bispinosus</i> group,
key); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78 (synoptic classification); Johnson,
1989a: 5 (U.S.A. species key); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17 (synoptic
classification); Brandão, 1991: 340, 347, 356 (Neotropical catalogue);
Shattuck, 1992c: 66 (diagnosis, review of genus); MacKay, 1993b: 17 (New World,
all species revision, key); Radchenko, 1994b: 112 (South Siberia species key);
Shattuck, 1994: 39 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b:
172 (catalogue); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 120 (China species key); Xu, 1995a:
34 (China species key); Shattuck, 1999: 68 (Australia synopsis); Xu, 2001b: 356
(China species key); Zhou, 2001b: 153 (China, Guangxi species key); Dill, 2002:
21, 30 (southeast Asia species groups key, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D.
cuspidatus</i> group revision, key); Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 416
(diagnosis for impression fossils); Dlussky, 2002b: 54 (Baltic &amp; Rovno
amber species); Dlussky, 2008b: 509 (Europe Eocene amber species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>LEPTOMYRMECINI</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptomyrmicini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1913a: 15. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptomyrmicini as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1992c:
5; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 19, 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptomyrmecini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Emery, 1913a: 15;
Wheeler, W.M. 1915d: 262 [Leptomyrmicii]; Forel, 1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 687; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258 [Leptomyrmecini]; Dlussky
&amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17; Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Leptomyrmecini: </span></b><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anillidris, Anonychomyrma,
Azteca, Doleromyrma, Dorymyrmex, Forelius, Froggattella, Gracilidris,
Iridomyrmex, Leptomyrmex, Linepithema, Nebothriomyrmex, Ochetellus, Papyrius,
Philidris, Turneria.<o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <span
style='color:red'>LEPTOMYRMECINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anonychomyrmini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1947c: 588. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Anonychomyrma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anonychomyrmini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Donisthorpe, 1947c: 588.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anonychomyrmini as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Shattuck,
1992c: 5; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 1995b: 9; Bolton, 2003: 19, 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anonychomyrmini as junior synonym of Leptomyrmecini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361 [by implication because
type-genus included in Leptomyrmecini].</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB>Azteca</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1878: 384.

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma
instabilis</i>, unjustified subsequent designation (based on inaccurate
synonymy) by Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 159. Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Azteca muelleri</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery,
1913a: 31; repeated in Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 78.]</span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Azteca</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Forel, 1878: 384 [Dolichoderidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 163; Forel, 1895b: 108; Emery, 1895j: 771; Forel, 1899c: 104; Wheeler,
W.M. 1910g: 142.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Azteca</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Azteca</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dalla Torre, 1893: 163 (catalogue); Emery, 1893b: 127 (species key);
Emery, 1913a: 29 (diagnosis, catalogue); Kempf, 1972a: 29 (catalogue); Longino,
1989: 1 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. alfari</i> group on <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cecropia</i>); Brandão, 1991: 329
(catalogue); Longino, 1991: 1571 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cecropia</i>-inhabiting
species key); Shattuck, 1992c: 49 (diagnosis, review of genus); Shattuck, 1994:
10 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1048 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 78 (catalogue);
Longino, 1996: 131 (Costa Rica stem-inhabiting species key); Longino, 2007: 10
(Costa Rica species keys).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>DOLEROMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1907a: 28 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma (Doleromyrma) darwinianum</i>, by
monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Emery, 1913a: 22; Donisthorpe,
1943f: 640; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Shattuck, 1992c: 60; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 84.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Leptomyrmecini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma</i>:
Forel, 1907a: 28; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Iridomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1912a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Iridomyrmex</i>:
Emery, 1913a: 22; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689; all subsequent authors to the
following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doleromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Shattuck, 1992a: 14; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 84.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Doleromyrma</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1992a:
14 (diagnosis); Shattuck, 1992c: 60 (diagnosis, review of genus); Shattuck,
1994: 38 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 172
(catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 67 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorymyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1866a: 494.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex flavescens</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Forel, 1878: 383 [Dolichoderidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 167; Emery, 1895j: 771; Forel, 1899c: 103; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Emery, 1913a: 36; Forel, 1917: 248;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 640; subsequent authors and
Jaffe, 1993: 9.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Shattuck, 1992c: 77; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 86.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Leptomyrmecini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Psammomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912h: 43 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>]. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex planidens</i>, by subsequent
designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 82. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Psammomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1912h: 43; Kempf, 1972a: 100.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Psammomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1913b: 350 (in text); Santschi, 1922b: 365; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689;
Snelling &amp; Hunt, 1976: 93; Shattuck, 1992c: 77; Shattuck, 1994: 73; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 86.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Conomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1913b: 350 (in
text) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Prenolepis pyramica</i>, by
subsequent designation of Santschi, 1922b: 365. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Conomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Forel, 1917: 248; Donisthorpe,
1943f: 634; Jaffe, 1993: 9.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Conomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1913b: 350; Forel, 1917: 248; Santschi, 1922b: 365; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
689; Gallardo, 1930: 147; Smith, M.R. 1951a: 837; Smith, M.R. 1958c: 140.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Conomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Kusnezov, 1952g: 429; Kusnezov, 1959: 51; Kusnezov, 1964:
66; Kempf, 1972a: 78; Snelling, 1973b: 1; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1419; Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 17; Jaffe, 1993: 9.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Conomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Shattuck, 1992c: 77; Shattuck, 1994: 73;
Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 86.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Araucomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Gallardo, 1919b: 249.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex tener</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Araucomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689;
Donisthorpe, 1943f: 625; Kempf, 1972a: 25; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Araucomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Gallardo, 1919b: 249; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689; Kusnezov,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Araucomyrmex</span></i><span

Snelling, 1981: 402. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Araucomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional]; Shattuck, 1992c: 77; Shattuck, 1994: 73;
Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 86.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB>Ammomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1922b: 365 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex exsanguis</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ammomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Santschi, 1922b: 365; Gallardo, 1930: 147; Kempf, 1972a: 100.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ammomyrma</span></i><span

Snelling &amp; Hunt, 1976: 93. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ammomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Shattuck, 1992c: 77; Shattuck, 1994: 73; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 87.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Biconomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kusnezov, 1952g: 429 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Conomyrma</i>]. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex pyramicus</i> var. <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>brunneus</i> (now <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Dorymyrmex brunneus</i>), by subsequent designation of Kusnezov, 1959:
51. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Biconomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Conomyrma</i>:
Kusnezov, 1952g: 429. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Biconomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Kusnezov, 1959: 51; Kusnezov, 1964: 67.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Biconomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Conomyrma</i>:
Smith, M.R. 1958c: 140; Kempf, 1972a: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Biconomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Shattuck, 1992c: 78; Shattuck, 1994: 73; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 87.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Spinomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kusnezov, 1952g: 429
(diagnosis in key) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex alboniger</i>,
by subsequent designation of Kusnezov, 1959: 51. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Spinomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Kusnezov, 1952g: 429; Kempf, 1972a: 100. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Spinomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Kusnezov, 1956: 30 (in key); Kusnezov, 1959: 51;
Kusnezov, 1964: 66.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Spinomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorymyrmex</i>:
Snelling &amp; Hunt, 1976: 93; Shattuck, 1992c: 78; Shattuck, 1994: 74; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 87.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Dorymyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mayr, G. 1868a: 165 (diagnosis); Forel, 1878: 383 (diagnosis);

348 (North America species key); Kusnezov, 1952g: 428 (subgenera key); Kempf,

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Conomyrma</i> species, revision); Snelling

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Iridomyrmex mccooki</i>, by

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.45pt;text-align:justify'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.45pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 13 (catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 424 (catalogue); Mayr,
1865: 10 (diagnosis); Mayr, 1867a: 76 (diagnosis); Forel, 1878: 381
(diagnosis); Cresson, 1887: 257 (U.S.A. catalogue); Dalla Torre, 1893: 168

(diagnosis, catalogue); Arnold, 1915: 145 (diagnosis); Creighton, 1950a: 341
(North America species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 188 (Asia checklist);
Bernard, 1967: 250 (diagnosis); Kempf, 1972a: 124 (Neotropical catalogue);
Smith, D.R. 1979: 1417 (North America catalogue); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R.
1985: 96 (Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 30 (Australia, New Caledonia
&amp; New Zealand checklist); Shattuck, 1992a: 14 (diagnosis); Shattuck, 1992c:

normal'>I. purpureus</i> group, key); Shattuck, 1993b: 1306 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>I. calvus</i> group, key); Shattuck, 1994:
99 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 217 (catalogue);
Shattuck, 1996a: 37 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>I. discors</i>
group); Shattuck, 1998: 303 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>I. conifer</i>
group, key); Shattuck, 1999: 72 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 652
(diagnosis in key), 695. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
erythrocephala</i>, by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1862: 652 (in key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 7
[Formicidae].</span></p>

1893: 162; Emery, 1895j: 771; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Turneria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderidae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Turneria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Turneria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Emery, 1913a: 21; Forel, 1917: 248;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 689; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Turneria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Shattuck, 1992c: 161; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 92.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Turneria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Iridomyrmecini, Iridomyrmecina: Dubovikov, 2005:
92.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Turneria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Leptomyrmecini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Turneria</span></i> references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1913a: 21
(diagnosis, catalogue); Mann, 1919: 362 (all species key); Chapman &amp; Capco,
1951: 196 (Asia checklist); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 107 (Australia
catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 80 (Australia checklist); Shattuck, 1990: 101
(diagnosis, all species revision, key); Shattuck, 1992c: 161 (diagnosis, review
of genus); Shattuck, 1994: 169 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1053 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 422 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 84 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>TAPINOMINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tapinomini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1913a: 17. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tapinomini as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1992c: 5;
Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 1995b: 16; Bolton, 2003: 19.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tapinomini as tribe of Dolichoderinae: Emery, 1913a: 17; Wheeler,
W.M. 1915h: 86; Forel, 1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 688; subsequent authors
to Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17; Jaffe,
1993: 9; Dubovikov, 2005: 91; Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et
al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.45pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Tapinomini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aptinoma, Axinidris,
*Ctenobethylus, Ecphorella, Liometopum, Tapinoma, Technomyrmex.<o:p></o:p></i></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <span
style='color:red'>TAPINOMINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Axinidrini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Weber, 1941a: 193. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Axinidris</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Axinidrini as
tribe of Dolichoderinae: Weber, 1941a: 193; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Axinidrini as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1992c: 5;
Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 1995b: 9; Bolton, 2003: 19, 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Axinidrini as junior synonym of Tapinomini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361 [by implication,
because type-genus included in Tapinomini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liometopini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Liometopum</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Liometopini as
tribe of Dolichoderinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Liometopini as junior synonym of Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1992c: 5;
Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 1995b: 12; Bolton, 2003: 19, 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Liometopini as junior synonym of Tapinomini: Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361 [by implication,
because type-genus included in Tapinomini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Tapinomini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>APTINOMA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aptinoma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Fisher, 2009: 38.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aptinoma mangabe</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><i

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Fisher, 2009: 39 (species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>AXINIDRIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Axinidris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Weber, 1941a: 192.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Axinidris acholli</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

1943f: 627; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Axinidris</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Axinidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Shattuck, 1992c: 42; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 1995a: 1048; Bolton, 2003: 83.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

style='color:red'>Axinidris</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1991:
105 (diagnosis, all species revision, key); Shattuck, 1992c: 42 (diagnosis,
review of genus); Shattuck, 1994: 9 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 77 (catalogue);
Snelling, 2007: 554 (all species, key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> *<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>CTENOBETHYLUS</span></i></b> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ctenobethylus</i></b> Brues, 1939: 261 [as member of family
Bethylidae]. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus
succinalis</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypoclinea
goepperti</i>), by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus</i> in
Bethylidae: Brues, 1939: 261. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus</i> in
Formicidae: Brown, 1977: 213; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>*Ctenobethylus </span></i><span
lang=EN-GB>in Dolichoderinae, Iridomyrmecini, Bothriomyrmecina: Dubovikov,
2005: 93.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus</i> in
Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et
al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Iridomyrmex</i>: Brown, 1977:
213; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Liometopum</i>: Shattuck,
1992c: 121; Shattuck, 1994: 128; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 1995b: 25.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ctenobethylus</i> as genus:
Brues, 1939: 261; Dlussky; 1997: 623; Bolton, 2003: 84; Dubovikov, 2005: 93.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ECPHORELLA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ecphorella</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1909b: 65 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma (Ecphorella) wellmani</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ecphorella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Emery, 1913a: 42; Forel, 1917: 248;
all subsequent authors except those below; then Ward, Brady, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ecphorella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae, Dolichoderini: Shattuck, 1992c: 85; Bolton,
1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 87.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ecphorella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma</i>:
Forel, 1917: 248; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 142; Emery, 1913a: 42; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 690.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ecphorella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Brown, 1973b: 169 [provisional genus]; Shattuck, 1992c:
85; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 87.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Ecphorella</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 925 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1992c: 85 (diagnosis, review of genus);
Shattuck, 1994: 90 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b:
186 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Liometopum</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1861: 38.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica microcephala</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Zatapinoma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of Tapinoma: Shattuck, 1992c: 146; Shattuck,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
