<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neoclystopsenella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Bethylidae: Kurian, 1955: 133.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neoclystopsenella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dolichoderinae: Brown, 1988a: 337.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neoclystopsenella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinoma</i>:
Brown, 1988a: 337; Shattuck, 1992c: 146; Shattuck, 1994: 140; Bolton, 1994: 26;
Bolton, 2003: 91; Fisher &amp; Bolton, 2007: 66.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

style='color:red'>Tapinoma</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1855: 372
(diagnosis); Smith, F. 1858b: 55 (diagnosis); Roger, 1863b: 13, 14 (<i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ALLOIOMMA</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alloiomma</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Zhang, 1989: 282; Bolton, 2003: 82. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alloiomma incertae sedis</i> in

Dolichoderinae, Miomyrmecini: Carpenter, 1930: 51. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Miomyrmex</i> in
Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Miomyrmex</i> in Dolichoderinae: Shattuck,
1994: 131; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 90.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Miomyrmex incertae sedis</i>
in Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2010: 362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Miomyrmex</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1994: 131 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 258 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PETRAEOMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Petraeomyrmex</i></b> Carpenter, 1930: 55. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petraeomyrmex minimus</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petraeomyrmex</i> in
Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petraeomyrmex</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1994: 135; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 90.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petraeomyrmex incertae sedis</i>
in Dolichoderinae: Carpenter, 1930: 55; Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2010: 362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Petraeomyrmex</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1994: 135 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 316 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PROIRIDOMYRMEX</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Proiridomyrmex</i></b> Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 416.
Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proiridomyrmex vetulus</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proiridomyrmex</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 416. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proididomyrmex incertae sedis</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010:
362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PROTAZTECA</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Protazteca</i></b> Carpenter, 1930: 41. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Protazteca elongata</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Protazteca</i> in
Dolichoderinae, Tapinomini: Carpenter, 1930: 41; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988:
78; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Protazteca</i> in Dolichoderinae: Shattuck,
1994: 139; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 91.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Protazteca incertae sedis</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010:
362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Protazteca</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1994: 139 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 369 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ZHERICHINIUS</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Zherichinius</i></b> Dlussky, 1988: 57. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Zherichinius horribilis</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Zherichinius</i> in
Dolichoderinae, *Zherichiniini: Dlussky, 1988: 57; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva,
1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Zherichinius</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Shattuck, 1994: 170; Bolton, 1994: 26; Bolton, 2003: 92.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Zherichinius incertae sedis</i> in
Dolichoderinae: Ward, Brady, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2010:
362.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Zherichinius</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify'><span
lang=EN-GB>Shattuck, 1994: 170 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 427 (catalogue).</span></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>THE FORMICOMORPHS: SUBFAMILY FORMICINAE<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY
<span style='color:red'>FORMICINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span style='color:red'>FORMICINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicariae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Latreille, 1809: 124. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Formica</i>.<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as group name: Latreille, 1809: 124 [Formicariae];
Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 197 [Formicites]; Nylander, 1846a: 877
[Formicae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as family: Smith, F. 1858b: 1 [Formicidae]; Smith, F.
1861b: 36 [Formicidae]; Smith, 1871a: 302 [Formicidae]; André, 1882a: 125
[Formicidae]; Saunders, 1896: 18 [Formicidae]; Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 97
[Formicidae]; Bernard, 1951: 1073 [Formicidae]; Bernard, 1953b: 256
[Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as tribe of Formicidae: André, 1874: 167 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Mayr, 1855: 286, 299
[Formicidae]; Mayr, 1861: 21 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1862: 651 [Formicidae]; Mayr,
1865: 6 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1868c: 24 [Formicidae]; Forel, 1870: 307
[Formicidae]; Forel, 1874: 21 [Formicidae]; Emery, 1877a: 70 [Formicidae];
André, 1881b: 54 [Formicidae]; Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Bondroit, 1918: 17
[Formicitae]; Wheeler, W.M. 1920: 53; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 210; Emery, 1925b:
2; Karavaiev, 1936: 172; Clark, 1951: 16; Brown, 1954e: 29; Kempf, 1972a: 266;
Brown, 1973b: 169; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as
formicomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 20, 93.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as formicoid subfamily of Formicidae: Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau, Bell, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicinae as
formicoid formicomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Ward, 2007a: 556.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes of Formicinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Camponotini, Formicini, Gesomyrmecini, Gigantiopini, Lasiini,
Melophorini, Myrmecorhynchini, Myrmoteratini, Notostigmatini, Oecophyllini,
Plagiolepidini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Formicinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotites, *Drymomyrmex,
*Imhoffia, *Kyromyrma, *Leucotaphus, *Protrechina, *Zhangidris</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hong (2002) genera
(extinct) <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in
Formicinae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Curtipalpulus,
*Eoleptocerites, *Eurytarsites, *Fushuniformica, *Huaxiaformica,
*Leptogasteritus, *Liaoformica, *Longiformica, *Magnogasterites, *Orbicapitia,
*Ovalicapito, *Ovaligastrula, *Sinoformica, *Sinotenuicapito, *Wilsonia</i>
(unresolved junior homonym).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span style='color:red'>Formicinae</span>
references, world <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1862: 651
(genera key); Mayr, 1865: 6 (diagnosis); Handlirsch, 1907: 859 (*fossil taxa
catalogue); Dalla Torre, 1893: 171 (catalogue); Emery, 1895j: 772 (synoptic
classification); Emery, 1896e: 187 (genera key); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143
(diagnosis); Forel, 1912i: 88 (tribes key); Forel, 1917: 248 (synoptic
classification); Arnold, 1920a: 551 (diagnosis); Forel, 1921c: 139 (diagnosis);
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 210, 691 (diagnosis, tribes key); Emery, 1925b: 2
(diagnosis, tribe key, catalogue); Brown &amp; Nutting, 1950: 127 (venation, phylogeny);
Eisner, 1957: 465 (proventriculus morphology); Hung &amp; Brown, 1966: 198
(gastric apex, structure); Bernard, 1967: 267 (diagnosis); Gotwald, 1969: 120
(mouthparts morphology); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1972a: 41 (diagnosis);
Brown, 1973b: 169 (genera, distribution); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1976b: 62 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Snelling, 1981: 402 (synoptic
classification); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258 (synoptic
classification); Billen, 1986: 173 (Dufour's gland); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva,
1988: 77 (synoptic classification); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 9 (synoptic
classification, genera keys); Agosti, 1991: 295 (genus group diagnoses);
Shattuck, 1992b: 201 (phylogeny); Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp; Ward, 1992: 317
(phylogeny); Bolton, 1994: 42 (diagnosis, synoptic classification, genera
keys); Bolton, 1995a: 1039 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 11 (catalogue); Wenseleers,
Schoeters, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1998: 121 (cloacal
gland); Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 417 (diagnosis for impression fossils);
Bolton, 2003: 20, 93 (diagnosis, synopsis); Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173 (phylogeny); Moreau,
Bell, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102 (phylogeny).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Regional and national faunas with keys <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1855: 299
(Austria); Mayr, 1861: 25 (Europe); Mayr, 1868c: 25 (*Baltic Amber); André,
1874: 167 (Europe); Forel, 1874: 22 (Switzerland); Saunders, E. 1880: 203
(Britain); André, 1882a: 126 (Europe &amp; Algeria); Provancher, 1887: 225
(Canada); Cresson, 1887: 94 (U.S.A. genera); Nasonov, 1889: 50 (Russia); Forel,
1891b: 8 (Madagascar genera); Lameere, 1892: 62 (Belgium); Forel, 1892j: 220
(India &amp; Sri Lanka); Bingham, 1903: 308 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma);

1910: 481 (Belgium); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 560 (North America genera); Stitz,
1914: 80 (Central Europe); Gallardo, 1915: 35 (Argentina genera); Forel, 1915d:
45 (Switzerland); Donisthorpe, 1915d: 184 (Britain); Emery, 1916b: 216 (Italy);
Wheeler, W.M. 1916m: 590 (U.S.A., Connecticut); Bondroit, 1918: 17 (France
&amp; Belgium); Arnold, 1920a: 552 (South Africa); Kutter, 1920b: 134
(Switzerland); Soudek, 1922: 61 (Czechoslovakia); Lomnicki, 1925a: 160
(Poland); Stärcke, 1926: 118, 146 (Netherlands); Karavaiev, 1927c: 273

(Dominican Republic); Arnol'di, 1933b: 601 (Russia); Menozzi, 1933b: 90 (Israel

Sadil, 1941: 97 (Central Europe); Cole, 1942: 373 (U.S.A., Utah); Smith, M.R.

173 (Norway); Holgersen, 1944: 199 (Norway); Smith, M.R. 1947f: 599 (U.S.A.
genera); Boven, 1947: 181 (Belgium); Creighton, 1950a: 355 (North America);
Kusnezov, 1956: 31 (Argentina); Brown, 1958h: 42 (New Zealand); Boven, 1959: 11
(Netherlands); Gregg, 1963: 447 (U.S.A., Colorado); Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1963: 160 (U.S.A., North Dakota); Collingwood, 1964: 104 (Britain);
Bernard, 1967: 268 (Western Europe); Wilson &amp; Taylor, 1967: 17 (Polynesia);
Boven, 1970b: 26 (Netherlands); Kempf, 1972a: 266 (Neotropical, synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1973a: 329 (West Africa genera); Bolton &amp;

Tarbinsky, 1976: 126 (Kyrghyzstan); Boven, 1977: 126 (Belgium); Kutter, 1977c:
183 (Switzerland); Arnol'di &amp; Dlussky, 1978: 548 (former European
U.S.S.R.); Collingwood, 1978: 88 (Iberian Peninsula); Collingwood, 1979: 85 (Fennoscandia
&amp; Denmark); Greenslade, 1979: 32 (South Australia genera); Schembri &amp;
Collingwood, 1981: 436 (Malta); Prins, 1983: 8 (Southern Africa genera);
Allred, 1982: 444 (U.S.A., Utah); Verhaeghe, Deligne, et al., 1984: 106
(Belgium genera); Baroni Urbani, 1984: 81 (Neotropical genera); Gösswald, 1985:
263 (Germany); Collingwood, 1985: 273 (Saudi Arabia); Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1986g: 58 (U.S.A., Nevada); Nilsson &amp; Douwes, 1987: 68
(Norway); Agosti &amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 279 (Balkans); Dlussky, Soyunov
&amp; Zabelin, 1990: 124 (Turkmenistan); Kupyanskaya, 1990: 162 (Far Eastern
Russia); Morisita, Kubota, Onoyama, et al., 1991: 10 (Japan); Atanasov &amp;

phylogeny); Lattke, in Jaffe, 1993: 150 (Neotropical genera); Arakelian, 1994:
76 (Armenia); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 125 (China genera); Kupyanskaya, 1995:
332 (Far Eastern Russia); Collingwood &amp; Agosti, 1996: 361 (Saudi Arabia);
Seifert, 1996b: 166 (Central Europe); Skinner &amp; Allen, 1996: 41 (Britain);
Collingwood &amp; Prince, 1998: 21 (Portugal); Shattuck, 1999: 25, 86
(Australia genera, synopsis); Andersen, 2000: 68 (northern Australia genera);
Zhou, 2001b: 165 (China, Guangxi); Czechowski, Radchenko &amp; Czechowska,
2002: 147 (Poland); Aktaç &amp; Radchenko, 2002: 54 (Turkey genera); Yoshimura
&amp; Onoyama, 2002: 425 (Japan genera, males); MacKay &amp; MacKay, 2002: 236
(U.S.A., New Mexico); Palacio &amp; Fernández, in Fernández, 2003d: 242
(Neotropical genera); Radchenko, 2005b: 187 (North Korea); Coovert, 2005: 113
(U.S.A., Ohio); Clouse, 2007b: 190 (Micronesia); Seifert, 2007: 150 (North and
Central Europe); Terayama, 2009: 202 (Taiwan).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>LASIINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 384. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Lasius</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lasiini as junior synonym of Formicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 698;
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 651; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1985: 258; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 18.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lasiini as tribe of Formicinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Emery, 1925b:
212; Karavaiev, 1936: 192; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77; Jaffe 1993: 12;
Bolton, 1994: 50; Bolton, 2003: 21, 94 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <span
style='color:red'>LASIINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyopsini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1943f: 618. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Acanthomyops</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyopsini as tribe of Formicinae: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 618;
Donisthorpe, 1947c: 593; Donisthorpe, 1947d: 192; Donisthorpe, 1948d: 604;
Donisthorpe, 1949c: 756; Donisthorpe, 1950e: 1063.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyopsini
as junior synonym of Lasiini: Bolton, 1994: 50; Bolton, 2003: 21, 94.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of Lasiini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acropyga, Anoplolepis,
Cladomyrma, Lasiophanes, Lasius, Myrmecocystus, Prolasius, Stigmacros,
Teratomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) of Lasiini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Glaphyromyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span style='color:red'>Lasiini</span>
references</span></b><span lang=EN-GB> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 940, 1037 (Afrotropical, Malagasy catalogues); Emery, 1925b: 212
(diagnosis, genera key, catalogue); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 18 (synoptic
classification); Brandão, 1991: 393 (Neotropical synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1039 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 12 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 21, 94 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Lasiini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ACROPYGA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1862a: 242.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acropyga acutiventris</i>, </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>by
monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 379 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893:
174.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Forel, 1886f: 212; Forel, 1893a:
165; Forel, 1895b: 107; Emery, 1895j: 771; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel,
1912i: 88; Forel, 1917: 249. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 695; Emery, 1925b: 27; all subsequent authors except the two following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga incertae sedis</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in
Formicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Bolton, 2003: 22, 94.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>:
Mayr, 1863: 394.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acropyga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Roger, 1862a: 242; Smith, F. 1871a: 319; Forel, 1878:
379; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ACROPYGA</span></i>.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Rhizomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893g: 347 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acropyga</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acropyga (Rhizomyrma) goeldii</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 172. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Forel, 1893g: 347; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 143; Forel, 1912i: 89; Forel, 1917: 249. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 695.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhizomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1906c: 182; Forel, 1912i: 89; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 79. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 11
(catalogue); Forel, 1878: 379 (diagnosis); Dalla Torre, 1893: 174 (catalogue);
Bingham, 1903: 332 (diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 928 (Afrotropical
catalogue); Emery, 1925b: 27 (diagnosis, subgenera key, catalogue); Emery,
1925b: 29, 30 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. (Rhizomyrma, Atopodon
&amp; Malacomyrma)</i> diagnoses, catalogues); Weber, 1944: 91 (Neotropical <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. (Rhizomyrma)</i> species key); Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 210 (Asia checklist); Kempf, 1972a: 16 (Neotropical
catalogue); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1423 (North America catalogue); Taylor &amp;
Brown, D.R. 1985: 107 (Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 5 (Australia
checklist); Morisita, Kubota, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.,
1991: 14 (Japan species key); Wang, C. &amp; Wu, 1992a: 227 (China species
key); Bolton, 1994: 51 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1047 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 57 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 86 (Australia synopsis);
Terayama, Fellowes &amp; Zhou, 2002: 22 (diagnosis, East Asian species key);
LaPolla, 2004a: 16 (diagnosis, all species revision, New World species key: 23,
Old World species key: 27); LaPolla &amp; Fisher, 2005: 601 (Afrotropical
species, key); LaPolla, Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2006: 197 (phylogeny); Terayama, 2009: 204 (Taiwan species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica longipes</i>
(junior primary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>; <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica gracilipes</i> first available
replacement name: Bolton, 1995b: 67), by monotypy. </span></p>

593. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

1951: 213 (Asia checklist); Kempf, 1972a: 22 (Neotropical catalogue); Prins,
1982: 235 (South Africa <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. (Zealleyella)</i>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Cladomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1920: 53.

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cladomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Dimorphomyrmecini: Emery, 1925b: 45 [subtribe
Brachymyrmecini]; Donisthorpe, 1937a: 620; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 633.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cladomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Myrmelachistini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 697; Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 208; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 18.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cladomyrma</span></i><span

genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cladomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Brachymyrmecini: Wheeler, W.M. 1929a: 12; Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258; Bolton, 1994: 50.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cladomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Bolton, 2003: 22, 96.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Cladomyrma</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1925b: 45
(diagnosis, catalogue); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 208 (Asia checklist);
Agosti, 1991: 293 (diagnosis, all species revision, key); Bolton, 1995a: 1048
(census); Bolton, 1995b: 145 (catalogue); Agosti, Moog &amp; Maschwitz, 1999: 6
(revision, queens all species key). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>GLAPHYROMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Glaphyromyrmex</i></b> Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 131. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Glaphyromyrmex oligocenicus</i>, by
monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Glaphyromyrmex</i> in
Camponotinae, Formicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 131.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Glaphyromyrmex</i> in
Formicinae, Formicini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 647; Dlussky, 1967: 86; Dlussky
&amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77; Bolton, 1994: 50; all subsequent authors to the
following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Glaphyromyrmex</i> in
Formicinae, Lasiini: Dlussky, 2008a: 46 (in text).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIOPHANES</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895i: 16 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Melophorus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica nigriventris</i>
(junior primary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>; <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica atriventris</i> is first available
replacement name), by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 165. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Melophorini: Forel, 1917: 248. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Melophorini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 695; Emery, 1925b:
12; Wheeler, W.M. 1935c: 70; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Bolton, 2003: 22, 96.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Melophorus</i>:
Emery, 1895i: 16; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel, 1917: 248; Emery, 1922a: 90;
Emery, 1925b: 12; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 655.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasiophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 695; Wheeler, W.M. 1935c: 71;
Kusnezov, 1952c: 90; Kusnezov, 1956: 31; Kempf, 1972a: 128; Snelling &amp;
Hunt, 1976: 104; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Lasiophanes</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1922a: 91
(species key); Emery, 1925b: 12 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Melophorus
(Lasiophanes)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Kusnezov, 1956: 31 (Argentina species
key); Kempf, 1972a: 128 (catalogue); Snelling &amp; Hunt, 1976: 104 (all
species key); Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1050
(census); Bolton, 1995b: 220 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Fabricius, 1804: 415.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica nigra</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 338. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i> Jurine, 1801: 164
(Apidae), resurrected by Morice &amp; Durrant, 1915: 421, later suppressed by
Act of Commission.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1861: 49 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1862: 652 (in
key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 8 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1868c: 42 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 374 [Camponotidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1879a: 452 [Camponotidae]; Forel, 1886f: 206; Dalla Torre, 1893: 181.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1886f: 206.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Formicini: Forel, 1893a: 165; Forel, 1895b: 103;
Emery, 1895j: 772; Forel, 1899c: 127; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel, 1912i:
89; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 120.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Formicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 698; Carpenter,
1930: 58; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 201; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1970:
651; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 101; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler,
J. 1985: 258.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Acanthomyopsini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 655.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Emery, 1925b: 226; all
subsequent authors except the entries above; Bolton, 1994: 50; Bolton, 2003:
22, 96.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyops</i>:
Forel, 1916: 460; Donisthorpe, 1916c: 276; Morice &amp; Durrant, 1917: 442.
Donisthorpe, 1927b: 206; Donisthorpe, 1937d: 132; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 655;
Donisthorpe, 1946g: 91.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formicina</i>:
Emery, 1916a: 61; Emery, 1916b: 239; Emery, 1917a: 96; Wheeler, W.M. 1916k:
170; Bondroit, 1918: 19. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Fabricius, 1804: 415; Wheeler, W.M. 1916k: 172; Emery,
1925b: 226; Wilson, 1955a: 11; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIUS</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

1915: 423. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica nigra</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Unnecessary replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Lasius</i> Fabricius.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Donisthorpea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Acanthomyopsini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 640;
Donisthorpe, 1946g: 91.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Donisthorpea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Morice &amp; Durrant, 1915: 423; Donisthorpe, 1915d: 184.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Donisthorpea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formicina</i>:
Emery, 1916a: 11; Emery, 1916b: 240. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Donisthorpea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyops</i>:
Donisthorpe, 1927b: 229; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 640; Donisthorpe, 1946g: 91.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Donisthorpea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyops</i>:
Forel, 1916: 460; Morice &amp; Durrant, 1917: 442; Donisthorpe, 1927b: 209. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Donisthorpea</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1916k: 172; Emery, 1925b: 226; Wilson, 1955a: 11. [<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Donisthorpea</i> share the same type-species; synonymy is therefore
absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Tylolasius</i></b> Zhang, 1989: 295. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tylolasius inflatus</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tylolasius incertae sedis</i>
in Formicinae: Bolton, 2003: 28, 131.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tylolasius</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>: Hong, Wu &amp;
Ren, 2001: 348.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIUS</span></i>
include the nominal plus the following.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>LASIUS (ACANTHOMYOPS)</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 652
(diagnosis in key), 699. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
clavigera</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1862: 652 (in key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 8
[Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Formicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel, 1917:
249.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Formicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 698; Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 651; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 101;
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258; Jaffe, 1993: 14.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Acanthomyopsini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 618.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384 (misspelled as <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex</i>); Emery, 1925b: 236; all
subsequent authors except for those above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Mayr, 1866b: 888; Dalla Torre, 1893: 181. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formicina</i>:
Emery, 1916a: 11; Forel, 1917: 249.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mayr, 1862: 699; Donisthorpe, 1927b: 209; Donisthorpe,
1943f: 618; Creighton, 1950a: 426; Smith, M.R. 1958c: 150; Wing, 1968: 47;
Bolton, 1994: 50; Bolton, 2003: 94. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Emery, 1893i: 642; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Wheeler, W.M. 1916k: 172; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 698; Emery, 1925b: 236; Buren, 1950: 188; Smith, M.R. 1951a: 852;
Gregg, 1963: 453; Ward, 2005: 13. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIUS
(DENDROLASIUS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dendrolasius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ruzsky, 1912: 630 [as
subgenus of Lasius]. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
fuliginosa</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dendrolasius</i> also described
as new by Ruzsky, 1914a: 59.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dendrolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formicina</i>:
Forel, 1917: 249. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dendrolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyops</i>:
Donisthorpe, 1927b: 211; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 637.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dendrolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Ruzsky, 1912: 630; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 698; Emery, 1925b: 235; Wilson, 1955a:
14; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dendrolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional]. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIUS
(CHTHONOLASIUS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Chtonolasius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ruzsky, 1912: 630 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica umbrata</i>, by subsequent
designation of Emery, 1925b: 232. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chtonolasius</i> also
described as new by Ruzsky, 1914a: 59. The claim by some authors (e.g. Emery,
1916a: 11; Donisthorpe, 1941f: 37; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 633) that Ruzsky
nominated <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius flavus</i> as
type-species is incorrect. Ruzsky (1912: 630) included those species &quot;with
the appearance of the yellow <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i> (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Las. flavus</i> D.G.) and its closely
related species, and races (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Las.
carniolicus</i>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Las. umbratus</i>, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Las. myops</i>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Las. mixtus</i>)&quot;. This is not a direct nomination of a
type-species, nor is De Geer (= D.G.) the author of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>flavus</i>: Bolton, 1995b: 24.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chthonolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> justified emendation of spelling: Wheeler, W.M. 1916k: 170. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chthonolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formicina</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1916k: 172; Emery, 1916a: 11.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chthonolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyops</i>:
Donisthorpe, 1927b: 254.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chthonolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Ruzsky, 1912: 630; Ruzsky, 1914a: 59; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 698; Emery, 1925b:
231; Wilson, 1955a: 13; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chthonolasius</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LASIUS (CAUTOLASIUS)</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Cautolasius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wilson, 1955a: 13 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica flava</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cautolasius</span></i><span

Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional].</span></p>

Bolton, 2003: 97.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMECOCYSTUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wesmael, 1838: 770.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecocystus mexicanus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 372 [Camponotidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1879a: 449 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 216.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1886f: 201.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Formicini: Forel, 1893a: 165; Emery, 1895j: 772;
Forel, 1899c: 129; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144; Forel, 1912i: 89; Forel, 1917:
250.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Formicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 699; Chapman &amp;
Capco, 1951: 203; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 651; Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 101; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258; Jaffe,
1993: 14.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Acanthomyopsini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 665.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Emery, 1925b: 238;
subsequent authors except the above; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1445; Bolton, 1994: 50;
Bolton, 2003: 98.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cataglyphis</i>:
Roger, 1863b: 12; Mayr, 1863: 431</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecocystus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Forel, 1878: 372; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMECOCYSTUS</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Endiodioctes</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Snelling, 1976: 25 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecocystus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecocystus melliger</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Prolasius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1892c: 331 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lasius</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica advena</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

style='color:red'>Stigmacros</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1925b: 34
(diagnosis, catalogue); McAreavey, 1957: 7 (diagnosis, all species revision,
key); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 145 (Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a:
74 (Australia checklist); Bolton, 1994: 51 (synoptic classification); Bolton,
1995a: 1053 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 394 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 114
(Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>TERATOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Teratomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> McAreavey, 1957: 54.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Teratomyrmex greavesi</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Teratomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Formicini: Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985:
258.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Teratomyrmex incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Teratomyrmex</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in
Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i> genus group:
Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Teratomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: McAreavey, 1957: 54; Bolton, 1994: 50;
Bolton, 2003: 22, 100.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>PLAGIOLEPIDINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepisii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1886f: 212. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepidini as tribe of Camponotinae: Forel, 1886f: 212
[Plagiolepisii]; Forel, 1891b: 95 [Plagiolepisii]; Forel, 1893a: 165
[Plagiolepisii]; Emery, 1893i: 635 [Plagiolepidii]; Emery, 1895j: 771
[Plagiolepidii]; Forel, 1899c: 123 [Plagiolepidii]; Ruzsky, 1905b: 110
[Plagiolepidii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143 [Plagiolepidii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h:
100; Forel, 1917: 249; Arnold, 1920a: 554.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepidini as tribe of Formicinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384;
Bondroit, 1918: 18; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 693; Emery, 1925b: 15; Santschi,
1926a: 13; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Aphomyrmex</span></i>
Ashmead, 1905a: 111, incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Aphomomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Arnold, 1920a:
552 (South Africa species); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 940 (Afrotropical catalogue);
Emery, 1925b: 44 (diagnosis, catalogue); Snelling, 1979b: 3 (review of genus);
Bolton, 1995a: 1048 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 74 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>BRACHYMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1868b: 163.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Brachymyrmex patagonicus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 375 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 174.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Forel, 1893a: 165; Forel, 1895b:
106; Emery, 1895j: 771; Forel, 1899c: 123; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Myrmelachistini: Forel, 1912i: 89.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Dimorphomyrmecini: Emery, 1925b: 40 [subtribe
Brachymyrmecini]; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 628.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Myrmelachistini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 697;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 18.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudolasius</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Bolton, 2003: 23, 101.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>BRACHYMYRMEX</span></i>
</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bryscha</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1923b: 652 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Brachymyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Brachymyrmex pilipes</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
