lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Brachymyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1424; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

3. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bregmatomyrma carnosa</i>,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPISIOTA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lepisiota</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1926a: 15 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis rothneyi</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lepisiota</i> first available
replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>
Mayr, 1861 (junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>
Kroyer, 1846: 98 (Pisces)), hence valid name of genus: Bolton, 1995b: 33.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lepisiota</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Bolton, 1994: 51; Bolton, 2003: 23.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lepisiota</i> incorrectly as
junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 181; Snelling, 1981: 397. In both publications <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex</i> is an error for <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPISIOTA</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acantholepis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1861: 42.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypoclinea frauenfeldi</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>
Kroyer, 1846: 98 (Pisces)]. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1861: 42 [Formicinae]; Mayr, 1862: 652
[Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 9 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 378 [Camponotidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1879a: 453 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 171.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Forel, 1886f: 212; Forel, 1893a:
165; Emery, 1895j: 771; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel, 1912i: 88; Forel,
1917: 249; Arnold, 1920a: 554.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 696; Emery, 1925b: 23; Santschi, 1926a: 15; all subsequent authors
except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudolasius</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Achantilepis</span></i>
Santschi, 1935b: 274, incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Pseudacantholepis</span></i>
Bernard, 1953b: 256 (attributed to Santschi) [as subgenus of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>]. Unavailable name.
Proposed without designation of type-species and therefore unavailable. Species
included by Bernard (1953) are all referable to <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Lepisiota</i>: Bolton, 1995b: 44.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPISIOTA</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Baroniurbania</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Pagliano &amp;
Scaramozzino, 1990: 4. Unnecessary replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Acantholepis</i> Mayr (junior homonym). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Baroniurbania</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lepisiota</i>:
Bolton, 1994: 51; Bolton, 2003: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Baroniurbania</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lepisiota</i>:
Dietrich, 2004: 324.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Lepisiota</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Note. Entries prior to Bolton, 1995b: 44, refer to genus as <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acantholepis</i>.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 11
(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 394 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 9 (diagnosis); Forel,
1878: 378 (diagnosis); André, 1882b: 210 (Europe &amp; Algeria species key);
Forel, 1892a: 41 (all species key); Dalla Torre, 1893: 171 (catalogue); Forel,
1894c: 411 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key); Bingham, 1903: 315 (India, Sri
Lanka &amp; Burma species key); Arnold, 1920a: 554 (diagnosis, South Africa
species key); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 214, 934, 1036 (diagnosis, Afrotropical,
Malagasy catalogues); Emery, 1925b: 23 (diagnosis, catalogue);
Kuznetsov-Ugamsky, 1929c: 480 (Turkestan species key); Finzi, 1936: 188 (Egypt
species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 209 (Asia checklist); Collingwood,
1985: 292 (Saudi Arabia species key); Agosti &amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 281
(Balkans species key); Atanasov &amp; Dlussky, 1992: 205 (Bulgaria species
key); Xu, 1994c: 232 (China species key); Arakelian, 1994: 80 (Armenia species
key); Bolton, 1994: 51 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 226 (catalogue); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 128 (China species
key); Collingwood &amp; Agosti, 1996: 363 (Saudi Arabia species key); Zhou,
2001b: 167 (China, Guangxi species key). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMELACHISTA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmelachista</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1863a: 162.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmelachista kraatzii</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmelachista</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1865: 10 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmelachista</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 367 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 174.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmelachista</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Forel, 1886f: 214; Forel, 1893a:
165; Forel, 1895b: 106; Emery, 1895j: 771; Forel, 1899c: 124; Wheeler, W.M.

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

249.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 429 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 10 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Prenolepis</i>].

original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nylanderia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1936b: 210; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 676;

synonymy: LaPolla, Brady &amp; Shattuck, 2010a: 126.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>NYLANDERIA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1922d: 111.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Andragnathus hubrechti</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Lasiini: Emery, 1925b: 224.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Acanthomyopsini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 622.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Formicini: Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 197.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Myrmelachistini: Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1985: 258.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina</i>:
Agosti &amp; Bolton, 1990a: 75; Bolton, 2003: 104.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Andragnathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nylanderia</i>:
LaPolla, Brady &amp; Shattuck, 2010a: 126.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <span style='color:red'>N<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>ylanderia</i></span> references</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>For references
prior to 2010, see under <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>LaPolla, Brady
&amp; Shattuck, 2010a: 126 (diagnosis, status).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PARAPARATRECHINA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paraparatrechina</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1947d:
192 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina
(Paraparatrechina) pallida</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paraparatrechina</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Acanthomyopsini: Donisthorpe, 1947d: 192.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paraparatrechina</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Trager, 1984b: 58.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paraparatrechina</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> revived from synonymy, status as genus: LaPolla, Brady &amp;
Shattuck, 2010a: 128.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Paraparatrechina</span></i> references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>For references
prior to 2010 see under <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>LaPolla, Brady
&amp; Shattuck, 2010a: 128 (diagnosis, status); LaPolla, Cheng &amp; Fisher,
2010: 3 (Afrotropical and Malagasy species revision, key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PARATRECHINA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paratrechina</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Motschoulsky, 1863: 13.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paratrechina currens</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica longicornis</i>),
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 170. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Bolton, 2003: 23, 104.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paratrechina</span></i><span

Dalla Torre, 1893: 177; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 940. </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paratrechina</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1925b: 216; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Paratrechina</span></i> references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

to 2010 also include <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nylanderia</i> and <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paraparatrechina</i>.<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P. (Nylanderia)</i> catalogues); Emery,
1925b: 216 (diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1925b: 217 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Andragnathus</i> diagnosis, catalogue);

&amp; Dlussky, 1978: 556 (former European U.S.S.R. species key); Smith, D.R.

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1861: 42 [Formicinae]; Mayr, 1862: 652
[Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 7 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1868c: 36 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepis</span></i><span

Forel, 1879a: 453 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 172.</span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Forel, 1886f: 212; Forel, 1893a:
165; Emery, 1895j: 771; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel, 1912i: 88; Wheeler,
W.M. 1915h: 100; Forel, 1917: 249; Arnold, 1920a: 578.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepis</span></i><span

18; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 696; Emery, 1925b: 19; Santschi, 1926a: 14; all
subsequent authors except the one below; Bolton, 2003: 23, 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plagiolepis</span></i><span

genus group: Agosti, 1991: 296.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PLAGIOLEPIS</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i></b> Mayr, 1868c: 41. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex pygmaeus</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i> in
Formicinae: Mayr, 1868c: 41 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i> in
Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 376 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 175.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i> in
Camponotinae, Myrmelachistini: Forel, 1912i: 89.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i> in

103.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i> in
Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Donisthorpe, 1943g: 724; Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalomyrmex</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>: Dlussky,
1997: 624; Bolton, 2003: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anacantholepis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1914e: 36
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis (Anacantholepis)
decora</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anacantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 212.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anacantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>:
Santschi, 1914e: 36 Forel, 1917: 249; Arnold, 1922: 581; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
696; Emery, 1925b: 22; Bolton, 1994: 51. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anacantholepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional]; Bolton, 2003: 105, 268.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aporomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Faber, 1969: 52.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aporomyrmex ampeloni</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aporomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Faber, 1969: 52 (by implication). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aporomyrmex</span></i><span

Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional]; Bolton, 1994: 51; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tapinolepis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1925b: 18 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anoplolepis</i>].

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Bolton, 2003: 23, 107.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tapinolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anoplolepis</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 185 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tapinolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Bolton, 2003: 107, 267.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>TAPINOLEPIS</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mesanoplolepis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1926a: 14
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anoplolepis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plagiolepis simulans</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesanoplolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anoplolepis</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 182 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesanoplolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tapinolepis</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 107, 267.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Tapinolepis</span></i> references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>See under</span></b><span lang=EN-GB> <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anoplolepis</i> for pre-2003 references;
Bolton, 2003: 267 (genus diagnosis, checklist).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>MYRMOTERATINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895j: 772. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratini as tribe of Camponotinae: Emery, 1895j: 772
[Myrmoteratii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143 [Myrmoteratii].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratini as tribe of Gesomyrmicinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratini as tribe of Formicinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 692;
Emery, 1925b: 36; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <span
style='color:red'>MYRMOTERATINI</span></span></b><span lang=EN-GB
style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 88. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratini as tribe of Camponotinae: Forel, 1912i: 88; Forel,
1917: 248.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteratini as junior homonym and junior synonym of Myrmoteratini
Emery: Bolton, 1995b: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of Myrmoteratini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe and genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Myrmoteras</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Bingham, 1903:
313 (diagnosis); Emery, 1925b: 36 (diagnosis, catalogue); Creighton, 1930a: 184
(all species key); Wheeler, W.M. 1933e: 75 (all species key); Chapman &amp;
Capco, 1951: 209 (Asia checklist); Gregg, 1954: 25 (all species key); Moffett,
1985b: 17 (diagnosis, all species revision, key); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva,
1988: 77 (synoptic classification); Agosti, 1992: 405 (diagnosis, review of
genus, Malesian species key); Bolton, 1994: 51 (synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1995a: 1051 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 287 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 23,
107 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of <span
style='color:red'>Myrmoteratini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOTERAS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteras</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893f: 607.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras binghamii</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras</i> also described
as new by Forel, 1894c: 418.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteras</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1894c: 420.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteras</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Myrmoteratini: Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 143; Forel, 1917: 248.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteras</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Gesomyrmicinae, Myrmoteratini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteras</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Myrmoteratini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 694; Emery,
1925b: 36; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoteras</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oecophylla</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOTERAS</span></i>
include the nominal plus the following.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOTERAS
(MYAGROTERAS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myagroteras</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Moffett, 1985bb: 31 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoteras donisthorpei</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

[Gesomyrmicinae].</span></p>

(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex</i>).</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Dimorphomyrmii as tribe of Camponotinae: Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler,
W.M. 1910g: 143; Forel, 1917: 232 [Dimorphomyrmicini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dimorphomyrmii as tribe of Formicinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 693
[Dimorphomyrmicini]; Emery, 1925b: 39 [Dimorphomyrmicini incorrectly as senior
synonym of Gesomyrmecini]; Engel &amp; Grimaldi, 2005: 4 [Dimorphomyrmecini
incorrectly as senior synonym of Gesomyrmecini. The latter retains priority
over Dimorphomyrmii under Article 40.2 of the International Code of Zoological
Nomenclature (4th Edition), 1999: 46.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dimorphomyrmii as junior synonym of Gesomyrmecini: Wheeler, W.M.
1929a: 12; all subsequent authors except the above; Bolton, 2003: 108.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 89 (diagnosis in key). Type-genus: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmini as tribe of Camponotinae: Forel, 1912i: 89; Wheeler,
W.M. 1915h: 107; Forel, 1917: 249 [Gesomyrmicini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 693
[Gesomyrmicini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmini as tribe of Formicinae: Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 208
[Gesomyrmicini]; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77 [Gesomyrmini].</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmini as junior synonym of Gesomyrmecini Ashmead: Bolton,
1994: 50.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1917: 232. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Santschiella</i>.

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

lang=EN-GB>Santschiellini as tribe of Camponotinae: Forel, 1917: 232.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Santschiellini as tribe of Formicinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 692; Emery,
1925b: 48; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Santschiellini as junior synonym of Gesomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003: 23,
108.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Sicelomyrmicini</b> Wheeler,
W.M. 1929a: 12. Type-genus: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sicilomyrmex</i>.

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

lang=EN-GB>*Sicelomyrmicini as tribe of Formicinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1929a: 12;
Brown &amp; Carpenter, 1979: 423 [*Sicilomyrmecini]; Bolton, 1994: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Sicelomyrmicini as junior synonym of Gesomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003:
23, 108.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of
Gesomyrmecini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex,
Santschiella</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) of
Gesomyrmecini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sicilomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Gesomyrmecini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Prodimorphomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe and genus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Gesomyrmex</span></i>
references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1878: 376
(diagnosis); Dalla Torre, 1893: 175, 176 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex,
Dimorphomyrmex</i> catalogues); Emery, 1925b: 39 (diagnosis, genera key,
catalogue); Emery, 1925b: 46 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dimorphomyrmex</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1925b: 47 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1929a: 10 (checklist); Cole, 1949: 76 (all
species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 208 (Asia checklist); Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 652 (larva diagnosis); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1976b: 62 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 207 (catalogue);
Bolton, 2003: 23, 107 (diagnosis, synopsis); Dlussky, Wappler &amp; Wedmann,
2009: 5, 13 (diagnosis of genus, queens key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Gesomyrmecini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>GESOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1868c: 50.
Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex hoernesi</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1868c: 50 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 367 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 175.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1893a: 165.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Oecophyllini: Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 143.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Gesomyrmicinae, Gesomyrmicini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Gesomyrmecini: Forel, 1912i: 89; Wheeler, W.M.
1915h: 107; Forel, 1917: 249.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Dimorphomyrmecini: Emery, 1925b: 47; Donisthorpe,
1943f: 647.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Gesomyrmecini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 697; Wheeler,
W.M. 1929a: 12; all subsequent authors except below; Bolton, 1994: 50; Bolton,
2003: 24, 108.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:black'>[</span><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>Gaesomyrmex</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> Dalla
Torre, 1893: 175, unjustified emendation of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex</i>.
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gaesomyrmex</i> as junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex</i>: Forel, 1893a: 167.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>GESOMYRMEX</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dimorphomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> André, 1892b: 49.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dimorphomyrmex janeti</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gesomyrmex chaperi</i>),
by monotypy.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1893a: 165.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>MYRMECORHYNCHINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmorhynchini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>sic</i>) Wheeler, W.M.
1917f: 19. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecorhynchus</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchini as tribe of Camponotinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1917f: 19
[Myrmorhynchini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchini as junior synonym of Melophorini: Wheeler, W.M.
1935c: 69 (in text); Brown, 1955d: 471; Bolton, 1994: 50. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchini as tribe of Formicinae: Emery, 1925b: 35 (with
emendation of spelling); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 651; Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 64; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 17; Bolton, 2003: 24, 109.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Myrmecorhynchini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecorhynchus, Notoncus,
Pseudonotoncus</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span style='color:red'>Myrmecorhynchini</span>
references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1925b: 35
(diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 694 (genera key (as part of
Melophorini)); Brown, 1955d: 471 (review of tribe (as part of Melophorini));
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 652 (larva diagnosis); Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 64 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 77 (synoptic classification); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990:
17 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1995b: 12 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 24, 109 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Myrmecorhynchini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMECORHYNCHUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> André, 1896b: 253.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecorhynchus emeryi</i>,
by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Oecophyllini: Forel, 1912i: 89; Forel, 1917: 250.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Myrmecorhynchini: Wheeler, W.M. 1917f: 19.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Myrmecorhynchini: Emery, 1925b: 35; Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 258.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Melophorini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 694; Wheeler, W.M.
1935c: 71; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Myrmecorhynchini: Bolton, 2003: 24, 109.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Myrmecorhynchus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1917f: 15 (diagnosis, review of genus); Emery, 1925b: 35 (diagnosis,
catalogue); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 125 (Australia catalogue); Taylor,
1987a: 47 (Australia checklist); Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1995a: 1051 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 275 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999:
97 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>NOTONCUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Notoncus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895g: 352.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus ectatommoides</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Plagiolepidini: Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 143.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Plagiolepidini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Melophorini: Forel, 1912i: 88; Forel, 1917: 248.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

lang=EN-GB>Gigantiopini as tribe of Gesomyrmicinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Gigantiopini as tribe of Formicinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 692;
Emery, 1925b: 48; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of Gigantiopini</span></b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe and genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Gigantiops</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 11
(catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 9 (diagnosis); Forel, 1878: 370 (diagnosis); Dalla
Torre, 1893: 175 (catalogue); Emery, 1925b: 48 (diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1970: 652 (larva diagnosis); Kempf, 1972a: 110
(catalogue); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 63 (larvae, review &amp;
synthesis); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77 (synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 207 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 25, 111 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of <span
style='color:red'>Gigantiopini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>GIGANTIOPS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1863b: 11.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica destructor</i>, by
monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1865: 9 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 370 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 175.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Gesomyrmicinae, Gigantiopini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Oecophyllini: Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 143; Forel, 1912i: 89; Forel, 1917: 250.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Gigantiopini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 700; Emery,
1925b: 48; all subsequent authors except the one below; Bolton, 1994: 50;
Bolton, 2003: 26, 111.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gigantiops</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oecophylla</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Gigantiops</span></i> references</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>CAMPONOTINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1878: 364. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as subfamily of Formicidae: Forel, 1878: 364
[Camponotidae]; Forel, 1879a: 56 [Camponotidae]; Nasonov, 1889: 9
[Camponotidae]; Forel, 1891b: 13 [Camponotidae]; Forel, 1892j: 219
[Camponotidae]; Forel, 1893a: 165 [Camponotinae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 171
[Camponotinae]; Emery, 1895j: 771 [subfamily spelled Camponotini]; Emery,
1896d: 187 [Camponotinae]; Forel, 1899c: 123 [Camponotinae]; Bingham, 1903: 308
[Camponotinae]; Ashmead, 1905b: 384 [Camponotinae]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 143
[Camponotinae]; Forel, 1912i: 87 [Camponotinae]; Forel, 1915d: 45
[Camponotinae]; Donisthorpe, 1915d: 184 [Camponotinae]; Escherich, 1917: 2
[Camponotini]; Forel, 1917: 248 [Camponotinae]; Arnold, 1920a: 551
[Camponotinae]; Soudek, 1922: 61 [Camponotinae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as tribe of Formicidae: André, 1882a: 126
[Camponotidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as family: Emery, 1894g: 372 [Camponotidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as tribe of Camponotidae: Forel, 1886f: 141
[Camponotii]; Forel, 1891b: 13 [Camponotii].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as tribe of Camponotinae: Forel, 1893a: 165
[Camponotii]; Forel, 1895b: 101 [Camponoti]; Emery, 1895j: 772 [Camponotii];
Forel, 1899c: 130 [Camponotii]; Ruzsky, 1902d: 4 [subfamily spelled
Camponotini]; Ruzsky, 1905b: 110 [Camponotii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144
[Camponotii].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as tribe of Camponotinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Wheeler,
1915g: 813 [Camponotides]; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 135; Forel, 1915d: 45; Forel,
1917: 250; Arnold, 1922: 610; Soudek, 1922: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotini as tribe of Formicinae: Bondroit, 1918: 65; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 693; Emery, 1925b: 53; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <span
style='color:red'>CAMPONOTINI</span></span></b><span lang=EN-GB

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachidini as tribe of Camponotinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachidini as junior synonym of Camponotini: Bolton, 1994: 50.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

&amp; Gibron, 1962: 146. Type-genus: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus</i>.</span></p>

comm., 2004). [Synonymy remained unpublished at his death in 2008.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of Camponotini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calomyrmex, Camponotus,
Echinopla, Forelophilus, Opisthopsis, Overbeckia, Phasmomyrmex, Polyrhachis</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) of
Camponotini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chimaeromyrma,
*Pseudocamponotus</i>.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
