<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1861: 35.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica ligniperda</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 347. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
herculeana</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 259,
repeated in Arnold, 1922: 612.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1861: 35 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1862: 652 (in
key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 6 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1868c: 26 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 367 [Camponotidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1879a: 447 [Camponotidae]; Forel, 1892j: 223 [Camponotidae]; Dalla
Torre, 1893: 171.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1886f: 141; Forel, 1893a: 165;
Forel, 1895b: 101; Emery, 1895j: 772; Forel, 1899c: 130; Ashmead, 1905b: 384;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144; Forel, 1912i: 89; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 138; Forel,
1917: 250; Arnold, 1922: 610. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Camponotini: Bondroit, 1918: 65; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 703; Emery, 1925b: 59; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>:
Smith, F. 1871a: 306.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Camponotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: all authors except the entry above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Paleosminthurus</i></b> Pierce &amp; Gibron, 1962: 146. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus juliae</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus</i> in
Collembola, family *Paleosminthuridae: Pierce &amp; Gibron, 1962: 146. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus incertae
sedis</i> in Formicidae: Najt, 1987: 152. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus incertae
sedis</i> in Formicinae: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 18.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus</i> in
*Paleosmithurinae: Bolton, 1994: 187 [provisional subfamily status]; Bolton,
1995b: 14, 311; Bolton, 2003: 76, 263.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paleosminthurus</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>: Snelling
(pers. comm., 2004). [Synonymy remained unpublished at his death in 2008.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Shanwangella</i> Zhang, 1989:
307. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Shanwangella
palaeoptera</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Shanwangella</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>: Hong &amp; Wu,
2000: 20.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS</span></i>
include the nominal plus the following</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>All the
subgenera were given as provisional junior synonyms of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Camponotus</i> by Brown, 1973b: 179 - 185. Brown's list was repeated in
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 18 but with all subgenera listed as junior
synonyms; subgeneric status was reinstated in Bolton, 1994: 50. These
consecutive entries are not repeated individually below.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(COLOBOPSIS)</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1861: 38.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica truncata</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 342. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1861: 38 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1862: 652 (in
key) [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 7 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 368 [Camponotidae]; Emery &amp;
Forel, 1897: 449 [Camponotidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1886f: 193; Emery, 1895j: 772;
Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Camponotini: Bondroit, 1918: 65; Emery, 1925b: 144;
all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mayr, 1861: 38; Mayr, 1862: 652; Mayr, 1865: 7; Mayr,
1870b: 940; Forel, 1878: 368; Forel, 1879a: 125; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 449;
André, 1882b: 159; Bingham, 1903: 342; Forel, 1886f: 193; Ashmead, 1905b: 384;
Bondroit, 1918: 66; Jaffe, 1993: 14.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Emery, 1889b: 517; Dalla Torre, 1893: 219; Forel, 1893a: 165; Forel, 1893b:
435; Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler, W.M. 1904b: 139; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144;
Forel, 1912i: 90; Forel, 1914a: 263; Forel, 1917: 251; Emery, 1920b: 247;
Arnold, 1922: 613; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 708; Emery, 1925b: 144; Donisthorpe,
1943f: 634; Creighton, 1950a: 390; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 222; Kempf,
1972a: 42; Smith, D.R., 1979: 1433; Bolton, 1994: 50. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(COLOBOPSIS)</span></i></span></b><span lang=EN-GB style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Condylomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1928c: 72 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus (Condylomyrma)
bryani</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylomyrma</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> as subgenus
of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>: Santschi, 1928c: 72. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Condylomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Colobopsis</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1934e: 422 (in text). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Campylomyrma</span></i>
Wheeler, W.M. 1934e: 421 (in text), incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

35. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolophra politae</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolophra</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1994: 35; Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995:
158.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS (MAYRIA) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mayria</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1878: 369.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mayria madagascarensis</i>
(junior secondary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>,
replaced by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus repens</i>), by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 369 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 219.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1893a: 165; Emery, 1895j: 772;
Ashmead, 1905b: 384; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1894e: 227; Forel, 1914a: 262; Forel, 1917: 251; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
706; Emery, 1925b: 121; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS (MAYRIA)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmosaga</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 92 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus kelleri</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus
quadrimaculatus</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 260;
repeated in Arnold, 1922: 613.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmosaga</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>
Forel, 1912i: 92; Forel, 1914a: 260; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 241;
Arnold, 1922: 613; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 706; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mayria</i>:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1893a: 165; Emery, 1895j: 772;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as genus: Forel, 1886f: 192; Forel, 1893a: 165; Dalla Torre, 1893:

lang=EN-GB>Dendromyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895j: 772.

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Emery, 1895j: 772; Ashmead, 1905b: 384;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i

(DINOMYRMEX)</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 384. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dinomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dinomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dinomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1913b: 350; Forel, 1914a: 259; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 236;
Arnold, 1922: 612; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 704; Emery, 1925b: 69; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(DINOMYRMEX)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmogigas</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica gigas</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmogigas</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmogigas</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dinomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1913b: 350 (in text); Forel, 1914a: 259; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 704. [<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dinomyrmex</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrmogigas</i> share the same type-species, synonymy is therefore
absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS (TANAEMYRMEX)</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tanaemyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 384.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica longipes</i>
(junior primary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>,
replaced by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus etiolipes</i>), by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tanaemyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tanaemyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tanaemyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Emery, 1925b: 75; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(TANAEMYRMEX)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoturba</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica maculata</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 82. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoturba</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91; Forel, 1914a: 259; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 235;
Arnold, 1922: 612; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 704.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoturba</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tanaemyrmex</i>:
Emery, 1925b: 75; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(ORTHONOTOMYRMEX)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Orthonotomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1906:
31.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Orthonotus</i>
Ashmead, 1905b: 384; junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Orthonotus</i>
Westwood, in Stephens, 1829: 344 (Hemiptera). Type-species not <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica lateralis</i>, unjustified
subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 264; repeated in Arnold, 1922: 613.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Orthonotomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1913i: 350 (in text); Forel, 1914a: 264; Forel, 1917: 251; Emery, 1920b:
244; Arnold, 1922: 613; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 707; Emery, 1925b: 124; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ORTHONOTOMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Orthonotus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 384.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica sericea</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Orthonotus</i>
Westwood, in Stephens, 1829: 344 (Hemiptera).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Orthonotus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMAMBLYS) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmamblys</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 90 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus reticulatus</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 80. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus
fastigatus</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 263;
repeated in Arnold, 1922: 613.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmamblys</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 90; Forel, 1914a: 263; Forel, 1917: 251; Emery, 1920b: 248;
Arnold, 1922: 613; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 708; Emery, 1925b: 136; Santschi,
1926c: 601; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOTHRIX)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmothrix</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica abdominalis</i>
(junior primary homonym; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica atriceps</i>
is first available replacement name), by subsequent designation of Wheeler,
W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
rufipes</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 260.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmothrix</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91; Forel, 1914a: 260; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 236;
Emery, 1925b: 107; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOSERICUS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmosericus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica rufoglauca</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmosericus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91; Forel, 1914a: 259; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 236;
Arnold, 1922: 613; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 704; Emery, 1925b: 104; all subsequent
authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[See note under <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmosaulus</i>.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOPHYMA) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmophyma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus capito</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus
quadrisectus</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 261;
repeated in Arnold, 1922: 612.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmophyma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91; Forel, 1914a: 261; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 239;
Arnold, 1922: 612; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 706; Emery, 1925b: 109; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOPHYMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmocamelus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1914a: 261 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica ephippium</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus
gambeyi</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1922: 101. <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmocamelus</i> also described as new by
Forel, 1915b: 102.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmocamelus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1914a: 261; Forel, 1915b: 102; Forel, 1917: 250; Forel, 1922: 101. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmocamelus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmophyma</i>:
Emery, 1920b: 257; Wheeler, W.M. 1921a: 18; Emery, 1925b: 109.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOTREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmotrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus foraminosus</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmotrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91; Forel, 1914a: 262; Forel, 1917: 250; Emery, 1920b: 245;
Arnold, 1922: 613; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 707; Emery, 1925b: 130; all subsequent
authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOBRACHYS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmobrachys</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 91 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica senex</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmobrachys</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Forel, 1912i: 91; Forel, 1914a: 262; Forel, 1917: 251; Emery, 1920b: 251;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 709; Emery, 1925b: 161; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS (MYRMENTOMA)
</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmentoma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912i: 92 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica lateralis</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 80. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Orthonotomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1913b: 350 (in text); Forel, 1914a: 264; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 970. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmentoma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:

62; Emery, 1925b: 116; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica sexguttata</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmepomis</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrmolophus</i> share the same type-species, synonymy is therefore
absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMAPHAENUS)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paracolobopsis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1920b: 249 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus salvini</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paracolobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Emery, 1920b: 249; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 709.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paracolobopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmaphaenus</i>:
Emery, 1925b: 152; Kempf, 1972a: 44.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Neomyrmamblys</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1921a:
19 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus fastigatus</i>,
by subsequent designation of Santschi, 1921f: 311. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1921a: 19; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 708.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neomyrmamblys</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmaphaenus</i>:
Emery, 1925b: 152; Kempf, 1972a: 44.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOSAULUS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmosaulus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1921a: 18
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica cinerascens</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 705. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
singularis</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery, 1925b: 113,
repeated in Donisthorpe, 1943f: 670. Note that Donisthorpe, 1932c: 445, states
that <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. cinerascens</i> belongs in
subgenus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmosericus</i>. If so then <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmosaulus</i> would fall as a junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmosericus</i>.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmosaulus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1921a: 18; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 705; Emery, 1925b: 112; all
subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOCLADOECUS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus latangulus</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 709. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Manniella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMISOLEPIS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmisolepis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1921f: 310
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus epinotalis</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmisolepis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Santschi, 1921f: 310; Emery, 1925b: 133; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOPELTA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmopelta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1921f: 310 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus arminius</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmamblys</i>:
Emery, 1925b: 137.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Santschi, 1921f: 310; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 704 (footnote); Santschi, 1926a: 16;
Santschi, 1926c: 603; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CAMPONOTUS
(MYRMOPLATYPUS)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoplatypus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1921f: 311
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus platytarsus</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Santschi, 1921f: 311; Emery, 1925b: 169; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

by original designation. </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

669. </span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Camponotus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1861: 35
(Europe species key); Roger, 1863b: 1, 9 (Camponotus, Colobopsis catalogues);
Mayr, 1863: 397, 403 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus,
Colobopsis</i> catalogues); Mayr, 1865: 6, 7 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Camponotus, Colobopsis</i> diagnosis); Mayr, 1867a: 67 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Colobopsis</i> diagnois); Mayr, 1868c: 27
(*Baltic Amber species key); Mayr, 1870a: 373 (Colombia + Panama (= New
Grenada) species key); Mayr, 1870b: 941 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Colobopsis</i>
species key); André, 1874: 175 (Europe species key); Forel, 1874: 38
(Switzerland species key); Mayr, 1876: 58 (Australia species key); Mayr, 1878:
869 (all <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dendromyrmex</i> species key (as
part of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>)); Forel, 1878:
367, 368 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus, Colobopsis</i>
diagnoses); André, 1882a: 138 (Europe &amp; Algeria species key); André, 1882b:
159 (Europe &amp; Algeria <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Colobopsis</i>
species key); Cresson, 1887: 255 (U.S.A. <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus,
Colobopsis</i> catalogue); Provancher, 1887: 228 (Canada species key); Nasonov,
1889: 57 (Russia species key); Forel, 1891b: 71, 216 (Madagascar species key);
Forel, 1892j: 223 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key); Dalla Torre, 1893: 219 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhinomyrmex, Mayria, Camponotus</i>
catalogues); Emery, 1893i: 667 (North America species key); Forel, 1893b: 435
(India &amp; Sri Lanka <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Colobopsis)</i>
species key); Emery, 1895j: 772 (synoptic classification); Emery, 1896d: 370,
378 (species groups, catalogue); Emery, 1898a: 225 (additions to 1896a
catalogue); Emery, 1903 (South America species key); Bingham, 1903: 343, 348
(India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Colobopsis,
Camponotus</i> species keys); Ruzsky, 1905b: 185 (Russian Empire species key);
Emery, 1908a: 183 (Palaearctic <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C.
herculeanus</i> &amp; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. maculatus</i>
groups species key); Bondroit, 1910: 486 (Belgium species key); Wheeler, W.M.
1910d: 297 (North America species key); Forel, 1914a: 259, 266 (subgenera
diagnoses, species listed by subgenus); Stitz, 1914: 94 (Central Europe species
key); Santschi, 1915c: 266 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C.
(Myrmotrema)</i> species key); Emery, 1916b: 227 (Italy species key); Wheeler,
W.M. 1916m: 600 (U.S.A., Connecticut species key); Mann, 1916: 489 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dendromyrmex</i>, all species key);
Bondroit, 1918 (France &amp; Belgium species key); Emery, 1920b: 235
(subgenera, diagoses); Emery, 1920c: 8 (Old World <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. maculatus</i> group, checklist &amp; key); Wheeler, W.M. 1921a: 16
(subgenera, notes); Santschi, 1921f: 310 (subgenera, notes); Mann, 1921: 489,
499 (Fiji Is <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Myrmogonia)</i> &amp; <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Colobopsis)</i> species keys); Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 704 (subgenera synopsis); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 232, 948, 1039
(diagnosis, Afrotropical, Malagasy catalogues); Arnold, 1922: 610, 612, 619,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CHIMAEROMYRMA</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Chimaeromyrma</i></b> Dlussky, 1988: 58. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chimaeromyrma brachycephala</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chimaeromyrma incertae sedis</i>
in Formicinae: Dlussky, 1988: 58. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chimaeromyrma</i> in
Formicinae, Camponotini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77; Bolton, 1994: 50.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ECHINOPLA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Echinopla</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Smith, F. 1857a: 79.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Echinopla melanarctos</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 162. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ECHINOPLA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesoxena</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Smith, F. 1860b: 106 [Poneridae]; Smith, F. 1871a:
324 [Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 27.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesoxena</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1865: 10 [Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

Plagiolepidini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1878: 369 [Camponotidae]; Emery,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesoxena</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Echinopla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 182 [provisional]; Bolton, 1994: 50; Bolton, 2003: 121.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Echinopla</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Smith, F. 1858b:
197 (diagnosis); Smith, F. 1862d: 415 (catalogue); Roger, 1863b: 9, 21
(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 408, 428 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 7, 10 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Echinopla, Mesoxena</i> diagnoses); Mayr,
1867a: 65 (diagnosis); Forel, 1878: 368 (diagnosis); Emery, 1896d: 382
(catalogue); Emery, 1898a: 231 (additions to 1896a catalogue); Emery, 1925b:
210 (diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1925b: 212 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Mesoxena</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 253, 256
(Asia <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Echinopla, Mesoxena</i>
checklists); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 122 (Australia catalogue); Taylor,
1987a: 24 (Australia checklist); Bolton, 1994: 50 (synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 183 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999:
95 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>FORELOPHILUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Forelophilus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kutter, 1931b: 193.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Forelophilus overbecki</i>,
by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Forelophilus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Camponotini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 646; all subsequent
authors except below; Bolton, 1994: 50.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Forelophilus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Opisthopsis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Dalla Torre, 1893: 219. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecopsis</i>

Newman, 1850: cxxii (Lepidoptera).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

384; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144; Forel, 1912i: 89; Forel, 1917: 250.</span></p>

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>]. Type-species: <i

monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus polyrhachioides</i>
(unnecessary replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis
paradoxa</i>), by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 81. </span></p>

latangulus</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Forel, 1914a: 265.]</span></p>

lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>POLYRHACHIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Smith, F. 1857a: 58.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica bihamata</i>, by

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i> Shuckard, in

nudum</i>.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

Smith, F. 1858b: 58.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae: Mayr, 1862: 652 [Formicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 6
[Formicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae: Forel, 1878: 367 [Camponotidae]; Dalla Torre,
1893: 257.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Polyrhachidini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Camponotinae, Camponotini: Forel, 1886f: 194; Forel, 1893a: 165;
Emery, 1895j: 772; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 144; Forel, 1912i: 89; Forel, 1917:
251; Arnold, 1924: 741.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, Camponotini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 701; Emery, 1925b:
175; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>
genus group: Agosti, 1991: 295.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrma</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1911c: 860; Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 170. [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrma</i> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>:
Forel, 1915b: 106; Forel, 1917: 251; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 702, 993; Emery,
1925b: 198; all subsequent authors (see note under <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrma</i>).]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Polyrachis</span></i>
Arnold, 1924: 741, incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>POLYRHACHIS</span></i> include the nominal plus the
following. <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>All the earlier subgenera
were given as provisional junior synonyms of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Polyrhachis</i> by Brown, 1973b: 178 - 184. Brown's list was repeated
in Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 19 but with all subgenera listed as junior
synonyms; subgeneric status was reinstated in Bolton, 1994: 50. These
consecutive entries are not repeated individually below.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>POLYRHACHIS (MYRMA) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Billberg, 1820: 104.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica militaris</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911c: 859. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Although <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrma</i> antedates <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>, the former has been treated
as a subgenus of the latter since Forel, 1917: 251 (see Hung, 1967b: 396 for
history). Dorow, Kohout &amp; Taylor, 1997: 236 proposed the precedence of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i> over <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrma</i> and that precedence was established by the ICZN (Opinion
1919) 1999: 92.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Polyrhachis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrma</i>: Wheeler,
W.M. 1911c: 860; Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 170. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>:
Forel, 1915b: 106; Forel, 1917: 251; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 702, 993; Emery,
1925b: 198; all subsequent authors, see note above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>POLYRHACHIS (MYRMA)</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Hoplomyrmus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Gerstäcker, 1859: 262.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hoplomyrmus schistaceus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hoplomyrmus</i> also
described as new by Gerstäcker, 1862: 508.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hoplomyrmus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>:
Roger, 1861b: 174; Roger, 1863b: 6; Mayr, 1863: 446; Dalla Torre, 1893: 257. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hoplomyrmus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrma</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1911c: 860; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 993; Emery, 1925b: 198; Bolton,
1973b: 288.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pseudocyrtomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1921e: 18
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis revoili</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudocyrtomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>:
Emery, 1921e: 18; Emery, 1925b: 206.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudocyrtomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrma</i>:
Bolton, 1973b: 288.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anoplomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Chapman, 1963: 258 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Polyrhachis (Anoplomyrma)
parabiotica</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anoplomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrma</i>:
Dorow, 1995: 30.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
