<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>EOAENICTITES</span></i></span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoaenictites</i> Hong, 2002:
541. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoaenictites
castanifurvus</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic
history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eoaenictites</i>
in Aenictinae: Hong, 2002: 541. [BB note: definitely not Aenictinae.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;
margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in;tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY <span style='color:red'>DORYLINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily
<span style='color:red'>DORYLINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylida</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Leach, 1815: 147. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylinae as family: Leach, 1815: 147 [Dorylida (family-group
name)]; Haliday, 1836: 331 [Dorylidae]; Swainson &amp; Shuckard, 1840: 175
[Dorylidae]; Shuckard, 1840a: 188 [Dorylidae]; Smith, F. 1859b: 1 [Dorylidae];
Mayr, 1866b: 895 [Dorylidae]; Smith, F. 1871a: 225 [Dorylidae]; André, 1882a:
125 [Dorylidae]; Cresson, 1887: 93 [Dorylidae]; Emery, 1894g: 381 [Dorylidae];
Ashmead, 1905b: 381 [Dorylidae]; Ashmead, 1906: 21 [Dorylidae]; Bernard, 1951:
1046 [Dorylidae]; Bernard, 1953b: 217 [Dorylidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylinae as subfamily of Dorylidae:
Ashmead, 1905b: 381; Ashmead, 1906: 25. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Mayr,
1865: 16 [Dorylidae]; Emery, 1877a: 70 [Dorylidae]; Forel, 1878: 365 [Dorylidae];
Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 465 [Dorylidae]; André, 1881b: 64 [Dorylidae]; Forel,
1892j: 220 [Dorylidae]; Forel, 1893a: 163; Dalla Torre, 1893: 1; Forel, 1895b:
118 [Dorylidae]; Emery, 1895j: 764 [subfamily spelled Dorylini]; Emery, 1896e:
174; Forel, 1899c: 22; Forel, 1901a: 462; Forel, 1901c: 139; Emery, 1901a: 36;
Bingham, 1903: 1; Emery, 1910b: 3; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137; Arnold, 1915: 110;
Escherich, 1917: 2 [Dorylini]; Forel, 1917: 239; Bondroit, 1918: 14
[Dorylitae]; Wheeler, W.M. 1920: 53; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 632; Clark, 1951: 16;
Brown, 1954e: 28; Borgmeier, 1955: 51; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylinae as dorylomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 36,
147; Brady &amp; Ward, 2005: 593.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylinae as formicoid subfamily of Formicidae: Moreau, Bell, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylinae as formicoid dorylomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Ward,
2007a: 555. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe
of Dorylinae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: Dorylini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe
<span style='color:red'>DORYLINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylida</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Leach, 1815: 147. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylini as tribe of Dorylinae: Forel, 1893a: 163 [Dorylii]; Emery,
1895j: 758 [Dorylii]; Forel, 1901a: 463 [Dorylii]; Emery, 1901a: 36 [Dorylii];
Emery, 1904a: 116 [Dorylii]; Ashmead, 1905b: 381; Ashmead, 1906: 25; Wheeler,
W.M. 1910g: 137 [Dorylii]; Emery, 1910b: 5; Arnold, 1915: 113; Forel, 1917:
239; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 633; Borgmeier, 1955: 57; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
of Dorylini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
(extinct) <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Dorylinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Curticorna</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Fabricius,
1793: 365. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vespa helvola</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylidae: Leach, 1815: 147 [Dorylida]; Shuckard, 1840b: 268;
Smith, F. 1859b: 1; Smith, F. 1871a: 335.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera
of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS</span></i>
include the nominal plus the following.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus

(TYPHLOPONE)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Typhlopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Westwood, 1839: 219.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Typhlopone fulva</i>, by
subsequent designation of Emery, 1895j: 701. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

Shuckard, 1840b: 262.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

[Poneridae]; Mayr, 1862: 714 (in key) [Poneridae]; André, 1874: 170

(footnote) [Dorylidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 465 [Myrmicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify;tab-stops:

lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Dorylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 381.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Typhlopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Westwood, 1839: 219; Shuckard, 1840b: 262; Ashmead,
1905b: 381; Ashmead, 1906: 26.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Typhlopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Labidus</i>:
Shuckard, 1840b: 265. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Typhlopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>:
Dalla Torre, 1893: 9; Bingham, 1903: 1; Brown, 1973b: 185 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Typhlopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 701; Emery, 1910b: 12; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137; Arnold, 1915:
125; Forel, 1917: 239; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 634; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS
(TYPHLOPONE)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cosmaecetes</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Spinola,
1851b: 54. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cosmaecetes
homalinus</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus
juvenculus</i>), by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cosmaecetes</i>
also described as new by Spinola, 1853: 70.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cosmaecetes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Typhlopone</i>:
Smith, F. 1858b: 110; Roger, 1863b: 20; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 465; Emery,
1895j: 723; Emery, 1910b: 12. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>[<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Cosmaegetes</span></i></b>
Dalla Torre, 1893: 9, incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS (RHOGMUS)</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Shuckard,
1840c: 323. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhogmus
fimbriatus</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in Dorylidae:
Shuckard, 1840c: 323; Smith, F. 1859b: 4.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae: Mayr, 1865: 17 [Dorylidae]; Forel, 1878: 365
(footnote) [Dorylidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 8.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Dorylini: Forel, 1893a: 163; Ashmead, 1906: 26.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Shuckard, 1840c: 323; Dalla Torre, 1893: 8; Forel, 1893a:
163; Ashmead, 1906: 26.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 702; Emery, 1910b: 13; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137; Arnold, 1915:
129; Forel, 1917: 239; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 634; all subsequent authors except
the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhogmus</span></i><span

Brown, 1973b: 184 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS (ANOMMA)</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

326. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anomma burmeisteri</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

lang=EN-GB> in Dorylidae: Shuckard, 1840c: 326. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anomma</span></i><span

(footnote) [Dorylidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 8.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anomma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Shuckard, 1840c: 326; Mayr, 1862: 737; Dalla Torre, 1893:
8; Forel, 1893a: 163; Ashmead, 1906: 26; Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional genus].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anomma</span></i><span

Haldeman, 1849a: 201 [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anomma</i>
congeneric with <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>]; Emery,

laevigata</i>), by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:

tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS
(ALAOPONE)</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alaopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1881a:
274. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alaopone oberthueri</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus orientalis</i>),
by subsequent designation of Emery, 1910b: 15. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Typhlopone
carteri</i> Ashmead, 1906: 26, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen
nudum</i> (attributed to Shuckard).]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alaopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Dorylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 381.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alaopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>:
Dalla Torre, 1893: 9; Bingham, 1903: 1. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alaopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1881a: 274; Ashmead, 1905b: 381; Ashmead, 1906:
26.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alaopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 702; Emery, 1910b: 14; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137; Arnold, 1915:
133; Forel, 1917: 239; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 633; Santschi, 1939a: 143; all
subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>DORYLUS
(ALAOPONE)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Shuckardia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery,
1895j: 703 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus atriceps</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Alaopone abeillei</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Ashmead,
1906: 27.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Shuckardia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Dorylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 381.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Shuckardia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Ashmead, 1905b: 381 (raised to genus); Ashmead, 1906: 27.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Shuckardia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dorylus</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 703; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Shuckardia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alaopone</i>:
Emery, 1910b: 14.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Dorylus</span></i>
references</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae
sedis</i> in <span style='color:red'>DORYLINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CURTICORNA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Curticorna</i> Hong, 2002:
537. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Curticorna
leptogastrosa</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Curticorna</i>
in Dorylinae: Hong, 2002: 537. [BB note: definitely not Dorylinae.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY <span style='color:red'>AENICTOGITONINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily
<span style='color:red'>AENICTOGITONINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitonini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 381. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Aenictogiton</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitoninae as tribe of Dorylinae:
Ashmead, 1905b: 381 [Aenictogitonini]; Ashmead, 1906: 25 [Aenictogitonini];
Borgmeier, 1955: 57 [Aenictogitonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitoninae as tribe of Ponerinae:
Brown, 1975: 43 [Aenictogitini]; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79
[Aenictogitini]; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 11 [Aenictogitini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitoninae as subfamily of Formicidae: Baroni Urbani, Bolton
&amp; Ward, 1992: 315; Bolton, 1994: 14; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitoninae as dorylomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton,
2003: 37, 150; Brady &amp; Ward, 2005: 593.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitoninae as formicoid dorylomorph
subfamily of Formicidae: Brady, Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et
al</i>. 2006: 18173; Ward, 2007a: 555. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe
of Aenictogitoninae</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: Aenictogitonini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe
<span style='color:red'>AENICTOGITONINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitonini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 381. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Aenictogiton</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogitonini
as tribe of Dorylinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 381, and see references above. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus</span></b><span lang=EN-GB> of Aenictogitonini: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aenictogiton</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily, tribe <span style='color:red'>Aenictogitonini</span>
and genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Aenictogiton</span></i>
references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1910b: 27
(diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 750 (catalogue); Santschi, 1924b:
200 (all species key); Brown, 1975: 43 (diagnosis, review of genus); Baroni
Urbani, Bolton &amp; Ward, 1992: 315 (phylogeny); Bolton, 1994: 14 (synopsis);
Bolton, 1995a: 1038 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 58 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 37,
150 (diagnosis, synopsis); Brady &amp; Ward, 2005: 593 (phylogeny); Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173
(phylogeny); Ward, 2007a: 555 (classification). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-right:-1.25pt;text-align:justify;tab-stops:
6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
of <span style='color:red'>Aenictogitonini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>AENICTOGITON</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery,
1901d: 49. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aenictogiton
fossiceps</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Aenictogitonini: Ashmead, 1905b: 381.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae,
Dorylini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Ecitonini: Emery, 1910b: 27 [Ecitini]; Forel, 1917:
240; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 636; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 620.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Aenictogitonini: Brown, 1975: 43; Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 11.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton
incertae sedis</span></i><span lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae: Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1985: 259.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aenictogiton</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Aenictogitoninae, Aenictogitonini: Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp;
Ward, 1992: 315; Bolton, 1994: 14; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-1.25pt;margin-bottom:
0in;margin-left:.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
tab-stops:6.25in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Aenictogiton</span></i>
references</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>THE ECTAHETEROMORPHS: SUBFAMILIES ECTATOMMINAE AND
HETEROPONERINAE<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY
<span style='color:red'>ECTATOMMINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>ECTATOMMINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ectatommii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895j: 767. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ectatomminae as poneromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003:
45, 172.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ectatomminae as formicoid subfamily of Formicidae: Ouelette, Fisher,
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 365; Moreau, Bell, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ectatomminae as formicoid ectaheteromorph subfamily of Formicidae:
Ward, 2007a: 556.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes of Ectatomminae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Ectatommini, Typhlomyrmecini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Ectatomminae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Canapone</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span style='color:red'>Ectatomminae</span>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

45, 172 (diagnosis, synopsis); Ouelette, Fisher, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102 (phylogeny); Brady, Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173 (phylogeny); Ward, 2007a: 556 (classification).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>ECTATOMMINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ectatommii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895j: 767. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ectatommini as tribe of Pachycondylinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ectatommini as tribe of Ponerinae: Emery, 1895j: 767 [Ectatommii];
Emery, 1901a: 36 [Ectatommii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134 [Ectatommii]; Emery,
1911d: 30; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 33; Forel, 1917: 236; Gallardo, 1918b: 7;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 638; Brown, 1958g: 175; Kusnezov, 1964: 50; Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 10; Jaffe, 1993: 8; Bolton, 1994: 164. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ectatommini as tribe of Ectatomminae: Bolton, 2003: 46.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <span
style='color:red'>ECTATOMMINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Stictoponerini</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Arnol'di, 1930d: 161.
Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stictoponera</i> (junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Gnamptogenys</i>).</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Stictoponerini as subtribe of Ectatommini: Arnol'di, 1930d: 161.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Stictoponerini as junior synonym of Ectatommini: Taylor, 1980c: 354;
Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003: 46.</span></p>

Ectatommini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma,
Gnamptogenys, Rhytidoponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Gnamptogenys</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1863a: 174.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera tornata</i>, by
subsequent designation of Emery, 1911d: 44. </span></p>

lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma
concinna</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 164;
see Emery, 1912d: 271 and Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 79.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Holcoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Emery, 1911d: 40;
Forel, 1917: 236; Gallardo, 1918b: 21; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 643; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Holcoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma</i>:
Mayr, 1887: 540; Dalla Torre, 1893: 23; Emery, 1895j: 767; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
135.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Holcoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1902a: 181; Emery, 1911d: 40; Forel, 1917: 236;
Gallardo, 1918b: 21; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 643; Borgmeier, 1923: 55; Santschi,
1929h: 437; Kusnezov, 1956: 14.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Holcoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of Gnamptogenys: Brown, 1958g: 211; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Alfaria</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1896e: 177 (diagnosis
in key). Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alfaria simulans</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alfaria</i> also described as
new by Emery, 1896g: 41.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alfaria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Forel, 1899c: 3.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Alfaria</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Ectatommini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d:
46; Forel, 1917: 236; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 642; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

Brown, 1958g: 211; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Gnamptogenys</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 19
(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 422 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 15 (diagnosis); Mayr,
1870b: 963 (all species key); Mayr, 1887: 540 (diagnosis); Emery, 1889b: 494 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma (Stictoponera)</i> species key);
Emery, 1896g: 43, 44 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>G. (Holcoponera),
G. (Gnamptogenys)</i> species keys; Forel, 1900d: 316 (India &amp; Sri Lanka
species key); Bingham, 1903: 82 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma species key);
Emery, 1911d: 34 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalopone</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 40 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Holcoponera</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 43 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma
(Poneracantha)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 44 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma (Parectatomma)</i> &amp; <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>E. (Gnamptogenys)</i> diagnoses,
catalogues); Emery, 1911d: 46 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Emeryella</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 46 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alfaria</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 47 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stictoponera</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Gallardo, 1918b: 22, 42 (Argentina species key); Mann,
1919: 286 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Wheeleripone</i> species key);
Wheeler, W.M. 1924b: 240 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Rhopalopone</i>
species key); Santschi, 1929h: 471 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Holcoponera</i>
species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 26, 29 (Asia <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Rhopalopone, Stictoponera</i> checklists); Brown, 1954h: 1 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>G. coxalis</i> group species); Brown, 1956:
489 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Holcoponera</i> species notes);
Brown, 1958g: 211 (revision of genus, all species keys); Brown, 1958g: 230 (New
World species revision, key); Brown, 1958g: 237 (Old World species revision,
key); Kempf, 1972a: 111 (Neotropical catalogue); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1337 (North
America catalogue); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 30 (Australia catalogue);
Taylor, 1987a: 28 (Australia checklist); Brandão &amp; Lattke, 1990: 489 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Alfaria</i> group, status); Lattke, 1990b:
22 (Venezuela species key); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 10 (synoptic
classification); Brandão, 1991: 344 (Neotropical catalogue); Lattke, 1992a: 123
(<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>G. minuta</i> group, key); Bolton,
1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 208 (catalogue); Lattke, 1995: 149 (New
World species revision, key); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 36 (China species key);
Xu &amp; Zhang, 1996: 56 (China species key); Shattuck, 1999: 185 (Australia
synopsis); Zhou, 2001b: 31 (China, Guangxi species key); Lattke, 2004: 51 (Old
World species revision, key); Lattke, Fernández &amp; Palacio, 2007: 257 (New
World species key); Lattke, Fernández, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et
al</i>. 2008: 68 (Colombia species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>RHYTIDOPONERA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Rhytidoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 731 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma</i>]. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera araneoides</i>, by subsequent
designation of Emery, 1911d: 37. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera
metallica</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 172;
see Emery, 1912d: 271 and Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 79.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhytidoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Ectatommini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Emery, 1911d: 26;
Forel, 1917: 236; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 643; all subsequent authors to the
following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Ectatomminae, Ectatommini: Bolton, 2003: 46.</span></p>

Roger, 1863b: 17.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY
<span style='color:red'>HETEROPONERINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>HETEROPONERINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Bolton, 2003: 46, 176. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Heteroponera</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerini Jaffe, 1993: 8 [as tribe of Ponerinae]. Unavailable
name; proposed without diagnosis. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerini Fernández, Palacio, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 1996: 362 [as tribe of Ponerinae]. Unavailable name;
proposed without diagnosis. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerinae as poneromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton,
2003: 46, 176.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerinae as formicoid subfamily of Formicidae: Ouelette,
Fisher, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 365; Moreau,
Bell, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerinae
as formicoid ectaheteromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Ward, 2007a: 556.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe of Heteroponerinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Heteroponerini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Bolton, 2003:
46, 176 (diagnosis, synopsis); Ouellette, Fisher <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 359 (phylogeny); Moreau, Bell, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102 (phylogeny); Brady, Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173 (phylogeny); Ward, 2007a: 556 (classification);
Fernández &amp; Arias-Penna, 2008: 31 (Neotropical genera key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>HETEROPONERINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Bolton, 2003: 46. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heteroponera</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponerini
as tribe of Heteroponerinae: Bolton, 2003: 47.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Heteroponerini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthoponera, Heteroponera</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'> incertae sedis</i> in Heteroponerini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>:<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> Aulacopone</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>See under</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'>Ectatommini</span></b>
and general references under <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>PONERINAE</b>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Heteroponerini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ACANTHOPONERA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acanthoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 732 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma</i>]. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera mucronata</i>, by subsequent
designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 158. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Ectatommini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Emery, 1911d: 35;
Forel, 1917: 236; Gallardo, 1918b: 16; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 643; all subsequent
authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Heteroponerinae, Heteroponerini: Bolton, 2003: 47, 177.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ectatomma</i>:
Mayr, 1862: 732; Roger, 1863b: 17; Mayr, 1863: 394; Mayr, 1887: 540; Dalla
Torre, 1893: 23; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1895g: 346; Emery, 1911d: 35; Forel, 1917: 236;
Gallardo, 1918b: 16; Wheeler, W.M. 1923e: 179; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 619;
Kusnezov, 1956: 13; Brown, 1958g: 188; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Acanthoponera</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1887: 540
(diagnosis); Emery, 1911d: 35 (diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1923e: 190
(all species key); Brown, 1958g: 188 (review of genus &amp; species); Kempf,
1972a: 9 (catalogue); Kugler, C. 1991: 155 (sting structure); Bolton, 1995b: 53
(catalogue); Arias-Penna &amp; Fernández, 2008: 111 (all species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>HETEROPONERA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1887: 532.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heteroponera carinifrons</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 43.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Pachycondylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Emery, 1911d: 35; Forel, 1917: 236; all
subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Heteroponerinae, Heteroponerini: Bolton, 2003: 47, 177.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthoponera</i>:
Forel, 1917: 236. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthoponera</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 767; Emery, 1911d: 35; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 643; Wheeler, 1923e:
179.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Brown, 1952h: 70; Kusnezov, 1956: 13; Brown, 1958g: 194;
all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>HETEROPONERA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paranomopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1915c:
117. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paranomopone relicta</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paranomopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Forel, 1917: 236; Emery, 1919c: 106;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 642; Wheeler, W.M. 1930f: 13; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 681.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paranomopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heteroponera</i>:
Brown, in Borgmeier, 1957: 112; Brown, 1958g: 194; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anacanthoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1923e:
176 (in text) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthoponera</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera dolo</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anacanthoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heteroponera</i>:
Brown, 1952h: 70; Brown, 1958g: 194; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Heteroponera</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dalla Torre,
1893: 43 (catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 35 (diagnosis, catalogue as part of
Acanthoponera); Wheeler, W.M. 1923e: 190 (all species key as part of
Acanthoponera); Brown, 1958g: 194, 196 (review of genus, Australia-New Zealand
species key, New World species key); Brown, 1958h: 17 (New Zealand species);
Kempf, 1962a: 31 (Neotropical species key); Kempf, 1972a: 117 (Neotropical
catalogue); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 30 (Australia catalogue); Taylor,
1987a: 28 (Australia, New Zealand checklist); Fernández, 1993: 250 (Colombia
species key); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 212 (catalogue);
Shattuck, 1999: 186 (Australia synopsis); Arias-Penna &amp; Fernández, 2008:
113 (Neotropical species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae
sedis</i> in <span style='color:red'>Heteroponerini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>AULACOPONE</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aulacopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Arnol'di, 1930a: 139.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aulacopone relicta</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aulacopone</i> also described
as new by Arnol'di, 1930d: 159.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aulacopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ectatommini: Arnol'di, 1930a: 143; all subsequent
authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aulacopone incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Heteroponerinae, Heteroponerini: Bolton, 2003: 47.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Aulacopone</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Brown, 1958g:
206 (review of genus); Taylor, 1980c: 353 (review of genus); Lattke, 1994: 113
(notes).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

  <w:DisplayVerticalDrawingGridEvery>0</w:DisplayVerticalDrawingGridEvery>
  <w:UseMarginsForDrawingGridOrigin/>
  <w:ValidateAgainstSchemas/>
  <w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>false</w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>
  <w:IgnoreMixedContent>false</w:IgnoreMixedContent>
  <w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>false</w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>
  <w:Compatibility>
   <w:FootnoteLayoutLikeWW8/>
   <w:ShapeLayoutLikeWW8/>
   <w:AlignTablesRowByRow/>
   <w:ForgetLastTabAlignment/>
   <w:DoNotUseHTMLParagraphAutoSpacing/>
   <w:LayoutRawTableWidth/>
   <w:LayoutTableRowsApart/>
   <w:UseWord97LineBreakingRules/>
   <w:UseNormalStyleForList/>
   <w:DontUseIndentAsNumberingTabStop/>
   <w:FELineBreak11/>
   <w:WW11IndentRules/>
   <w:DontAutofitConstrainedTables/>
   <w:AutofitLikeWW11/>
   <w:UnderlineTabInNumList/>
   <w:HangulWidthLikeWW11/>
  </w:Compatibility>
 </w:WordDocument>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <w:LatentStyles DefLockedState="false" LatentStyleCount="276">
 </w:LatentStyles>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";}

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>

 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
