lang=EN-GB>Moellerius</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893e: 589 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta (Acromyrmex) landolti</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 167. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oecodoma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Poneridae, Attidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 180.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oecodoma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Roger, 1863b: 35. [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i> and <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oecodoma</i> share the same type-species,
synonymy is therefore absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Archeatta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Gonçalves, 1942: 342 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oecodoma mexicana</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Archeatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Gonçalves, 1942: 342; Borgmeier, 1959b: 350; Kempf, 1972a: 27. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Archeatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Smith, M.R. 1951a: 832; Weber, 1958a: 8; Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional];

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica sexdens</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neoatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Gonçalves, 1942: 346; Borgmeier, 1959b: 358; Kempf, 1972a: 27.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neoatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Weber, 1958a: 8; Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Palaeatta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Borgmeier, 1950d: 244 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta bisphaerica</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Palaeatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Borgmeier, 1950d: 244; Borgmeier, 1959b: 377; Kempf, 1972a: 28. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Palaeatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Weber, 1958a: 8; Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Epiatta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Borgmeier, 1950d: 246 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oecodoma laevigata</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYCETOSORITIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mycetosoritis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1907c:
714 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta (Mycetosoritis)
hartmanni</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycetosoritis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Attini: Emery, 1913b: 251; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 669;
Emery, 1924d: 343; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycetosoritis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1907c: 670; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 141.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycetosoritis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cyphomyrmex</i>:
Emery, 1913b: 251; Forel, 1917: 247; Emery, 1924d: 343; Donisthorpe, 1943f:
663; Kusnezov, 1949d: 444; Kusnezov, 1956: 23. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycetosoritis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trachymyrmex</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 669. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycetosoritis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Creighton, 1950a: 317; Kempf, 1972a: 146.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Mycetosoritis</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Kempf, 1972a:
146 (catalogue); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1410 (North America catalogue); Bolton, 1994:
105 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 269
(catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYCOCEPURUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mycocepurus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893e: 602 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta (Mycocepurus) smithii</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 167. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mycocepurus</i> Forel, 1893a:
164, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>. <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mycocepurus</i> also described as new by
Forel, 1893g: 369.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycocepurus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893g: 369.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycocepurus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Cryptoceridae, Dacetonini: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycocepurus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Attini: Emery, 1895j: 770; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 141;
Emery, 1913b: 251; Emery, 1914a: 42; Forel, 1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
669; Emery, 1924d: 334; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycocepurus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Forel, 1893e: 602; Forel, 1893g: 369; Wheeler, W.M. 1907c: 670; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 141.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mycocepurus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 167; Emery, 1913b: 251; Forel, 1917:
247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 669; Emery, 1924d: 334; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Mycetopurus</span></i>
Santschi, 1925b: 17, incorrect subsequent spelling. (Perhaps a combination in
error of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myceto</i>(phylax) + (Mycoce)<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>purus</i>: Bolton, 1995b: 36).]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYCOCEPURUS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Descolemyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kusnezov, 1951d: 460.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Descolemyrma ogloblini</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mycocepurus goeldii</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

(diagnosis in key). Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sericomyrmex

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sericomyrmex</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sericomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1865: 18 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 150.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sericomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Cryptoceridae, Attinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sericomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Attini: Forel, 1893a: 164; Emery, 1895j: 770; Forel,
1899c: 37; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 141; Emery, 1913b: 251; Emery, 1914a: 42;
Forel, 1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 669; Emery, 1924d; 338; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Sericomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dalla Torre,
1893: 150 (catalogue); Forel, 1912e: 191 (all species key); Wheeler, W.M.
1916c: 10 (all species key); Emery, 1924d; 338 (diagnosis, catalogue); Kempf,
1972a: 229 (catalogue); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic classification); Bolton,
1995a: 1052 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 382 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>TRACHYMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Trachymyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893e: 600 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta septentrionalis</i>, by subsequent
designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 174. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Cryptoceridae, Attinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 384.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Attini: Emery, 1895j: 770; Emery, 1913b: 251; Forel,
1917: 247; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 669; Emery, 1924d: 344; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trachymyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Forel, 1893e: 600 Emery, 1895j: 770; Forel, 1893e: 600; Forel, 1899c: 30;
Wheeler, W.M. 1907c: 670; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 141.</span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trachymyrmex</span></i><span

Emery, 1913b: 251; Emery, 1924d: 344; Donisthorpe, 1943g: 733.</span></p>

Forel, 1917: 247. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

1916c: 11; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 669; Borgmeier, 1927c: 128; Borgmeier, 1950b:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Attini<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

112. Included ichnospecies: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Attaichnus
kuenzelii</i>. [Ichnofossil, purportedly fossil traces of workings attributable
to attine ants.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Stenammini as subtribe of Myrmicini: Emery, 1924d: 357.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='color:red'>STENAMMINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Proattini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1917: 232. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proatta</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proattini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1917: 232; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 658.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proattini as subtribe of Attini: Emery, 1924d: 333.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proattini as junior synonym of Stenammini: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Calyptomyrmecini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Calyptomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Calyptomyrmecini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva,
1988: 80. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Calyptomyrmecini as junior synonym of Stenammini: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Stenammini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ancyridris, Austromorium, Bariamyrma,
Calyptomyrmex, Cyphoidris, Dacatria, Dacetinops, Dicroaspis, Indomyrma,
Lachnomyrmex, Lasiomyrma, Lordomyrma, Proatta, Propodilobus, Rogeria,
Rostromyrmex, Stenamma, Tetheamyrma, Vollenhovia</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>incertae sedis</i></span></b><span lang=EN-GB> in Stenammini: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>*Ilemomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1921f: 52
(diagnosis, catalogue); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synoptic classification); Bolton,

Bolton, 1995b: 168.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Dacetinops</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Taylor, 1985: 49 (all species revision, key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>DICROASPIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dicroaspis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1908b: 184.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dicroaspis cryptocera</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dicroaspis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Meranoplini: Forel, 1917: 244; Arnold, 1917: 362;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 225; Wheeler, W.M. 1934a: 176; Wheeler,
W.M. 1935a: 7 (in key); Donisthorpe, 1943f: 639.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dicroaspis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Calyptomyrmecini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dicroaspis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dicroaspis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calyptomyrmex</i>:
Emery, 1915g: 15; Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 887; Donisthorpe,
1943f: 639; Emery, 1924d: 225. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dicroaspis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Calyptomyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1908b: 184; Arnold, 1917: 362; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 664; Wheeler, W.M. 1935a: 7; Bolton, 1981a: 56.</span></p>

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Prodicroaspis</span></i><span

Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 223; Wheeler, W.M. 1934a: 176; Wheeler,
W.M. 1935a: 6 (in key); all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Lordomyrma</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1919f: 98 (diagnosis, all species key); Emery, 1924d: 223 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Prodicroaspis</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1924d: 223 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Promeranoplus</i> diagnosis, catalogue);
Emery, 1924d: 238 (diagnosis, catalogue); Donisthorpe, 1941a: 37 (all species
key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 116 (Asia checklist); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R.
1985: 65 (Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 37, 65, 66 (Australia, New
Caledonia checklists); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 248
(catalogue); Kugler, C. 1997: 193 (sting structure); Shattuck, 1999: 137
(Australia synopsis); Sarnat, 2006: 13 (Fiji Is species, key); Taylor, 2009: 16
(notes on synonyms).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PROATTA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proatta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912m: 768.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proatta butteli</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proatta</i> also described as
new by Forel, 1913k: 84.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Proatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Proattini: Forel, 1917: 246; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
668; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Proatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Attini: Emery, 1913b: 251; Emery, 1914a: 42; Emery,
1924d: 333 [subtribe Proattini]; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 686; Chapman &amp; Capco,
1951: 83.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Proatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Bolton, 1994: 106; Bolton, 1995a: 1052;
Bolton, 1995b: 366.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tetheamyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bolton, 1991: 9.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetheamyrma subspongia</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetheamyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Bolton, 1994: 106; Bolton, 1995a: 1053;
Bolton, 1995b: 403.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>VOLLENHOVIA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1865: 21.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vollenhovia punctatostriata</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Pheidolidae: Emery, 1877a: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1865: 21 [Myrmicidae] Dalla Torre, 1893: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
139; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 51.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmecinini: Emery, 1912b: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Emery, 1914a: 41 [subtribe
Monomoriini] Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 163; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662; all
subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Ettershank, 1966: 81; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988:
81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Metaponini: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16;
Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Bolton, 2003: 59.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>VOLLENHOVIA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>Vollenhovenia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB>
Dalla Torre, 1893: 61, unjustified subsequent emendation of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vollenhovia</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Vollenhovenia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vollenhovia</i>:
Forel, 1893a: 166; Emery, 1922e: 163.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Propodomyrma</i></b> Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 163 (by indication).
Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Propodomyrma samlandica</i>
(junior synonym of *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Macromischa beyrichi</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Propodomyrma</i> Wheeler,
W.M. 1908g: 413, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Propodomyrma</i> as junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vollenhovia</i>: Wheeler, W.M.
1915h: 51; Emery, 1922e: 163.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Vollenhovia rufiventris</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

(diagnosis); Dalla Torre, 1893: 61 (catalogue); Bingham, 1903: 213 (diagnosis);

catalogue); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 135, 169, 174 (Asia <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Aratromyrmex, Vollenhovia, Dyomorium</i> checklists); Ettershank, 1966:
146 (diagnosis, review of genus, checklist); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 92
(Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 80 (Australia, New Caledonia checklist);
Taylor, 1991db: 612 (Australia species key); Morisita, Kubota, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1992: 48 (Japan species key);
Bolton, 1995a: 1053 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 422 (catalogue); Wu, J. &amp;
Wang, 1995: 106 (China species key); Terayama &amp; Kinomura, 1997: 1 (Japan
species key); Shattuck, 1999: 171 (Australia synopsis); Terayama, 2009: 147
(Taiwan species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmecini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Fernández, 2004b: 325. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Adelomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmecini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Fernández, 2004b: 325.</span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Adelomyrmecini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adelomymex, Baracidris,
Cryptomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ADELOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1897c: 590.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adelomyrmex biroi</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Emery, 1914a: 42; Forel, 1917: 245;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 268; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 620; Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 110; Kempf, 1972a: 18; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985:
257; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; Jaffe, 1993: 11.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmex incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Bolton, 2003: 59.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adelomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Adelomyrmecini: Fernández, 2004b: 326.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ADELOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apsychomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1910a:
261. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Apsychomyrmex myops</i>,
by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apsychomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Emery, 1914a: 42; Forel, 1917: 245;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 268; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 624.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apsychomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of Adelomyrmex: Kempf, 1972a: 18.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Arctomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mann, 1921: 457 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adelomyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adelomyrmex (Arctomyrmex)
hirsutus</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Arctomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adelomyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional]; Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Adelomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1924d:
268 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Apsychomyrmex</i> &amp; <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adelomyrmex</i> diagnoses, catalogues);
Smith, M.R. 1947b: 469 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Apsychomyrmex</i>
species key); Kempf, 1972a: 18 (Neotropical catalogue); Brown, 1973b: 178
(checklist); Brandão, 1991: 324 (catalogue); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synopsis);
Bolton, 1995a: 1047 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 58 (catalogue); Fernández &amp;
MacKay, 2003: 595 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. laevigatus</i>
complex, key); Fernández, 2003b: 11 (diagnosis, all species revision, key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Baracidris meketra</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

CRYPTOMYRMEX</span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Solenopsisii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893a: 164. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Solenopsidini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893a: 164
[Solenopsisii]; Emery, 1895j: 769 [Solenopsidii]; Forel, 1899c: 79
[Solenopsidii]; Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140 [Solenopsidii];
Emery, 1914a: 37; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 46 [Solenopsidiini]; Arnold, 1916: 203;
Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 158; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 670; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

style='color:red'>SOLENOPSIDINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Pheidologetini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Emery, 1914a: 38; Arnold,
1916: 248; Forel, 1917: 243; Emery, 1922e: 206; Emery, 1924d: 207; Bolton,

lang=EN-GB>*Hypopomyrmiciti as junior synonym of Pheidologetini: Brown &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adlerzia, Allomerus,
Anillomyrma, Bondroitia, Carebara, Carebarella, Diplomorium, Dolopomyrmex,

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Solenopsidini</span></b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Solenopsidini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1895j:
769 (diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140 (diagnosis); Emery, 1914a: 37, 38, 41
(diagnoses (in key), synoptic classification); Forel, 1917: 242 (synoptic
classification); Emery, 1922e: 158, 206 (Solenopsidini diagnosis, genera key,
catalogue; Pheidologetini diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 670 (genera key);
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 862, 1026 (Afrotropical, Malagasy catalogues); Emery,
1924d: 207 (Pheidologetini genera key, catalogue); Kusnezov, 1957a: 267
(Neotropical genera key); Ettershank, 1966: 73 (review of Solenopsidini, genera
diagnoses); Ettershank, 1966: 115 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidologeton</i>
group review); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 55 (larvae, review &amp;
synthesis); Kugler, C. 1978a: 455 (sting structure); Kugler, C. 1986: 221 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidologeton</i> group sting structure);
Bolton, 1987: 263 (diagnosis, review of tribe, genera key); Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 80 (synoptic classification); Brandão, 1991: 390 (Neotropical,
synoptic classification); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a:
1041 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 14, 15 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 60, 207
(diagnosis, synopsis); Fernández, 2003d: 322 (Neotropical genera).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Solenopsidini<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ADLERZIA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1902h: 445 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium (Adlerzia)
froggatti</i>, by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Forel, 1917: 242 [subtribe
Monomoriini]; Emery, 1922e: 182; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Brown, 1952j: 176; Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1985: 257; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidologetini: Bolton, 1994: 106
[Pheidologetonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Bolton, 2003: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Forel, 1902h: 445; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139; Emery, 1915i: 190; Forel, 1917:
242; Emery, 1922e: 182; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 676; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 620.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Adlerzia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Brown, 1952j: 176; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 53;
Taylor, 1987a: 5; Bolton, 1995a: 1047; Bolton, 1995b: 58.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ADLERZIA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Stenothorax</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> McAreavey, 1949: 3.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stenothorax katerinae</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium (Adlerzia)
froggatti</i>), by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Stenothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adlerzia</i>:
Brown, 1952a: 110.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Adlerzia</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1922e:
182 (diagnosis, catalogue); Brown, 1952j: 173 (review of genus); Taylor &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ALLOMERUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Allomerus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1878: 873.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Allomerus decemarticulatus</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 158. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Allomerus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Forel, 1895b: 125; Emery, 1895j: 769.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Allomerus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81; in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ANILLOMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anillomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1913b: 261 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium decamerum</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81; in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Monomoriini]; Emery, 1922e: 184; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16; Bolton,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>BONDROITIA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bondroitia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1911c: 300
(footnote) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium (Martia) coecum</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Diplomorium lujae</i>),
by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bondroitia</i> also described

by Forel, 1911d: 398; see discussion in Bolton, 1987: 275.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Carebara lignata</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oligomyrmex concinnus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 74.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oligomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oligomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Forel, 1893a: 164; Emery, 1895j: 770;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 663; Kempf, 1972a: 172; Smith,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oligomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidologeton</i>
genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81; Bolton, 1987: 265.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oligomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidologetini: Emery, 1914a: 41; Forel, 1917: 243;
Emery, 1924d: 215; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson,
1990: 16; Bolton, 1994: 106 [Pheidologetonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oligomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Bolton, 2003: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oligomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Carebara</i>:
Fernández, 2004a: 194.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aeromyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1891b: 198.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aeromyrma nosindambo</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aeromyrma</i> also described
as new by Forel, 1891a: cccvii; no species-rank taxa named.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aeromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 663.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aeromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidologetini: Emery, 1914a: 41; Arnold, 1916: 256;
Forel, 1917: 243; Emery, 1924d: 215; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aeromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Forel, 1891b: 198; Arnold, 1916: 256; Forel, 1917: 243;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 663, 882. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aeromyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oligomyrmex</i>:
Emery, 1915c: 59 (footnote); Emery, 1924d: 215; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 620. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aeromyrma</span></i><span

subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 158. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sporocleptes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aneleus</i>:
Consani, 1951: 169; Arnold, 1952a: 460.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sporocleptes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Carebara</i>:
Fernández, 2004a: 194.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Nimbamyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bernard, 1953b: 240.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nimbamyrma villiersi</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

DOLOPOMYRMEX</span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

2007: 90. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dolopomyrmex
pilatus</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Dolopomyrmex</span></i>
Fisher &amp; Cover, 2007: 83. Unavailable name.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dolopomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Cover &amp; Deyrup, 2007: 90.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>FORMOSIMYRMA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formosimyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Terayama, 2009: 158.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formosimyrma lanuyensis</i>,
by origional designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formosimyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Terayama, 2009: 158.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MACHOMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1895f: 425 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Liomyrmex</i>]. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Liomyrmex (Machomyrma) dispar</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Emery, 1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241;
Emery, 1921f: 76 [subtribe Stenammini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; subsequent
authors to Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16, except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidologetini: Bolton, 1994: 106
[Pheidologetonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Bolton, 2003: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Liomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1895f: 425.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Machomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1896e: 184; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139; Emery,
1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 76; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mayriella</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1902h: 452.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mayriella abstinens</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Megalomyrmex leoninus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

bituberculata</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Wheeler, W.M. 1911f:
167.]</span></p>

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Megalomyrmex</i>].

by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Monomorium</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1855: 452.

(replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium minutum</i>,
junior secondary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Phacota</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Emery, 1914a: 41 [subtribe
Monomoriini]; Forel, 1917: 243; Emery, 1922e: 187; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662;
all subsequent authors except the entry below; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990:
16; Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Phacota</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>
genus group: Bolton, 1987: 271.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Phacota</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Bolton, 1987: 281.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Phacota</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Ettershank, 1966: 82; Fernández, in Heterick, 2006: 79; Fernández, 2007b: 130. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Trichomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1865: 19.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trichomyrmex rogeri</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trichomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trichomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1865: 19 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 72.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trichomyrmex</span></i><span

Monomoriini]; Forel, 1917: 243; Emery, 1922e: 185; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662;
Donisthorpe, 1943g: 733.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Ettershank, 1966: 82; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1381; Bolton, 1987: 296.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Lampromyrmex</i></b> Mayr, 1868c: 93. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium mayrianum</i> (replacement name
for *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lampromyrmex gracillimus</i>, junior

monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lampromyrmex</i> in Myrmicinae,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
