<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1914f: 410 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium (Chelaner)
forcipatum</i>, by subsequent designation of Emery, 1922e: 168. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Forel, 1917: 242 [subtribe
Monomoriini]; Emery, 1922e: 168; all subsequent authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>
genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Monomoriini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Emery, 1914f: 410; Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 168; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
676.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Ettershank, 1966: 93; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 55;
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80
(anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chelaner</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> (and its junior synonyms <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Notomyrmex,
Protholcomyrmex, Schizopelta</i>) as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Monomorium</i>: Bolton, 1987: 300; Heterick, 2001: 354.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Notomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1915i: 190 [as
subgenus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>of</i> Monomorium].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta antarctica</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Notomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Emery, 1915i: 190; Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 168; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
676; Kusnezov, 1956: 20.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Notomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Kusnezov, 1957a: 269 (in key); Kusnezov, 1960b: 343;
Kusnezov, 1962b: 160; Kusnezov, 1964: 60.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Notomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chelaner</i>:
Ettershank, 1966: 93.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Parholcomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1915i: 190 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica gracillima</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta destructor</i>),
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Emery, 1915i: 190; Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 179; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
676; subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nothidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Megalomyrmex</i>
genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81; in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>
genus group: Bolton, 1987: 271.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nothidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Megalomyrmecini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nothidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Kempf, 1972a: 165; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 16; Jaffe, 1993: 10; Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nothidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Fernández, in Heterick, 2006: 79; Fernández, 2007b: 130. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pharaophanes</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bernard, 1967: 168
(attributed to Santschi) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica pharaonis</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pharaophanes</i> Bernard,
1953b: 238 (attributed to Santschi) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Monomorium</i>]. Unavailable name; proposed without designation of
type-species. Species included by Bernard (1953) are all referable to <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>: Bolton, 1987: 288; Bolton,
1995b: 42 (see also note in Baroni Urbani, 1971c: 90).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pharaophanes</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 213.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Antichthonidris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Snelling, 1975: 5.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium denticulatum</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Antichthonidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>
genus group: Bolton, 1987: 271.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Antichthonidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16;
Jaffe, 1993: 10; Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Heterick, 2001: 361.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epelysidris brocha</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>OXYEPOECUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Oxyepoecus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1926d: 6.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oxyepoecus bruchi</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oxyepoecus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 679.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oxyepoecus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>
genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81; Bolton, 1987: 271.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oxyepoecus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Kusnezov, 1957a: 269; Kusnezov,
1962b: 160; Kusnezov, 1964: 61; Kempf, 1972a: 173; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva,
1988: 80; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16; Jaffe, 1993: 10; Bolton, 1994:
106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>OXYEPOECUS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Forelifidis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Smith, M.R. 1954a: 17. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Martia</i>
Forel, 1907a: 20; junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Martia</i>
Ragonot, 1887: 18 (Lepidoptera).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Forelifidis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oxyepoecus</i>:
Brown, 1955b: 68.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Forelifidis</i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Martia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1907a: 20 [as subgenus
of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium (Martia) vezenyii</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Martia</i>
Ragonot, 1887: 18 (Lepidoptera).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Martia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium</i>:
Forel, 1907a: 20; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139; Emery, 1915i: 190; Forel, 1917:
242; Emery, 1922e: 182; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 676; subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Oxyepoecus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1922e:
182 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium (Martia)</i> diagnosis,
catalogue); Borgmeier, 1927b: 65 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium
(Martia)</i> all species key); Kusnezov, 1952h: 720 (Argentina species key);
Ettershank, 1966: 144 (diagnosis, review of genus, checklist); Kempf, 1972a:
173 (catalogue); Kempf, 1974b: 510 (diagnosis, all species revision, key);
Bolton, 1987: 286 (notes); Brandão, 1991: 364 (catalogue); Bolton, 1995a: 1051
(census); Bolton, 1995b: 301 (catalogue); Albuquerque &amp; Brandão, 2004: 55 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>O. vezenyii</i> group revision, key);
Albuquerque &amp; Brandão, 2009: 292 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>O.
rastraus</i> group revision, all species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:black'>Genus</span><span lang=EN-GB style='color:red'>
PARVIMYRMA</span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Parvimyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Eguchi &amp; Bui, 2007:
40. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Parvimyrma sangi</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>
genus group: Eguchi &amp; Bui, 2007: 40.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PHEIDOLOGETON</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pheidologeton</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 750.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oecodoma diversa</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 160. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pheidologeton</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

pachycerus</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Octella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oligomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1917: 243; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 687; Emery, 1924d: 218.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Octella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oligomyrmex</i>:
Ettershank, 1966: 119. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>:
Taylor, 1991db: 611.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Synsolenopsis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1918b: 155 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>]. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis (Synsolenopsis) bruchi </i>(junior
primary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>,
replaced by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis bruchiella</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Synsolenopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>:
Forel, 1918b: 155; Emery, 1922e: 196. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Synsolenopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Creighton, 1930b: 41 (in text); Kusnezov, 1953c: 341;
Kusnezov, 1957a: 272; Kusnezov, 1962b: 160; Kusnezov, 1964: 61. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Synsolenopsis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>:
Ettershank, 1966: 134.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Diagyne</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1923c: 268 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis succinea</i> by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Diagyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 638.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>:
Santschi, 1923c: 268; Creighton, 1930b: 42; Kusnezov, 1962b: 160.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Solenopsis</i>:
Ettershank, 1966: 134.</span></p>

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bisolenopsis</i> species key); Buren, 1972:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tranopelta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1866a: 512.

monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tranopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Bolton, 2003: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Tranopelta</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dalla Torre,
1893: 74 (catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 192 (diagnosis, catalogue); Ettershank,
1966: 107 (diagnosis, review of genus, checklist); Kempf, 1972a: 255
(catalogue); Bolton, 1987: 266 (affinities); Bolton, 1995a: 1053 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 421 (catalogue); Fernández, 2003c: 646 (all species revision,
key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>TROPIDOMYRMEX</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tropidomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Silva, Feitosa, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2009: 34. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tropidomyrmex elianae</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tropidomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Silva, Feitosa, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2009: 46.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in <span
style='color:red'>Solenopsidini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>HYPOPOMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Hypopomyrmex</i></b> Emery, 1891a: 148. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex bombiccii</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 145.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Dacetini: Forel, 1892d: 344; Forel, 1893a: 164; Donisthorpe, 1943f:
652; Brown, 1948e: 102.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Dacetini, subtribe Hypopomyrmiciti: Brown, 1952g: 10 (footnote).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Pheidologetini: Brown &amp; Carpenter, 1979: 422; Bolton, 1994: 106
[Pheidologetonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex incertae sedis</i>
in Myrmicinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypopomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Bolton, 2003: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Hypopomyrmex</span></i>
references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Brown &amp; Carpenter, 1979: 422 (genus reassessment).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>OXYIDRIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Oxyidris</i></b> Wilson, 1985a: 5. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Oxyidris antillana</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oxyidris incertae sedis</i>
in Myrmicinae: Wilson, 1985a: 2.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oxyidris</i> in Myrmicinae,
Solenopsidini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80; Bolton, 2003: 61.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oxyidris</i> in Myrmicinae,
Pheidologetini: Bolton, 1994: 106 [Pheidologetonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>MYRMICINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmicites</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 169. Type-genus: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmicini as group name: Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 169 [Myrmicites].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmicini as tribe of Myrmicidae: Forel, 1891b: 143.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmicini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893a: 164 [Myrmicii];
Forel, 1895b: 124 [Myrmicii]; Forel, 1899c: 52 [Myrmicii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
139 [Myrmicii]; Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Emery, 1914a: 35; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 51;
Forel, 1917: 240; Emery, 1921f: 35; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 655; all subsequent
authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Myrmicini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eutetramorium, Huberia,
Hylomyrma, Manica, Myrmica, *Plesiomyrmex, Pogonomyrmex, *Protomyrmica, <span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;</span>Secostruma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Myrmicini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1895j:
768 (diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139 (diagnosis); Emery, 1914a: 35, 40
(diagnosis (in key), synoptic classification); Forel, 1917: 240 (synoptic
classification); Emery, 1921f: 35 (diagnosis, genera key, catalogue); Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 660 (genera key); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 53
(larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Kugler, C. 1978a: 414 (sting structure);
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79 (synoptic classification); Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 16 (synoptic classification); Brandão, 1991: 390 (Neotropical
fauna, synoptic classification); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synoptic classification);
Bolton, 1995a: 1041 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 13 (catalogue); Fernández, 2003d:
319 (Neotropical genera); Bolton, 2003: 61, 220 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Myrmicini<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>EUTETRAMORIUM</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Eutetramorium</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1899f: 280.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eutetramorium mocquerysi</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 163. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Eutetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmecinini: Emery, 1912b: 105; Emery, 1914a: 41.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Eutetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 141; Emery, 1915i: 192; Forel, 1917: 245; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664;
Emery, 1924d: 291; subsequent authors to the entry below, including Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Eutetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Bolton, 1976: 293; Bolton, 1994: 106;
Bolton, 2003: 62.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.

255 (sting stucture); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 190

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>HUBERIA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Huberia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1890b: cv.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium striatum</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>HYLOMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Hylomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912g: 16 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex (Hylomyrma)
columbicus</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1921f: 49; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
660; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hylomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1912g: 16; Forel, 1917: 240; Emery, 1921f: 49; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 651;
Kusnezov, 1951a: 245; Kusnezov, 1956: 18.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660 (in key); Borgmeier, 1927c: 77;
Brown, 1953h: 3; Kempf, 1964e: 54; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MANICA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Manica</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Jurine, 1807: 276.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica rubida</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 166. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Manica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Manica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>:
Roger, 1863b: 28; Mayr, 1863: 431; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 460; Dalla Torre,
1893: 108; Forel, 1915d: 9. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Manica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>:
Emery, 1921f: 42; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; Smith, M.R. 1951a: 791.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Manica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Jurine, 1807: 276; Weber, 1947: 439; Creighton, 1950a:
105; Smith, M.R. 1958c: 113; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MANICA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Neomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1914a: 275 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster (Neomyrma)
calderoni</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica
bradleyi</i>), by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster</i>:
Forel, 1914a: 275. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>:
Forel, 1915c: 364 (in text); Emery, 1915d: 69; Emery, 1916b: 120; Forel, 1917:
241.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Bondroit, 1918: 97. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>:
Donisthorpe, 1916b: 242.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Neomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Manica</i>:
Emery, 1921f: 42; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Oreomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1914d: 118
(in text) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica rubida</i> (quoted
by Wheeler as <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica rubida</i>), by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oreomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Neomyrma</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1915a: 50; Forel, 1915c: 364; Forel, 1915d: 9; Donisthorpe,
1916b: 242. [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Manica</i> and <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oreomyrma</i> share the same type-species,
synonymy is therefore absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Manica</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1914d: 119 (U.S.A. species key); Emery, 1921f: 42 (diagnosis, catalogue);
Creighton, 1950a: 108 (North America species key); Bernard, 1967: 125
(diagnosis); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1352 (North America catalogue); Allred, 1982:
440 (U.S.A., Utah species key); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1986g: 25
(U.S.A., Nevada species key); Morisita, Kubota, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 1992: 13 (Japan species key); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 249 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMICA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmica</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Latreille, 1804: 179.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica rubra</i>, by
subsequent designation of Latreille, 1810: 437; see also Yarrow, 1955b: 113. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicites: Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 180.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Poneridae, Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 114.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1871a: 324; Cresson, 1887: 260.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 396 [Myrmicidae]; Smith, F. 1857a: 70
[Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1861: 62 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 19 [Myrmicidae]; Emery
&amp; Forel, 1879a: 460 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 108.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmica</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Forel, 1895b: 125; Emery, 1895j: 769;
Forel, 1899c: 63; Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Emery, 1914a:
40; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 59; Forel, 1917: 241; Bondroit, 1918: 96; Emery,
1921f: 36; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMICA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Sifolinia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1907: 49.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sifolinia laurae</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>PLESIOMYRMEX</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Plesiomyrmex</i></b> Dlussky &amp; Radchenko, 2009: 437. Type-species:
*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plesiomyrmex tubulatus</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plesiomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Dlussky &amp; Radchenko, 2009: 439.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>POGONOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pogonomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1868b: 169.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica badia</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 170. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pogonomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 81. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pogonomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae: Cresson, 1887: 260.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pogonomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 118.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pogonomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Forel, 1895b: 125; Emery, 1895j: 769;
Forel, 1899c: 61; Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Emery, 1914a:
40; Forel, 1917: 240; Emery, 1921f: 44; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>POGONOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ephebomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1902c:
390 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex naegelii</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 163. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ephebomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Forel, 1917: 240;
Emery, 1921f: 48; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ephebomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1902c: 390; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Forel, 1917: 240; Emery,
1921f: 48; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; Gallardo, 1932b: 94; Donisthorpe, 1943f:
643; Kusnezov, 1949c: 293; Creighton, 1950a: 132; Kusnezov, 1951a: 245; Smith,
M.R. 1951a: 794; Smith, M.R. 1958c: 115; Kusnezov, 1964: 56; Kusnezov, 1956:
118; Smith, M.R. 1967: 351; Cole, 1968: 22; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1357; Snelling,
1982a: 108; MacKay, MacKay, Dominguez, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ephebomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Creighton, 1957a: 54; Kusnezov, 1960b: 350; Kempf, 1972a:
106; Brown, 1973b: 180; Snelling, 1981: 395; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1985: 257; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; MacKay &amp; Vinson, 1989b: 14;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 13; Taber, 1998: 146.<span style="mso-spacerun:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ephebomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex</i>:
Lattke, 1991a: 305; Bolton, 1994: 106; Bolton, 1995b: 28; Fernández &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Janetia</i>

1922a: 660; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 646; Kusnezov, 1951a: 245; Kempf, 1972a: 209.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional]; Snelling, 1981: 395; Lattke, 1991a: 305;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by <i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pogonomyrmex (Janetia)
mayri</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB>Teleutomyrmini as junior synonym of Tetramoriini: Bolton, 1994: 106;
all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Tetramoriini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 141 (diagnosis); Emery, 1914a: 38, 42 (diagnosis (in key), synoptic
classification); Forel, 1917: 245 (synoptic classification); Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 670 (genera key); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 893, 1030 (Afrotropical, Malagasy
catalogues); Emery, 1924d: 271 (diagnosis, genera key, catalogue); Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 57 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Bolton,
1976: 289 (diagnosis, revision of tribe, genera key); Kugler, C. 1978a: 442
(sting structure); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80 (synoptic classification);
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1994: 106
(synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1042 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 16
(catalogue); Sanetra &amp; Buschinger, 2000: 95 (partial phylogeny); Bolton,
2003: 62, 224 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Tetramoriini<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ANERGATES</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anergates</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1874: 67 (see also
p. 93). Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica atratula</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anergates</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Emery, 1877a: 81 [Myrmicidae]; Emery &amp; Forel,
1879a: 457 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 64.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Forel, 1893a: 165. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Emery, 1914a: 41 [subtribe
Anergatini]; Forel, 1917: 243; Emery, 1922e: 205; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 663; all

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

decem</i>, by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>STRONGYLOGNATHUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Strongylognathus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1853d: 389. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eciton testaceum</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmus</i>
Schenck, 1853: 188; junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmus</i>
Hahn, 1832: 81 (Hemiptera).]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Strongylognathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Poneridae, Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 134.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Strongylognathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Strongylognathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 430 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 21
[Myrmicidae]; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 457 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893:
129.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Strongylognathus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Emery, 1895j: 770; Ashmead, 1905b:
383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 141; Emery, 1914a: 42; Forel, 1917: 245; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 285; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>STRONGYLOGNATHUS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Schenck, 1853: 188.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmus emarginatus</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eciton testaceum</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmus</i>
Hahn, 1832: 81 (Hemiptera).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Strongylognathus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Smith, F. 1858b:
134 (diagnosis); Mayr, 1863: 454 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 21 (diagnosis);
Forel, 1874: 71 (Switzerland species key); André, 1883a: 281 (Europe &amp;
Algeria species key); Dalla Torre, 1893: 129 (catalogue); Forel, 1900e: 278
(all species key); Ruzsky, 1905b: 541 (Russian Empire species key); Emery,
1909d: 708 (Palaearctic species key); Emery, 1916b: 199 (Italy species key);
Bondroit, 1918: 110 (France &amp; Belgium species key); Emery, 1924d: 285
(diagnosis catalogue); Arnol'di, 1933b: 598 (Russia species key); Kratochvíl,
1941: 87 (Central Europe species key); Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 87 (Central
Europe species key); Bernard, 1967: 237 (Western Europe species key); Baroni
Urbani, 1969c: 157 (Western Europe <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>S.
huberi</i> group revision, key); Bolton, 1976: 304 (diagnosis, review of
genus); Kutter, 1977c: 159 (Switzerland species key); Arnol'di &amp; Dlussky,
1978: 545 (former European U.S.S.R. species key); Collingwood, 1978: 86
(Iberian Peninsula species key); Gösswald, 1985: 312 (Germany species key);
Agosti &amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 278 (Balkans species key); Dlussky, Soyunov
&amp; Zabelin, 1990: 209 (Turkmenistan species key); Radchenko, 1991: 89
(former U.S.S.R. species key); Atanasov &amp; Dlussky, 1992: 156 (Bulgaria
species key); Arakelian, 1994: 68 (Armenia species key); Bolton, 1994: 106
(synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1053 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 395
(catalogue); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 95 (China species key); Seifert, 1996b:
115 (Central Europe species key); Sanetra &amp; Buschinger, 2000: 95
(phylogeny); Wei, Xu &amp; He, 2001: 68 (China species key); Seifert, 2007: 115
(North and Central Europe species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>TELEUTOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Teleutomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kutter, 1950a: 82.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Teleutomyrmex schneideri</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Teleutomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Kutter, 1950a: 81 [subtribe
Teleutomyrmini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Teleutomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Bernard, 1967:
239 (diagnosis); Bolton, 1976: 309 (diagnosis, review of genus); Bolton, 1994:
106 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1053 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 403
(catalogue); Sanetra &amp; Buschinger, 2000: 95 (phylogeny).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>TETRAMORIUM</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tetramorium</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1855: 423.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica caespitum</i>, by
subsequent designation of Girard, 1879: 1016. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 423 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1861: 61
[Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 20 [Myrmicidae]; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 457
[Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 130.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Forel, 1895b: 125; Forel, 1899c: 52;
Kusnezov, 1964: 57 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramorium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Emery, 1895j: 770; Ashmead, 1905b:
383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 141; Emery, 1914a: 42; Arnold, 1917: 271; Forel,
1917: 245; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 275; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

monotypy. </span></p>

lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1912b: 104; Emery, 1914a: 41; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

53. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Macromischa aculeata</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischoides</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischoides</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Santschi, 1924b: 207; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischoides</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 187; Santschi, 1924b: 206; Bernard,
1953b: 248; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischoides</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium</i>:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Macromichoides</span></i>
Santschi, 1924b: 206, incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lobomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kratochvíl, 1941: 84 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium (Lobomyrmex)
ferox silhavyi </i>(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium
ferox</i>), by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lobomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 181 [provisional]; Bolton, 1976: 359; Bolton, 1980: 196.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB style='color:purple'>Sulcomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB>
Kratochvíl, 1941: 84 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium</i>].
Unavailable name. Proposed without designation of type-species and therefore
unavailable. Species included by Kratochvíl (1941) are all referable to <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium</i>: Bolton, 1976: 359.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Calilung, 2000: 66.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Apomyrmex manobo</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmex incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Calilung, 2000: 66. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramorium</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 227, 269.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>PHEIDOLINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pheidolidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1877a: 72. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pheidolini as group of Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 72 [Pheidolidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pheidolini as subtribe of Myrmicini: Emery, 1924d: 357.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pheidolini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893a: 165 [Pheidolii]; Emery,
1914a: 35; Forel, 1917: 241; Arnold, 1920a: 404; Emery, 1921f: 49; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 659; Brown, 1949a: 48; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogastrini as junior synonym of Pheidolini: Brown, 1949a: 48.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lonchomyrmex,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Pheidolini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1914a:
35, 38; 40, 41 (tribe diagnoses (in key); synoptic classifications); Forel,

G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 53, 57 (Pheidolini, Ocymyrmecini larvae, review
&amp; synthesis); Kugler, C. 1978a: 460 (sting structure); Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 80 (synoptic classification); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990:
