<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Pheidolini<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ANISOPHEIDOLE</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anisopheidole</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1914c: 616
(footnote) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole froggatti</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta antipodum</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anisopheidole</i> also
described as new by Forel, 1915b: 61.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anisopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidologeton</i>
genus group: Ettershank, 1966: 81; Bolton, 1987: 265.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anisopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidologetini: Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985:
257; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16;
Bolton, 1994: 106 [Pheidologetonini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anisopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 83;
subsequent authors except the above; Bolton, 2003: 64.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anisopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>:
Forel, 1914c: 616; Emery, 1915i: 190; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 83;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 673; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anisopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Ettershank, 1966: 129; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 54.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Anisopheidole</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1921f: 83
(diagnosis, catalogue); Ettershank, 1966: 129 (diagnosis, review of genus,
checklist); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 54 (Australia catalogue); Taylor,
1987a: 7 (Australia checklist); Bolton, 1995a: 1048 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 63
(catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 125 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>APHAENOGASTER</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1853b: 107.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster sardoa</i>,
by subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 270.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 466 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 19
[Myrmicidae]; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 461 [Myrmicidae]; Cresson, 1887: 260
[Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 98.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Forel, 1891b: 166; Forel, 1895b: 129;
Emery, 1895j: 769; Forel, 1899c: 58; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Wheeler, W.M.
1915h: 53; Santschi, 1932b: 13; Kempf, 1972a: 22 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Aphaenogastrini: Enzmann, J. 1947b: 147.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Emery, 1877a: 81 [Pheidolidae]; Emery,
1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 55 [subtribe Stenammini]; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 661; Brown, 1949a: 48; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 131; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atta</i>:
Mayr, 1863: 395.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stenamma</i>:
Emery, 1895c: 298; Emery, 1895j: 769; Forel, 1903a: 693.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Aphaenogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1908c: 309; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>APHAENOGASTER<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Deromyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1913b: 350 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster
(Ischnomyrmex) swammerdami</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

as new by Forel, 1913k: 49.] </span></p>

Forel, 1913b: 350; Forel, 1913k: 49; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 64;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

original designation. </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sinaphaenogaster</i> as
junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 230, 273.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1855: 466
(diagnosis); Roger, 1863b: 29 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 19 (diagnosis); Mayr,
1867a: 92 (diagnosis); André, 1874: 195 (Europe species key); Forel, 1874: 74
(Switzerland species key); André, 1883b: 348 (Europe &amp; Algeria species
key); Mayr, 1886d: 443 (U.S.A. species key); Cresson, 1887: 260 (U.S.A. catalogue);
Emery, 1888a: 531 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. (Ischnomyrmex)</i>
species key); Nasonov, 1889: 74 (Russia species key); Dalla Torre, 1893: 98
(catalogue); Forel, 1903a: 693 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key); Bingham,
1903: 270 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma species key); Ruzsky, 1905b: 714
(Russian Empire species key); Emery, 1908c: 310 (Palaearctic species key);
Bondroit, 1910: 495 (Belgium species key); Emery, 1916b: 132 (Italy species
key); Wheeler, W.M. 1916m: 585 (U.S.A., Connecticut species key); Wheeler, W.M.
1916j: 213 (Australia species); Bondroit, 1918: 156 (France &amp; Belgium
species key); Emery, 1921f: 55 (diagnosis, subgenera key, catalogue); Emery,
1921f: 56, 61, 64, 65 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A. (Attomyrma,
Nystalomyrma, Deromyrma, Planimyrma)</i> diagnoses, catalogues); Emery, 1921f:
66 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Novomessor</i> diagnosis, catalogue);
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 680 (subgenera key); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 1016, 1029 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster, Brunella</i> catalogues);
Wheeler, W.M. &amp; Creighton, 1934: 348 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Novomessor</i>
species key); Menozzi, 1939a: 296 (Himalaya &amp; Tibet species key); Stitz,
1939: 112 (Germany species key); Kratochvíl, 1941: 81 (Central Europe species
key); Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 81 (Central Europe species key); Cole, 1942: 363
(U.S.A., Utah species key); Buren, 1944a: 284 (U.S.A., Iowa species key);
Creighton, 1950a: 140, 155 (North America <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster,
Novomessor</i> species keys); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 131 (Asia checklist);
Smith, M.R. 1961b: 218 (New Guinea species key); Gregg, 1963: 336 (U.S.A.,
Colorado species key); Bernard, 1967: 128 (diagnosis, Western Europe species
key); Kempf, 1972a: 22, 166 (Neotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster
(Deromyrma), Novomessor</i> catalogues); Arnol'di, 1976b: 1023 (former U.S.S.R.
species key); Kutter, 1977c: 77 (Switzerland species key); Arnol'di &amp;
Dlussky, 1978: 536 (former European U.S.S.R. species key); Collingwood, 1978:
79 (Iberian Peninsula species key); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1359 (North America
catalogue); Allred, 1982: 439 (U.S.A., Utah species key); Taylor &amp; Brown,
D.R. 1985: 54 (Australia catalogue); Gösswald, 1985: 298 (Germany species key);
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1986g: 35 (U.S.A., Nevada species key); Taylor,
1987a: 8 (Australia checklist); Agosti &amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 269 (Balkans
species key); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79 (synoptic classification);
Dlussky, Soyunov &amp; Zabelin, 1990: 211 (Turkmenistan species key); Brandão,
1991: 326 (Neotropical catalogue); Morisita, Kubota, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 1992: 15 (Japan species key); Atanasov &amp; Dlussky, 1992:
107 (Bulgaria species key); Schulz, A. 1994a: 425 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>A. (Attomyrma)</i>, partial key); Arakelian, 1994: 29 (Armenia species
key); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1048
(census); Bolton, 1995b: 68 (catalogue); Wu, J. &amp; Wang, 1995: 110 (China
species key); Umphrey, 1996: 557 (North America <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>A. fulva</i> complex key); Cagniant, 1996a: 67 (Morocco species key);
Seifert, 1996b: 156 (Central Europe species key); Collingwood &amp; Prince,
1998: 13 (Portugal species key); Shattuck, 1999: 126 (Australia synopsis); Park
&amp; Kim, 2000: 108 (Korea species key); Zhou, 2001b: 142 (China, Guangxi
species key); MacKay &amp; MacKay, 2002: 60 (U.S.A., New Mexico species key);
Longino &amp; Cover, 2004: 1 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A.
phalangium</i> complex revision); Radchenko, 2005b: 192 (North Korea species
key); Seifert, 2007: 144 (North and Central Europe species key); Shattuck,

species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>CHIMAERIDRIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Chimaeridris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wilson, 1989: 63.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Chimaeridris boltoni</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Chimaeridris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16;
Bolton, 1994: 106; Bolton, 1995b: 145.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>GONIOMMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Goniomma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895c: 298 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stenamma</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster blanci</i>, by subsequent
designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 164. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniomma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniomma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Emery, 1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241;
Emery, 1921f: 74 [subtribe Stenammini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniomma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stenamma</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 769.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniomma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Oxyopomyrmex</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniomma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1908e: 460; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 74;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

(diagnosis, catalogue); Santschi, 1929e: 145 (all species key); Bernard, 1967:

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Kartidris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bolton, 1991: 10.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Kartidris nyos</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MESSOR</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Messor</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1890a: lxviii [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica barbara</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 277. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 98.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Forel, 1899c: 59;
Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Emery, 1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241;
Arnold, 1920a: 404; Emery, 1921f: 68 [subtribe Stenammini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Messor</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

437; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Forel, 1917: 241; Bondroit, 1918: 149; Arnold,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Cratomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1892d: 572.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cratomyrmex regalis</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cratomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Ashmead, 1905b: 383;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Emery, 1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 240; Emery, 1921f: 43;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 635.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cratomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Messor</i>:
Santschi, 1920d: 378. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cratomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1892d: 572; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140; Forel, 1917:
240; Emery, 1921f: 43; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 660, 802; Bernard, 1971: 6. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cratomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Messor</i>:

Wilson, 1990: 14; Bolton, 1994: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Veromessor</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1917: 235 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Novomessor</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Aphaenogaster andrei</i>,
by subsequent designation of Emery, 1921f: 67. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Veromessor</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all subsequent
authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Veromessor</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Novomessor</i>:
Forel, 1917: 235; Emery, 1921f: 67; Donisthorpe, 1943g: 735.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Veromessor</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; Wheeler, W.M. &amp; Creighton,
1934: 354; Creighton, 1950a: 157; Smith, M.R. 1951a: 799; Kusnezov, 1952b: 10
(in key); Kempf, 1972a: 257; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1364.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Veromessor</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Messor</i>:
Bolton, 1982: 338.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lobognathus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Enzmann, J. 1947b: 152
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i>].
Erroneous entry for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor
lobognathus</i> and hence junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i>:
Brown, 1949a: 49. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:purple'>Sphaeromessor</span></i></b> Bernard, 1985:
48. Unavailable name. Proposed without designation of type-species and
therefore unavailable. Species included by Bernard (1985) are all referable to <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Messor</i>: Bolton, 1995b: 46.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Messor</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Forel, 1903a:
693 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key); Bingham, 1903: 278 (India, Sri Lanka
&amp; Burma species key); Ruzsky, 1905b: 726 (Russian Empire species key);
Emery, 1908e: 437 (Palaearctic species key); Emery, 1916b: 143 (Italy species
key); Bondroit, 1918: 149 (France &amp; Belgium species key); Arnold, 1920a:
404 (diagnosis); Emery, 1921f: 43 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cratomyrmex</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1921f: 67 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1921f: 68 (diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 802 (Afrotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cratomyrmex,
Messor</i> catalogues); Santschi, 1927c: 247 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>M. instabilis</i> group key); Kuznetsov-Ugamsky, 1927a: 89 (Central
Asia species key); Kuznetsov-Ugamsky, 1929d: 4 (Central Asia species key);
Finzi, 1929: 77 (Italy species key); Menozzi, 1933b: 56 (Israel species key);
Wheeler, W.M. &amp; Creighton, 1934: 360 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i>
species key); Finzi, 1936: 160 (Egypt species key); Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 82
(Central Europe species key); Creighton, 1950a: 158 (North America <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromesor</i> species key); Chapman &amp;
Capco, 1951: 136 (Asia checklist); Bernard, 1955a: 360 (Mediterranean <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>M. structor</i> group key); Smith, M.R.
1956a: 36 (U.S.A. <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i> species
key); Bernard, 1967: 137 (diagnosis, Western Europe species key); Kempf, 1972a:
257 (Neotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i>
catalogue); Tarbinsky, 1976: 50 (Kyrghyzstan species key); Arnol'di, 1977b:
1640 (former U.S.S.R. species key); Arnol'di &amp; Dlussky, 1978: 537 (former
European U.S.S.R. species key); Collingwood, 1978: 80 (Iberian Peninsula
species key); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1364 (North America <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Veromessor</i> catalogue); Bolton, 1982: 338 (diagnosis, review of
genus, Afrotropical species revision, key); Collingwood, 1985: 248 (Saudi
Arabia species key); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1986g: 38 (U.S.A., Nevada <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Veromessor</i> species key); Agosti &amp;
Collingwood, 1987b: 270 (Balkans species key); Dlussky, Soyunov &amp; Zabelin,
1990: 215 (Turkmenistan species key); Casevitz-Weulersse, 1990b: 156 (Corsica
species key); Atanasov &amp; Dlussky, 1992: 113 (Bulgaria species key);
Arakelian, 1994: 33 (Armenia species key); Bolton, 1994: 106 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 252 (catalogue);
Collingwood &amp; Agosti, 1996: 314 (Saudi Arabia species key); Cagniant &amp;
Espadaler, 1998: 419 (Morocco species key); Collingwood &amp; Prince, 1998: 14
(Portugal species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Genus </span></i><span lang=EN-GB style='color:red'>OCYMYRMEX</span><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB> <o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ocymyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1886: 364.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ocymyrmex barbiger</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ceratopheidole</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Pergande, 1896: 889
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole (Ceratopheidole)
granulata</i>, by monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ceratopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Emery, 1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241;
Emery, 1922e: 112; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ceratopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1914a: 40; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1922e: 112;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 135; Wu, J. &amp; Wang,
1995: 104 (anachronism). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ceratopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>:
Pergande, 1896: 889; Kempf, 1972a: 183.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ceratopheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1365; Snelling, 1981: 395;
Wilson, 2003: 6.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Epipheidole</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1903f:
664. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epipheidole inquilina</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epipheidole</i> also
described as new by Wheeler, W.M. 1904a: 14.] </span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Isopheidole</i> share the same
type-species, synonymy is therefore absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Parapheidole</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Macropheidole</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1915i: 190 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole fimbriata</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macropheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>:
Emery, 1915i: 190; Forel, 1917: 241; Emery, 1921f: 81; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
673; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macropheidole</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>:
Smith, M.R. 1951a: 800; Brown, 1973b: 181 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979:
1366.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Scrobopheidole</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1915i: 190 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole scrobifera</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Pheidole</span></i> references<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Smith, F. 1858b:
172 (diagnosis); Mayr, 1861: 70 (Europe species key); Roger, 1863b: 27, 30
(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 424, 440 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ischnomyrmex,
Pheidole</i> catalogues); Mayr, 1865: 18, 22 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ischnomyrmex, Pheidole</i> diagnoses); Mayr, 1867a: 92, 96 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ischnomyrmex, Pheidole</i> diagnoses); Mayr,
1870b: 977, 979 (Australia &amp; New World species keys); Mayr, 1876: 102
(Australia species key); André, 1883b: 382 (Europe &amp; Algeria species key);
Mayr, 1879: 674 (Asia species key); Mayr, 1887: 582 (New World species key);
Cresson, 1887: 262 (U.S.A., catalogue); Nasonov, 1889: 75 (Russia species key);
Dalla Torre, 1893: 88, 98 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole,
Pheidolacanthinus</i> catalogues); Emery, 1895c: 288 (North America species
key); Mayr, 1896: 241 (Africa species, partial key); Emery, 1896g: 80 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P. flavens</i> group, key); Forel, 1902c:
165 (India species key); Forel, 1902f: 523 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key);
Bingham, 1903: 223 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma species key); Wheeler, W.M.
1908a: 133 (Puerto Rico species key); Arnold, 1920a: 414 (diagnosis, South
Africa species key); Emery, 1921f: 78 (diagnosis, subgenera key, catalogue);
Emery, 1921f: 81 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P. (Macropheidole)</i>
&amp; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P. (Pheidolacanthinus)</i>
diagnoses, catalogues); Emery, 1921f: 83 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P.
(Stegopheidole) </i>diagnosis, catalogue); Mann, 1921: 442 (Fiji Is species
key); Emery, 1922e: 110 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P.
(Elasmopheidole)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 111 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P. (Trachypheidole)</i> diagnosis,
catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 112 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>P.
(Scrobopheidole), P. (Decapheidole)</i> &amp; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>P. (Ceratopheidole)</i> diagnoses, catalogues); Emery, 1922e: 113 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ischnomyrmex</i> diagnosis, catalogue);
Emery, 1922e: 114 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epipheidole</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 115 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sympheidole,
Parapheidole</i> diagnoses, catalogues); Emery, 1922e: 116 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anergatides</i> diagnosis, catalogue);
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 126, 672 (diagnosis, subgenera key); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
806, 879 (Afrotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole,
Anergatides </i>catalogues); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 1017, 1021 (Malagasy <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pheidole, Parapheidole</i> catalogues);
Gallardo, 1932c: 179 (Argentina <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Elasmopheidole</i>
species key); Finzi, 1936: 165 (Egypt species key); Menozzi, 1939a: 298
(Himalaya species key); Cole, 1942: 362 (U.S.A., Utah species key); Buren,
1944a: 285 (U.S.A., Iowa species key); Creighton, 1950a: 163 (North America
species key); Creighton, 1950a: 192, 194 (North America <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Epipheidole, Sympheidole</i> species); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 135,
137 (Asia <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ceratopheidole, Conothorax,
Ischnomyrmex, Pheidole</i> checklists); Kusnezov, 1952b: 61 (Argentina species

126 (U.S.A., North Dakota species key); Bernard, 1967: 149 (diagnosis, Western

Smith, D.R. 1979: 1365 (North America catalogue); Allred, 1982: 441 (U.S.A.,
Utah species key); Ogata, 1982: 191 (Japan species key); Collingwood, 1985: 253
(Saudi Arabia species key); Naves, 1985: 54 (U.S.A., Florida species key);

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Crematogastrini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893a: 164
[Crematogastrii]; Emery, 1895j: 769 [Crematogastrii]; Forel, 1899c: 81
[Crematogastrii]; Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140 [Crematogastrii];
Emery, 1914a: 37; Forel, 1917: 242; Arnold, 1920a: 482; Emery, 1922e: 127;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 656; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Crematogastrini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster, Recurvidris</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Crematogastrini</span> and genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1855: 468
(diagnosis); Smith, F. 1858b: 135 (diagnosis); Roger, 1863b: 36 (catalogue);
Mayr, 1863: 403 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 22 (diagnosis); Mayr, 1867a: 103

(Australia species key); Mayr, 1879: 680 (Asia species key); André, 1883b: 391

key); Dalla Torre, 1893: 79 (catalogue); Mayr, 1895: 135 (Africa species key);
Forel, 1903a: 679 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key); Bingham, 1903: 124
(diagnosis, India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma species key); Ruzsky, 1905b: 486
(Russian Empire species key); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 140 (diagnosis); Emery,
1912e: 651 (Palaearctic species key); Santschi, 1913a: 411 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. tricolor</i> group, key); Emery, 1914a:
37 (tribe diagnosis (in key)); Emery, 1916b: 156 (Italy species key); Bondroit,
1918: 112 (France &amp; Belgium species key); Santschi, 1918d: 183 (subgenera
key); Mann, 1919: 323 (Solomon Is species key); Arnold, 1920a: 482, 486
(diagnosis, South Africa species key); Emery, 1922e: 127 (diagnosis, subgenera
key, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 130 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C.
(Orthocrema)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 137 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. (Eucrema)</i> &amp; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C.
(Decacrema)</i> diagnoses, catalogues); Emery, 1922e: 138 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. (Xiphocrema) </i>diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 139 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Physocrema)</i> diagnosis, catalogue);
Emery, 1922e: 140 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Crematogaster)</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 152 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C.
(Sphaerocrema)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 153 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Atopogyne)</i> diagnosis, catalogue);
Emery, 1922e: 135 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Paracrema)</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 156 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C.
(Oxygyne)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1922e: 157 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. (Nematocrema)</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 150, 661,
828, 1022 (diagnosis, subgenera key, Afrotropical, Malagasy catalogues);
Menozzi, 1930b: 106 (Somalia species key); Santschi, 1930c: 263 (Japan species
key); Menozzi, 1933b: 61 (Israel species key); Gallardo, 1934: 4, 54 (Argentina
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Orthocrema), C. (Neocrema)</i>
species keys); Menozzi, 1935a: 112 (Malayo-Papuasian <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. (Orthocrema)</i> species key); Finzi, 1936: 175 (Egypt species key);
Santschi, 1937e: 311 (Palaearctic species key); Menozzi, 1939a: 300 (Himalaya
&amp; Tibet species key); Donisthorpe, 1941l: 226 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. (Physocrema)</i> species key); Cole, 1942: 363 (U.S.A., Utah species
key); Buren, 1944a: 288 (U.S.A., Iowa species key); Creighton, 1945: 114 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C. (Rhachiocrema)</i> species key);
Creighton, 1950a: 203 (North America species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951:
86 (Asia checklist); Fromantin &amp; Soulié, 1961: 92 (subgenera key); Gregg,
1963: 356 (U.S.A., Colorado species key); Soulié, 1965: 77 (genera key);
Bernard, 1967: 159 (diagnosis, Western Europe species key); Buren, 1968b: 91
(U.S.A. species key); Kempf, 1972a: 81 (Neotropical catalogue); Delage-Darchen,
1973: 221 (venation); Alayo, 1974: 13 (Cuba species key); Tarbinsky, 1976: 75
(Kyrghyzstan species key); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 54 (larvae,
review &amp; synthesis); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376 (North America catalogue);
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1986g: 47 (U.S.A., Nevada species key); Agosti
&amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 272 (Balkans species key); Arnol'di &amp; Dlussky,
1978: 538 (former European U.S.S.R. species key); Collingwood, 1978: 81
(Iberian Peninsula species key); Allred, 1982: 439 (U.S.A., Utah species key);
Collingwood, 1985: 259 (Saudi Arabia species key); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R.
1985: 60 (Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 22 (Australia checklist);
Johnson, 1988: 330 (Eastern U.S.A. species key); Dlussky, Soyunov &amp;
Zabelin, 1990: 242 (Turkmenistan species key); Kupyanskaya, 1990: 128 (Far
Eastern Russia species key); Brandão, 1991: 338 (Neotropical catalogue);
Morisita, Kubota, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1992: 59
(Japan species key); Atanasov &amp; Dlussky, 1992: 181 (Bulgaria species key);
Arakelian, 1994: 43 (Armenia species key); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic
classification); Kupyanskaya, 1995: 346 (Far Eastern Russia species key);
Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 146 (catalogue); Wu, J. &amp;
Wang, 1995: 62 (China species key); Collingwood &amp; Agosti, 1996: 328 (Saudi
Arabia species key); Seifert, 1996b: 115 (Central Europe species key); Onoyama,
1998: 228 (Japan species key); Collingwood &amp; Prince, 1998: 15 (Portugal
species key); Shattuck, 1999: 132 (Australia synopsis); Zhou, 2001b: 73 (China,
Guangxi species key); MacKay &amp; MacKay, 2002: 71 (U.S.A., New Mexico species
key); Longino, 2003a: 25 (Costa Rica species key); Bolton, 2003: 66, 237
(diagnosis, synopsis); Radchenko, 2005b: 192 (North Korea species key);
Cagniant, 2005: 8 (Morocco species key); Seifert, 2007: 115 (North and Central
Europe species key); Hosoishi &amp; Ogata, 2009: 17 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>C. (Physocrema)</i> all species revision, key); Terayama, 2009: 177
(Taiwan species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Crematogastrini<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Crematogaster</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Lund, 1831a: 132.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica scutellaris</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 124. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
acuta</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery, 1912d: 272; this error
repeated in, for example, Emery, 1914c: 39, Arnold, 1920a: 482, Emery, 1922e:
128, Gallardo, 1934: 4, Soulié, 1965: 78.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Cremastogaster</span></i>
Mayr, 1861: 74 (and many later authors), incorrect subsequent spelling.
Discussions of spelling: Emery, 1912d: 272 (footnote); Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 78;
Donisthorpe, 1941f: 36; Buren, 1959: 125.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Crematogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Poneridae, Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 134.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Crematogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1971a: 329; Cresson, 1887: 262.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Crematogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 468 [Myrmicidae]; Smith, F. 1857a: 75
[Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1861: 74 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 22 [Myrmicidae]; Emery
&amp; Forel, 1879a: 464 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 79. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Crematogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Pheidolini: Emery, 1877a: 81 [Myrmicidae,
Pheidolidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Crematogaster</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Crematogastrini: Forel, 1893a: 164; Forel, 1895b:
130; Emery, 1895j: 769; Forel, 1899c: 81; Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 140; Emery, 1914a: 41; Forel, 1917: 242; Arnold, 1920a: 482; Emery,
1922e: 127; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acrocoelia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1853a: 147.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acrocoelia ruficeps</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica scutellaris</i>),
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 158. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acrocoelia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mayr, 1853a: 147; Souli‚, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acrocoelia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Emery, 1922e: 140; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 619; Creighton, 1950a: 206; Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 86.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acrocoelia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of Crematogaster: Roger, 1863b: 36; Mayr, 1863:
404; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 464; Dalla Torre, 1893: 79; Wheeler, W.M. 1911f:
158; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 828; Buren, 1959: 126; Kempf, 1972a: 81; Brown,
1973b: 178. [Type-species of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acrocoelia</i>
and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i> are synonymous,
generic synonymy is therefore absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER</span></i>
include the nominal plus the following. <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(OXYGYNE) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Oxygyne</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1901e: 375 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster (Oxygyne)
daisyi</i>, by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 169. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oxygyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oxygyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Oxygyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Forel, 1901e: 375; Forel, 1917: 242; Arnold, 1920a: 542; Emery, 1922e: 156;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662; subsequent authors except those above; Bolton, 1995b:
40.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(DECACREMA) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Decacrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1910a: 18 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster schencki</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 161. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Decacrema</i> also described
as new by Forel, 1910f: 9. Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster
decamera</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 860.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Decacrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Decacrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Decacrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Forel, 1910a: 18; Forel, 1917: 242; Arnold, 1920a: 547; Emery, 1922e: 137;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; subsequent authors except for those above; Bolton,
1995b: 26.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Decracrema</span></i>
Arnold, 1920a: 547; incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(ATOPOGYNE)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Atopogyne</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1911d: 343 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster (Atopogyne)
hellenica</i>, by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 159. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster
depressa</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery, 1912d: 272; repeated
in Emery, 1922e: 154, Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 851 and Soulié, 1965: 78.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Atopogyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Atopogyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Atopogyne</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Forel, 1911d: 343; Forel, 1917: 242; Arnold, 1920a: 545; Emery, 1922e: 153;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662; subsequent authors except for those above; Bolton,
1995b: 21.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(PHYSOCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Physocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912f: 220 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster inflata</i>,
by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1913a: 82. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Forel, 1912f: 220; Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 139; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
662; subsequent authors except for those above; Bolton, 1995b: 42.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(XIPHOCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Xiphocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1913k: 80 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster tetracantha</i>,
by subsequent designation of Emery, 1922e: 138. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Xiphocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Xiphocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 185 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Xiphocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Forel, 1913k: 80; Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 138; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
662; subsequent authors except for those above; Bolton, 1995b: 50.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(NEMATOCREMA) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Nematocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1918d: 182 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster stadelmanni</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nematocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Santschi, 1918d: 182; Emery, 1922e: 157; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662; subsequent
authors except for those above; Bolton, 1995b: 38.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(ORTHOCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica sordidula</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Orthocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Orthocrema</span></i><span

Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Santschi, 1918d: 182; Emery, 1922e: 130; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 662; subsequent
authors except those above; Bolton, 1995b: 40.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(ORTHOCREMA)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tranopeltoides</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1922e:
10. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tranopelta huberi</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tranopeltoides</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Donisthorpe, 1943g: 733; Kusnezov,
1957a: 270.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tranopeltoides</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Kempf, 1960c: 173.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(EUCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Eucrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1918d: 182 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica acuta</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Emery, 1919b: 62, Emery, 1922e: 137, Soulié, 1964: 389 and Soulié,
1965: 78 incorrectly treat <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eucrema</i> as
a junior synonym of subgenus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster
sensu stricto</i>. This stems from Emery's 1912d: 272 unjustified subsequent
designation of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica acuta</i> as
type-species of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>; see
above.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Eucrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Eucrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Kempf, 1972a: 82; Bolton, 1995b: 29.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

(NEOCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Neocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1918d: 182 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster distans</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

(Rhachiocrema) wheeleri</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhachiocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Soulié, 1964: 398. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhachiocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 184 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Rhachiocrema</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(COLOBOCREMA) </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Colobocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1927f: 31
[as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster (Colobocrema)
cylindriceps</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Colobocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1927f: 31; Bolton, 1995b: 24. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(MESOCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mesocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1928b: 33 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster rasoherinae</i>,
by subsequent designation of Donisthorpe, 1943f: 661. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 182 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Santschi, 1928b: 33; Bolton, 1995b: 35. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CREMATOGASTER
(APTEROCREMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apterocrema</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1936c: 45
(in text) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster (Apterocrema)
atitlanica</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apterocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 178 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1376; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apterocrema</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Crematogaster</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1936c: 45; Kempf, 1972a: 81; Bolton, 1995b: 21.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Crematogaster</span></i> references</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Recurvidris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bolton, 1992: 36. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trigonogaster</i>
Forel, 1890b: cix; junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trigonogaster</i>
Guérin-Méneville, 1844b: 1149 (Hymenoptera, Pteromalidae).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Crematogastrini: Bolton, 2003: 66.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trigonogaster
recurvispinosa</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

1893: 72 (catalogue); Emery, 1924d: 210 (diagnosis, catalogue); Chapman &amp;

key).</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Ankylomyrmini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Bolton, 2003: 66. </span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
