<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1865: 23.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica caeca</i> (junior
primary homonym; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Laparomyrmex gestroi</i>
is first available replacement name: Bolton, 1995b: 248). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1865: 23 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 63.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
139. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i><span

Monomoriini]; Forel, 1917: 243; Emery, 1922e: 191; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 663;
all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Ettershank, 1966: 81; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988:
81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Metaponini: Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16;
Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Liomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Liomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003: 67.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LIOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Laparomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1887b: 461.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Laparomyrmex gestroi</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Laparomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Liomyrmex</i>:
Dalla Torre, 1893: 63.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Promyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912m: 764.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Promyrma butteli</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Promyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Liomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1913k: 26; Emery, 1921f: 191; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 683 (in key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Liomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dalla Torre,
1893: 63 (catalogue); Bingham, 1903: 198 (diagnosis); Emery, 1922e: 191
(diagnosis, catalogue); Donisthorpe, 1948a: 293 (checklist); Chapman &amp;
Capco, 1951: 162 (Asia checklist); Ettershank, 1966: 152 (diagnosis, review of
genus, checklist); Bolton, 1995a: 1050 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 248
(catalogue); Rigato &amp; Bolton, 2001: 247 (review of genus).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>MERANOPLINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Meranoplini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1914a: 37 (diagnosis in key). Type-genus: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Meranoplus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Meranoplini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Emery, 1914a: 37; Arnold, 1917:
360; Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 658; Emery, 1924d: 222; all
subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extant) of
Meranoplini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Meranoplus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) of
Meranoplini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Parameranoplus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Meranoplini</span> and genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 428 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 26 (diagnosis); Dalla

key); Bingham, 1903: 167 (India, Sri Lanka &amp; Burma species key); Emery,

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893a: 165. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicaria</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB>Myrmicariini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893a: 165 [Myrmicarii];

1922e: 120; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 656; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus</span></b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Smith, F. 1858b:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heptacondylus subcarinatus</i>,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heptacondylus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Poneridae, Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 141.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heptacondylus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Smith, F. 1857a: 71 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 24
[Myrmicidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Heptacondylus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicaria</i>:
Smith, F. 1865: 73; Mayr, 1866b: 905; Mayr, 1867a: 111; Smith, F. 1871a: 330.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Physatta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Smith, F. 1857a: 77.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Physatta dromedarius</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heptacondylus
carinatus</i>), by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Formicidae, Myrmicidae: Smith, F. 1857a: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Poneridae, Attidae: Smith, F. 1858b: 171.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Heptacondylus</i>:
Mayr, 1862: 755 (in text); Roger, 1863b: 27; Mayr, 1863: 442. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Physatta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmicaria</i>:
Mayr, 1866b: 905; Mayr, 1867a: 111; Smith, F. 1871a: 330; Bingham, 1903: 117.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Myrmicaria</span></i> references</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>FORMICOXENINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893a: 164. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formicoxenus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Forel, 1893a: 164
[Formicoxenii]; Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='color:red'>FORMICOXENINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1914a: 36 (diagnosis in key). Type-genus: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondylini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Emery, 1914a: 36; Arnold,

311 (in text).</span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stereomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of
Formicoxenini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Atopomyrmex,
Cardiocondyla, Chalepoxenus, Dilobocondyla, *Eocenomyrma, Formicoxenus,
Gauromyrmex, Harpagoxenus, Leptothorax, Myrmoxenus, Nesomyrmex, Ochetomyrmex,
Peronomyrmex, Podomyrma, Poecilomyrma, Protomognathus, Romblonella, Rotastruma,
Stereomyrmex, Temnothorax, Terataner, Vombisidris, Xenomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extant) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Formicoxenini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tricytarus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Formicoxenini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Stigmomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Formicoxenini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1914a: 42
(Leptothoracini, synoptic classification); Forel, 1917: 244 (synoptic
classification); Emery, 1922e: 119 (Stereomyrmicini diagnosis, catalogue);
Emery, 1922e: 123 (Cardiocondylini diagnosis, catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
664, 670 (Ochetomyrmicini, Leptothoracini genera keys); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
827, 885, 886, 889 (Afrotropical Cardiocondylini, Leptothoracini catalogues);
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 1021, 1029 (Malagasy Cardiocondylini, Leptothoracini
catalogues); Emery, 1924d: 236 (Podomyrmini diagnosis, catalogue); Emery,
1924d: 244 (Leptothoracini diagnosis, genera key, catalogue); Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 54, 57 (Cardiocondylini, Leptothoracini larvae, review
&amp; synthesis); Kugler, C. 1978a: 440 (sting structure); Buschinger, 1981:
211 (socially parasitic taxa, relationships); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79
(synoptic classification); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 16 (synoptic
classification); Brandão, 1991: 391 (Neotropical fauna, synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a:
1041 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 12 (catalogue); Buschinger, 1997: 1 (Western
Europe, socially parasitic species, review); Fernández, 2003d: 317 (Neotropical
genera); Bolton, 2003: 68, 243 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>CARDIOCONDYLA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1869b: 20.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla elegans</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i><span

1879a: 456 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 70.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139;
Kusnezov, 1964: 57 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Cardiocondylini: Emery, 1914a: 40; Arnold, 1916:
200; Forel, 1917: 242; Emery, 1922e: 124; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 661; all subsequent
authors; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80 (anachronism); Jaffe, 1993: 10
(anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Bolton, 1982: 311 (in text).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cardiocondyla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CARDIOCONDYLA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Emeryia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1890b: cx.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Emeryia wroughtonii</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Emeryia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla</i>:
Forel, 1892h: 461; Forel, 1892i: 313; Dalla Torre, 1893: 70.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Xenometra</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1917a: 96.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Xenometra monilicornis</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla emeryi</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Xenometra</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Cardiocondylini: Emery, 1922e: 126; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 661; subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Xenometra</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla</i>:
Baroni Urbani, 1973: 199; Marikovsky &amp; Yakushin, 1974: 60.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dyclona</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Santschi, 1930b: 70
(footnote) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Monomorium cristatum</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1375; Bolton, 1982: 309. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cardiocondyla (Loncyda)
monardi</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

Brown, 1973b: 181 [provisional]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1375; Bolton, 1982: 309.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax
muellerianus</i>), by monotypy. [Name of type-species initially misspelled <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>gridoboi</i>, p. 257; correct spelling as <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>gribodoi</i>, p. 258.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

normal'><span style='color:red'>FORMICOXENUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1855: 413.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica nitidula</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 413 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 62.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Formicoxenus</span></i><span

Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 264; all subsequent authors except the
following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Mayr, 1863: 422; Roger, 1863b: 25; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 457.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

above; Francoeur, Loiselle &amp; Buschinger, 1985: 343.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tomognathus</i>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

64.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1863: 456
(catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 23 (diagnosis); André, 1882c: 279 (Europe &amp;
Algeria species); Dalla Torre, 1893: 63 (catalogue); Emery, 1924d: 265
(diagnosis, catalogue); Creighton, 1950a: 284 (North America species key);
Bernard, 1967: 223 (diagnosis); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1398 (North America
catalogue); Radchenko, 1994b: 112 (South Siberia species key); Bolton, 1995a:
1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 211 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTOTHORAX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1855: 431.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica acervorum</i>, by
subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 214. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica clypeata</i>,
unjustified subsequent designation by Emery, 1912d: 271; repeated in Wheeler,
W.M. 1913a: 79 and Emery, 1924d: 248.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicidae, Myrmicidae: Emery, 1877a: 81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Mayr, 1855: 431 [Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1861: 57
[Myrmicidae]; Mayr, 1865: 20 [Myrmicidae]; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 458
[Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 122.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Forel, 1895b: 125; Emery, 1895j: 769;
Forel, 1899c: 54; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 63; Kusnezov,
1964: 57 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Emery, 1914a: 42; Arnold, 1916: 257;
Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 247; subsequent
authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105; MacKay, 2000: 267.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTOTHORAX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mychothorax</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ruzsky, 1904a: 288.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica acervorum</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mychothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Ruzsky, 1905b: 609; Emery, 1915g: 24; Emery, 1916b: 176; Forel, 1917: 245;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 679; Emery, 1924d: 260; Creighton, 1950a: 274.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mychothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Smith, M.R. 1950: 29; Brown, 1973b: 182 [provisional]; Bolton, 1982: 319. [<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Mychothorax</i> share the same type-species, synonymy is therefore
absolute.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Doronomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kutter, 1945: 485.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Doronomyrmex pacis</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doronomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini:Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doronomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Doronomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional]; Heinze, 1998: 195; Bolton, 2003: 270.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOXENUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmoxenus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ruzsky, 1902b: 474.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoxenus gordiagini</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Emery, 1914a: 42; Forel, 1917: 245;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 262; all subsequent authors to the
following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmoxenus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epimyrma</i>:
Buschinger, 1990: 245 (provisional synoynym); Bolton, 1994: 105 [seniority
incorrect, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoxenus</i> has priority;
see below.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOXENUS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Epimyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1915a: 262.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epimyrma kraussei</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Epimyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Forel, 1917: 245; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 263; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Epimyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Epimyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 180 [provisional]. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Epimyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoxenus</i>:
Schulz &amp; Sanetra, 2002: 162.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmetaerus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Soudek, 1925a: 33.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmetaerus microcellatus</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoxenus gordiagini</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmetaerus</i> also
described as new by Soudek, 1925b: 14.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmetaerus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 667.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmetaerus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 182 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmetaerus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Camponotus</i>:
Snelling, 1981: 404 (error). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmetaerus</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoxenus</i>:
Buschinger, Winter &amp; Faber, 1984: 336.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenera of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOXENUS</span></i>
include the nominal plus the following.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subgenus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYRMOXENUS
(GONEPIMYRMA)</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Gonepimyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bernard, 1948: 146 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epimyrma</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epimyrma (Gonepimyrma) africana</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Gonepimyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epimyrma</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 181 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Myrmoxenus</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1916b:
189 (Italy species key); Bondroit, 1918: 139 (France &amp; Belgium species
key); Emery, 1924d: 262 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmoxenus</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1924d: 263 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Epimyma</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Menozzi, 1931c: 36 (diagnosis, all species key);
Bernard, 1967: 216 (diagnosis, Western Europe species key); Kutter, 1973e: 281
(species, notes); Kutter, 1977c: 138 (Switzerland species key); Buschinger,
Fischer, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1987: 253 (partial
revision); Agosti &amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 276 (Balkans species key);
Buschinger, 1989: 265 (evolution, speciation); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census);
Bolton, 1995b: 188 (catalogue); Seifert, 1996b: 118 (Central Europe species
key); Cagniant &amp; Espadaler, 1997: 268 (Morocco species key); Seifert, 2007:
117 (North and Central Europe species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>NESOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1910a: 259.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex clavipilis</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i> is the oldest
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i> Emery (a
junior homonym, see below) and hence is the first available replacement name
for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i> Emery: Smith, M.R.
1950: 30.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Forel, 1917: 244; subsequent authors
to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Emery, 1915g: 24; Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 679; Smith, M.R. 1950:
30; Smith, M.R. 1951a: 816; Kempf, 1959c: 393; Brown, 1971a: 4; Kempf, 1972a:
133; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1391; MacKay, 2000: 272 (in key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i>:
Emery, 1924d: 249; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 674. [<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Goniothorax</i> is a junior homonym and hence <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Nesomyrmex</i> takes priority as first available replacement name.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 183 [provisional]; Bolton, 1982: 319; Bolton, 1994: 105; Bolton,
1995b: 39.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Nesomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, W.M. 1910a: 259; Francoeur &amp; Loiselle,
1988b: 43 (possibly valid); Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 14 [junior synonyms
of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i> left behind under <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>]; Jaffe, 1993: 11; Bolton,
2003: 70.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>NESOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Goniothorax</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1896g: 58
(diagnosis in key) [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax vicinus</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 164. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i>
Milne-Edwards, 1879: 103 (Crustacea).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Leptothoracini: Forel, 1917: 244.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Goniothorax</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139; Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 679, 890,
1029; Emery, 1924d: 249; Creighton, 1950a: 259.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Goniomyrmex</span></i>
Ashmead, 1905b: 383, incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>NESOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1912m: 766 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dilobocondyla</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dilobocondyla (Tetramyrma)
braunsi</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Emery, 1914a: 42; Forel, 1917: 245;
Arnold, 1917: 358; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 291; Donisthorpe,
1943g: 732; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257 (anachronism); Dlussky
&amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 80 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Bolton, 1976: 291.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dilobocondyla</i>:
Forel, 1912m: 766. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Forel, 1913a: 122; Arnold, 1917: 358; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 664; Emery, 1924d: 291; Donisthorpe, 1943g: 732; Bolton, 1976: 291.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Bolton, 1982: 319; Bolton, 1994: 105.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tetramyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 249, 272.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Caulomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1914d: 233 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax echinatinodis</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Caulomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i>:
Forel, 1915c: 364 [provisional]; Emery, 1915g: 24; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 679.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Caulomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Forel, 1914d: 233; Forel, 1917: 244.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Caulomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i>:
Emery, 1924d: 249 (incorrect procedure as <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i>
is a junior homonym for which <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i>
is the first available replacement name; see Smith, M.R. 1950: 30).] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Caulomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 182 [provisional].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Limnomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Arnold, 1948: 222.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Limnomyrmex stramineus</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Limnomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1971a: 4.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ireneopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1946d: 242.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ireneopone gibber</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ireneopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Tetramoriini: Donisthorpe, 1946d: 243; Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ireneopone incertae sedis</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Bolton, 1976: 292; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988:
81.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ireneopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Bolton, 1994: 105; Bolton, 1995a:
1050; Bolton, 1995b: 217.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ireneopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 250, 272.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Meia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Pagliano &amp; Scaramozzino,
1990: 5. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Unnecessary replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Goniothorax</i> Emery, 1896g: 58 (junior homonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i> Milne-Edwards, 1879: 103). <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i> is the first available
replacement name for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Goniothorax</i>
Emery, therefore <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Meia</i> is
automatically a junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Nesomyrmex</i>:
Bolton, 1994: 105.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Nesomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1896g: 58
(Neotropical species key); Arnold, 1916: 258 (South Africa species key);
Arnold, 1917: 358 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramyrma</i>
diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 890, 908 (Afrotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>L. (Goniothorax), Tetramyrma</i> catalogues); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 1029
(Malagasy <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L. (Goniothorax) </i>catalogue);
Emery, 1924d: 249 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L. (Goniothorax)</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1924d: 291 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tetramyrma</i>
review, catalogue); Kempf, 1959c: 394 (Neotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Leptothorax (Nesomyrmex)</i> species revision, key); Kempf, 1972a: 133
(Neotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax (Nesomyrmex)</i>
catalogue); Kempf, 1975c: 367 (additions to 1959b key); Bolton, 1982: 319
(diagnosis, review of genus, Afrotropical species key); Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 13 (synoptic classification); Brandão, 1991: 349 (Neotropical
catalogue); Bolton, 1995b: 235 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 272 (genus
diagnosis); Mbanyana &amp; Robertson, 2008: 36 (southern Africa species
revision, key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>OCHETOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ochetomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1878: 871.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ochetomyrmex semipolitus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ochetomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 135.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

(diagnosis in key). Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Brownidris
argentinus</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

339.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Poecilomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 679 (footnote).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Poecilomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mann, 1921: 445, Bolton, 1994: 89.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PROTOMOGNATHUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Protomognathus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1905a:
3 [as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tomognathus</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tomognathus americanus</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischa</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Roger, 1863a: 184; Mayr, 1865: 19; Dalla Torre, 1893:
120; Emery, 1895j: 769; Emery, 1914a: 42; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 664; Emery,
1924d: 245; subsequent<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>authors except the entries below;
Kempf, 1972a: 135; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1390; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1985: 257; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 14.<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischa</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Baroni Urbani, 1978b: 398; MacKay, 2000: 288 (in key).<span
style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span
style="mso-spacerun:
yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischa</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 181 [provisional]; Snelling, 1986: 154; Bolton, 1994: 105;
Bolton, 1995b: 34.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Macromischa</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Temnothorax</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 271.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dichothorax</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895c: 323 [as subgenus
of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax (Dichothorax) pergandei</i>, by
subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 161. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dichothorax</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Taylor &amp;
Brown, D.R. 1985: 65 (Australia catalogue (as <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Leptothorax</i>)); Taylor, 1989b: 605 (Australia species key (as <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptothorax</i>)); Bolton, 1991: 2 (all
species key); Bolton, 1995a: 1053 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 423 (catalogue);
Shattuck, 1999: 172 (Australia synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>XENOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Xenomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1885a: 369. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Xenomyrmex stollii</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 64.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Formicoxenini: Forel, 1893a: 165. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Myrmecinella</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1922d: 1.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecinella panamana</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

(incomprehensible entry).</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tricytarus</i> an <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>unrecognisable taxon</b>: a male-based genus,
description inadequate. Type-material not present in California Academy of
Sciences, San Francisco, U.S.A., nor in The Natural History Museum, London,
U.K.; presumed lost: Bolton, 2003: 254.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Myrmecinini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 383. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Myrmecinini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 383; Emery,
1912b: 105; Emery, 1914a: 37; Arnold, 1916: 190; Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 659; Emery, 1924d: 229; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <span
style='color:red'>MYRMECININI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Archaeomyrmecini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Mann, 1921: 449. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Archaeomyrmex</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmecina</i>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Archaeomyrmecini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Mann, 1921: 449; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 656.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Archaeomyrmecini as junior synonym of Myrmecinini: Brown, 1971a: 2.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of
Myrmecinini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex,
Myrmecina, Perissomyrmex, Pristomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>) incertae sedis</i> in Myrmecinini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Enneamerus, *Stiphromyrmex</i><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>.<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Myrmecinini</span> references</span></b><span lang=EN-GB> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1912b:
105 (genera key); Emery, 1914a: 37, 41 (diagnosis (in key), synoptic
classification); Forel, 1917: 244 (synoptic classification); Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 670 (genera key); Emery, 1924d: 229 (diagnosis, genera key, catalogue);
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 55 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis);
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1994: 105
(synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1041 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 13
(catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 71, 255 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Mymecinini<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ACANTHOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1893a: cclxxvi.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex luciolae</i>,
by subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 191. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex</i> also
described as new by Emery, 1893f: 244. <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Acanthomyrmex</i>
misplaced in Formicinae, Lasiini (probably in error for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Acanthomyops</i>): Ashmead: 1905b: 384.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769; Ashmead, 1905b: 383;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Acanthomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmecinini: Emery, 1912b: 105; Emery, 1914a: 41;
Forel, 1917: 244; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 663; Emery, 1924d: 234; all subsequent
authors except the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

(error).</span></p>

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Odontomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 139.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Odontomyrmex</span></i><span

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Odontomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pristomyrmex</i>:
