<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Hylidris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Weber, 1941a: 190.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hylidris myersi</i> (junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pristomyrmex africanus</i>),
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hylidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmecinini: Weber, 1941a: 183; Donisthorpe, 1943f:
651.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Hylidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pristomyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1953c: 9.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dodous</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1946f: 145.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dodous trispinosus</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dodous</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Solenopsidini: Donisthorpe, 1946f: 145.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dodous</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pristomyrmex</i>:
Brown, 1971a: 3.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Pristomyrmex</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Dalla Torre,
1893: 62 (catalogue); Forel, 1903a: 696 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key);
Bingham, 1903: 193 (diagnosis); Emery, 1924d: 233 (diagnosis, catalogue);

Taylor, 1968c: 63 (supplement to previous); Bolton, 1981b: 282 (diagnosis,
Afrotropical species revision, key); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 85
(Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 64 (Australia checklist); Morisita,
Kubota, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1992: 57 (Japan
species key); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1052

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in <span
style='color:red'>MYRMICINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>AFROMYRMA</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Afromyrma</i></b> Dlussky, Brothers &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2004: 9.
Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Afromyrma petrosa</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Afromyrma</i> in Myrmicinae:
Dlussky, Brothers &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2004: 9. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ATTOPSIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Attopsis</i></b> Heer, 1850: 155. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Attopsis longipennis</i>, by subsequent designation of Wheeler, W.M.
1911f: 159.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Electromyrmex</i> also described as new by

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Fushunomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae: Hong, 2002: 550.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>ORBIGASTRULA</span></i><span
style='color:red'> </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Orbigastrula</i></b> Hong, 2002: 552. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Orbigastrula guchengziensis</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Orbigastrula</i> in
Myrmicinae: Hong, 2002: 552.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>QUADRULICAPITO</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Quadrulicapito</i></b> Hong, 2002: 561. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Quadrulicapito longa</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Quadrulicapito</i> in
Myrmicinae: Hong, 2002: 561.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>QUINEANGULICAPITO</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Quineangulicapito</i></b> Hong, 2002: 554. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Quineangulicapito fushunensis</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Quineangulicapito</i> in
Myrmicinae: Hong, 2002: 554.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>SINOMYRMEX</span></i><span
style='color:red'> </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Sinomyrmex</i></b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Hong,
2002: 546. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sinomyrmex
brunneus</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sinomyrmex</i> in Myrmicinae:
Hong, 2002: 546.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>SPHAEROGASTERITES</span></i><span
style='color:red'> </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Sphaerogasterites</i></b> Hong, 2002: 557. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sphaerogasterites longipetiolatus</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sphaerogasterites</i> in
Myrmicinae: Hong, 2002: 557.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>WUMYRMEX</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Wumyrmex</i></b> Hong, 2002: 566. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Wumyrmex furvis</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Wumyrmex</i> in Myrmicinae:
Hong, 2002: 566.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Collective group name in <span
style='color:red'>MYRMICINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:green'>MYRMICITES</span></i></b> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Myrmicites</i></b> Förster, 1891: 448 [collective group name, without
included named taxa. Note that this name is not equivalent to Myrmicites
Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 169.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>THE PONEROIDS: SUBFAMILIES AGROECOMYRMECINAE,
AMBLYOPONINAE, PARAPONERINAE, PONERINAE AND PROCERATIINAE<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in poneroid subfamilies</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone</i>, *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petropone</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY
<span style='color:red'>AGROECOMYRMECINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>AGROECOMYRMECINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Agroecomyrmicini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Carpenter, 1930: 34. Type-genus: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Agroecomyrmecinae as myrmicomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton,
2003: 51, 181.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Agroecomyrmecinae as poneroid subfamily of Formicidae: Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau,
Bell <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Ward, 2007a:
555.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Agroecomyrmecini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>AGROECOMYRMECINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Agroecomyrmicini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Carpenter, 1930: 34. Type-genus: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i>. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Agroecomyrmecini as tribe of Myrmicinae: Carpenter, 1930: 34
[Agroecomyrmicini]; Brown &amp; Kempf, 1968: 184; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva,
1988: 80; Baroni Urbani &amp; De Andrade, 2007: 75.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Agroecomyrmecini as tribe of Agroecomyrmecinae: Bolton, 2003: 52,
181.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extant) of
Agroecomyrmecini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Tatuidris</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) of
Agroecomyrmecini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Agroecomyrmex, *Eulithomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily and tribe <span
style='color:red'>Agroecomyrmecini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Brown &amp;
Kempf, 1968: 184 (diagnosis, revision of tribe); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1040 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 8 (catalogue);
Bolton, 2003: 51, 181 (diagnosis, synopsis); Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173 (phylogeny); Moreau, Bell
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102 (phylogeny); Baroni
Urbani &amp; De Andrade, 2007: 75 (classification); Ward, 2007a: 555
(classification).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Agroecomyrmecini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>AGROECOMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i></b> Wheeler, W.M. 1910a: 265. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myrmica duisburgi</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i> also
described as new by Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 56.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 56. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Myrmecinini: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 621.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Carpenter, 1930: 34; Brown &amp; Kempf, 1968:
184; Baroni Urbani &amp; De Andrade, 2007: 75..</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Agroecomyrmex</i> in
Agroecomyrmecinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003:181.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Agroecomyrmex</span></i>
references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Brown &amp;
Kempf, 1968: 184 (review of genus); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic
classification); Bolton, 1995b: 61 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>EULITHOMYRMEX</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Eulithomyrmex</i></b> Carpenter, 1935: 91. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Replacement name for *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lithomyrmex</i>
Carpenter, 1930: 34; junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lithomyrmex</i>
Clark, 1928a: 30 (Formicidae).]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eulithomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Brown &amp; Kempf, 1968: 184; Bolton, 1994: 105;
Baroni Urbani &amp; De Andrade, 2007: 75. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eulithomyrmex</i> in
Agroecomyrmecinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003: 181.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Homonym replaced by *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>EULITHOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Lithomyrmex</i></b> Carpenter, 1930: 34. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lithomyrmex rugosus</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[Junior homonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lithomyrmex</i>
Clark, 1928a: 30 (Formicidae).]<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Lithomyrmex</i> in
Myrmicinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Carpenter, 1930: 34. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Eulithomyrmex</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bolton, 1995b: 189 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>TATUIDRIS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tatuidris</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Brown &amp; Kempf, 1968:
186. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Tatuidris tatusia</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tatuidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Brown &amp; Kempf, 1968: 186;
Baroni Urbani &amp; De Andrade, 2007: 75.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tatuidris</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Agroecomyrmecinae, Agroecomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003: 181.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

248 (catalogue); Bolton, 1994: 105 (synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a:

autapomorphies).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY
<span style='color:red'>AMBLYOPONINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>AMBLYOPONINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893a: 162. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Amblyopone</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Forel, 1893a: 162
[Amblyoponinae]; Forel, 1895b: 110 [Amblyoponeridae]; Clark, 1951: 15 (in key)
[Amblyoponinae]; Bolton, 2003: 41 (revived status). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponinae as poneromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003:
41, 153.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponinae as poneroid subfamily of Formicidae: Ouellette,
Fisher, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 365; Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau,
Bell <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Ward, 2007a:
555.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Amblyoponini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>AMBLYOPONINI</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1893a: 162. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Amblyopone</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponini as tribe of Pachycondylinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponini as tribe of Ponerinae: Emery, 1895c: 261 [Amblyoponii];
Emery, 1895j: 761 [Amblyoponii]; Forel, 1900c: 54 [Amblyoponii]; Emery, 1901a:
36 [Amblyoponii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134 [Amblyoponii]; Emery, 1911d: 21;
Emery, 1916b: 25; Forel, 1917: 235; Bondroit, 1918: 80; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
637; Wheeler, W.M. &amp; Chapman, 1925: 55; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 22;
Brown, 1953c: 11; Brown, 1960a: 146; Kusnezov, 1964: 51; Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1985: 256; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; Hölldobler &amp;
Wilson, 1990: 9; Jaffe, 1993: 7; Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyoponini as tribe of Amblyoponinae: Bolton, 2003: 42, 153.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <span
style='color:red'>AMBLYOPONINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Onychomyrmicini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Ashmead, 1905b: 382. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Onychomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Onychomyrmicini as tribe of Ponerinae: Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 638.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Onychomyrmicini as subtribe of Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 96.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Onychomyrmicini as junior synonym of Amblyoponini: Bolton, 1994:
164; Bolton, 2003: 153.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Reneini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1947d: 183. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Renea</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Prionopelta</i>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Reneini as tribe of Ponerinae: Donisthorpe, 1947d: 183.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Reneini as junior synonym of Amblyoponini: Brown, 1953c: 11; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Examblyoponini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1949g: 401. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Examblyopone</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Prionopelta</i>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Examblyoponini as tribe of Ponerinae: Donisthorpe, 1949g: 401.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Examblyoponini as junior synonym of Amblyoponini: Brown, 1951: 102;
all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ericapeltini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Kusnezov, 1955: 275. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ericapelta</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Amblyopone</i>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB>Ericapeltini as subtribe of Amblyoponini: Kusnezov, 1955: 275.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ericapeltini as junior synonym of Amblyoponini: Bolton, 1994: 164;
Bolton, 2003: 153.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Apomyrma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmini as tribe of Ponerinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmini as tribe of Leptanillinae: Bolton, 1990b: 280; Kugler, C.
1992: 106.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmini as tribe of Apomyrminae: Bolton, 1994: 16; Bolton, 2003:
39, 150.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrminae as subfamily of Formicidae: Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp;
Ward, 1992: 316; Bolton, 1994: 16.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrminae as leptanillomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton,
2003: 39, 150.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Apomyrmini as junior synonym of Amblyoponinae: Saux, Fisher &amp;
Spicer, 2004: 465.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of
Amblyoponini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adetomyrma,
Amblyopone, Apomyrma, Bannapone, Concoctio, Myopopone, Mystrium, Onychomyrmex,
Opamyrma, Prionopelta</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) of
Amblyoponini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Casaleia</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Amblyoponini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paraprionopelta</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily and tribe <span
style='color:red'>Amblyoponini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1895j:
766 (diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134 (diagnosis); Emery, 1911d: 21
(diagnosis, genera, key); Emery, 1911d: 96 (subtribe Onychomyrmicini,
diagnosis); Forel, 1917: 235 (synoptic classification); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a:
640, 758, 1006 (genera key, Afrotropical, Malagasy catalogues); Brown, 1960a:
146 (diagnosis, all genera revision, key); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1976b: 48 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1985: 256 (synoptic classification); Terayama, 1989b: 345 (Taiwan fauna);
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 9 (synoptic classification); Brandão, 1991: 389
(Neotropical fauna, synoptic classification); Bolton, 1994: 164 (synoptic
classification); Ward, 1994: 167 (tribe diagnosis &amp; discussion); Bolton,
1995a: 1042 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 9 (catalogue); Hashimoto, 1996: 353
(abdominal structure); Schoeters, Ito, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et
al</i>. 1999: 3 (venom gland structure); Xu, 2000a: 300 (Malesian genera key);
Bolton, 2003: 41, 153 (diagnosis, synopsis); Saux, Fisher &amp; Spicer, 2004:
466 (phylogeny, diagnosis); Ouellette, Fisher <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 359 (phylogeny); Brady, Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173 (phylogeny); Moreau, Bell <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102 (phylogeny); Ward, 2007a: 555 (classification);
Fernández &amp; Arias-Penna, 2008: 30 (Neotropical genera key); Terayama, 2009:
93 (Taiwan genera key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>See also general references under <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PONERINAE</span></b>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ADETOMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Adetomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Ward, 1994: 160.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Adetomyrma venatrix</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Amblyoponini: Ward, 1994: 159. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Amblyoponinae, Amblyoponini: Bolton, 2003: 42, 153.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Amblyopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Erichson, 1842: 260.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Amblyopone australis</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Lithomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Clark, 1928a: 30.

by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lithomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Amblyoponini: Clark, 1928a: 30. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lithomyrmex</span></i><span

Brown, 1960a: 156.</span></p>

Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134; Emery, 1911d: 22; Forel, 1917: 235; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 640; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mystrium</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Amblyoponinae, Amblyoponini: Bolton, 2003: 42, 155.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 436 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 16 (diagnosis); Dalla

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:center;
text-indent:-.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY
<span style='color:red'>PONERINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>PONERINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ponerites</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 185. Type-genus: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as group name: Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 185
[Ponérites].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as family: Smith, F. 1851: 6 [Poneridae]; Smith, F. 1858b:
76 [Poneridae]; Smith, F. 1861b: 44 [Poneridae]; Smith, F. 1871a: 320
[Poneridae]; André, 1882a: 125 [Poneridae]; Cresson, 1887: 93 [Poneridae];
Emery, 1894g: 379 [Poneridae]; Saunders, 1896: 18 [Poneridae]; Ashmead, 1905b:
382 [Poneridae]; Novák &amp; Sadil, 1941: 70 [Poneridae]; Bernard, 1951: 1042
[Poneridae]; Bernard, 1953b: 185 [Poneridae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as tribe of Formicidae: André, 1874: 167 [Poneridae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as subfamily of Poneridae: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Mayr, 1855: 289, 299
[Poneridae]; Mayr, 1861: 21 [Poneridae]; Mayr, 1862: 712 [Poneridae]; Smith, F.
1857a: 64 [Poneridae]; Smith, F. 1862b: 31 [Poneridae]; Mayr, 1865: 11
[Poneridae]; Mayr, 1868c: 24 [Poneridae]; Forel, 1870: 307 [Poneridae]; Forel,
1874: 21 [Poneridae]; Emery, 1877a: 70 [Poneridae]; Forel, 1878: 366
[Poneridae]; Emery &amp; Forel, 1879a: 455 [Poneridae]; André, 1881b: 64
[Poneridae]; Forel, 1892j: 220 [Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 13; Forel,
1893a: 162; Forel, 1895b: 111 [Poneridae]; Nasonov, 1889: 27 [Poneridae];
Emery, 1895j: 766 [subfamily spelled Ponerini]; Emery, 1896e: 176; Forel,
1899c: 2; Emery, 1901a: 36; Bingham, 1903: 23; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134; Emery,
1911d: 2; Wheeler, 1915g: 805 [Ponerides]; Donisthorpe, 1915d: 65; Wheeler,
W.M. 1915h: 25; Arnold, 1915: 9; Escherich, 1917: 2 [Ponerini]; Forel, 1917:
235; Bondroit, 1918: 78 [Poneritae]; Wheeler, W.M. 1920: 53; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 56, 632, 640; Borgmeier, 1923: 37; Karavaiev, 1934: 49; Clark, 1951: 15;
Brown, 1954e: 24; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1972a: 39; Brown, 1973b: 165;
all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as poneromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 42,
156.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerinae as poneroid subfamily of Formicidae: Ouellette, Fisher, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 365; Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau, Bell <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Ward, 2007a: 555.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes of Ponerinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Platythyreini, Ponerini, Thaumatomyrmecini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Ponerinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Afropone, *Eogorgites,
*Eoponerites, *Furcisutura, *Longicapitia</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>Ponerinae</span> references, world <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Smith, F. 1858b:
76 (diagnosis); Mayr, 1862: 712 (genera key); Mayr, 1865: 11 (Odontomachidae,
Poneridae diagnoses), Mayr, 1867a: 79, 81 (Odontomachidae, Poneridae diagnoses);
Forel, 1878: 366 (diagnosis); Dalla Torre, 1893: 13 (world catalogue); Emery,
1895j: 766 (diagnosis); Emery, 1896e: 176 (genera key); Handlirsch, 1907: 879
(*fossil taxa catalogue); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 134 (diagnosis); Emery, 1911d: 3
(diagnosis, tribes key); Forel, 1917: 235 (synoptic classification); Forel,
1921c: 133 (diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 56, 636 (diagnosis, tribes key);

(phylogeny); Eisner, 1957: 475 (proventriculus morphology); Bernard, 1967: 79
(diagnosis); Gotwald, 1969: 25 (mouthparts morphology); Wheeler, G.C. &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>PONERINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Ponerites</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 185. Type-genus: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerini as group name: Lepeletier de Saint-Fargeau, 1835: 185
[Ponérites].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerini as tribe of Poneridae: Forel, 1895b: 111 [Poneri].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Ponerini as tribe of Ponerinae: Forel, 1893a: 163 [Ponerii]; Emery,
1895j: 767 [Ponerii]; Forel, 1899c: 2 [Ponerii]; Emery, 1901a: 36 [Ponerii];
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135 [Ponerii]; Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Emery, 1911d: 54;
Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 27; Arnold, 1915: 36; Forel, 1917: 237; Gallardo, 1918b:
7; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 638, 646; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <span
style='color:red'>PONERINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Odontomachidae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 708. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Odontomachus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Odontomachidae as subfamily of Formicidae: Mayr, 1862: 708
[Odontomachidae]; Mayr, 1865: 11 [Odontomachidae]; Clark, 1951: 15 (in key)
[Odontomachinae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Odontomachidae as family: Smith, F. 1871a: 319; Cresson, 1887: 93;
Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Odontomachidae as tribe of Ponerinae: Forel, 1893a: 163
[Odontomachii]; Forel, 1895b: 117 [Odontomachii]; Emery, 1895j: 768
[Odontomachii]; Forel, 1899c: 18 [Odontomachii]; Forel, 1900c: 57
[Odontomachii]; Emery, 1901a: 36 [Odontomachii]; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135
[Odontomachii]; Emery, 1911d: 106 [Odontomachini]; Forel, 1917: 238
[Odontomachini]; Gallardo, 1918b: 6 [Odontomachini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 636
[Odontomachini]; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 39 [Odontomachini]; Wilson, 1959a:
483 [Odontomachini]; Kusnezov, 1964: 53 [Odontomachini]; Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1976b: 51 [Odontomachini]; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1344 [Odontomachini];
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256 [Odontomachini]; Dlussky &amp;
Fedoseeva, 1988: 78 [Odontomachini]; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 11
[Odontomachini]; Jaffe, 1993: 8 [Odontomachini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Odontomachidae as subtribe of Ponerini: Brown, 1976a: 71
[Odontomachiti].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Odontomachidae as junior synonym of Ponerini: Emery &amp; Forel,
1879a: 455; Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 1995b: 14; Bolton, 2003: 43, 158.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

761 [Leptogenyi]; Forel, 1899c: 17 [Leptogenyi]; Emery, 1901a: 36 [Leptogenyi];

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pachycondylinae as subfamily of Poneridae: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB>Pachycondylinae as subtribe of Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 59

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Euponerinae</span></b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB>Euponerinae as group of Ponerinae: Emery, 1909c: 355.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Euponerinae tribe of Ponerinae: Donisthorpe, 1943f: 626
[Euponerini].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Euponerinae as junior synonym of Ponerini: Bolton, 1994: 164;

lang=EN-GB><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Centromyrmicini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1911d: 57. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Centromyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Centromyrmicini as subtribe of Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 57; Forel,
1917: 237.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Centromyrmicini as tribe of Ponerinae: Bernard, 1953b: 186.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Centromyrmicini as junior synonym of Ponerini: Brown, 1953c: 9; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Plectroctenini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1911d: 92. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Plectroctena</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Plectroctenini as subtribe of Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 92; Forel,
1917: 238.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Plectroctenini as junior synonym of Ponerini: Bolton, 1994: 164;
Bolton, 2003: 43, 158.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dorylozelini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 646. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Dorylozelus</i> (junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptogenys</i>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylozelini as tribe of Ponerinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 646.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dorylozelini as junior synonym of Ponerini: Taylor, 1969: 132; all
subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoneoponerini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 77 (attributed to Donisthorpe).
Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudoneoponera</i> (junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pseudoneoponerini as tribe of Ponerinae: Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951:
77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pseudoneoponerini as junior synoym of Ponerini: Bolton, 2003: 43,
159.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Archiponerini</b> Dlussky
&amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78. Type-genus: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Archiponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Archiponerini as tribe of Ponerinae: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988:
78.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*Archiponerini as junior synonym of Ponerini: Bolton, 1994: 164;
Bolton, 2003: 43, 159.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of
Ponerini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anochetus,
Asphinctopone, Belonopelta, Boloponera, Centromyrmex, Cryptopone, Diacamma,

Leptogenys, Loboponera, Myopias, Odontomachus, Odontoponera, Pachycondyla,
Phrynoponera, Plectroctena, Ponera, Promyopias, Psalidomyrmex, Simopelta,
Streblognathus</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extinct) <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in Ponerini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Archiponera, *Ponerites,
*Poneropsis, *Protopone</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.

classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1048 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 75 (catalogue);

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>BELONOPELTA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Belonopelta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1870a: 374. Type-species:
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Belonopelta attenuata</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Belonopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 43.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Belonopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Pachycondylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Belonopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Forel, 1895b: 116; Wheeler,
W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d: 87 [subtribe Ponerini]; Forel, 1917: 238;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 649; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>BELONOPELTA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leiopelta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Baroni Urbani, 1975b: 309.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Belonopelta deletrix</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leiopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Belonopelta</i>:
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 10; Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 1995b: 33.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

BOLOPONERA</span></i><span lang=EN-GB><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cryptopone testacea</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cryptopone</i> also described
as new by Emery, 1893f: 240. Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Amblyopone testacea</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Wheeler,
W.M. 1911f: 161, repeated in Emery, 1911d: 88, Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 780,
Donisthorpe, 1943f: 636, Kempf, 1972a: 90 and Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985:
28; see discussion in Wilson, 1958d: 360.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Cryptopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Ashmead, 1905b: 382;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d: 88 [subtribe Ponerini]; Forel, 1917:
238; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 650; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b: 16
(catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 407 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 13 (diagnosis); Mayr,
1867a: 86 (diagnosis); Dalla Torre, 1893: 28 (catalogue); Emery, 1887b: 435,

317 (India &amp; Sri Lanka species key); Bingham, 1903: 76 (India, Sri Lanka
&amp; Burma species key); Emery, 1911d: 64 (diagnosis, catalogue); Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 53 (Asia checklist); Wilson, 1958d: 366 (Melanesia &amp;
Moluccas species revision, key); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 28 (Australia
catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 24 (Australia checklist); Bolton, 1994: 164
(synoptic classification); Bolton, 1995a: 1049 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 169
(catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 183 (Australia synopsis); Bolton, 2003: 161
(synopsis); Shattuck &amp; Barnett, 2006: 14 (Australia species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>DINOPONERA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Dinoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1861a: 37.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera grandis</i> (junior
synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Dinoponera gigantea</i>), by
monotypy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dinoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Mayr, 1862: 714 (in key) [Poneridae]; Mayr, 1865: 14
[Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 31.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dinoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Ectatommini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Dinoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Forel, 1895b: 113;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d: 63 [subtribe Pachycondylini]; Forel,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTOGENYS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptogenys</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Roger, 1861a: 41.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptogenys falcigera</i>,
by subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 52. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptogenys</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 46; Mayr, 1862: 714 (in key)
[Poneridae]; Mayr, 1865: 14 [Poneridae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptogenys</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Leptogenyini: Forel, 1893a: 162; Forel, 1899c: 17;
Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Emery, 1911d: 97; Arnold, 1915: 89; Forel, 1917: 238; Gallardo,
1918b: 84; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 652; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 656; Chapman &amp;
Capco, 1951: 31; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptogenys</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Forel, 1900d: 304;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Brown, 1963: 3; Kempf, 1972a: 129; Jaffe, 1993: 8;
Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003: 163.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTOGENYS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Lobopelta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 714 (diagnosis
in key), 733. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera
diminuta</i>, by subsequent designation of Bingham, 1903: 54. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lobopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Mayr, 1862: 714 (in key) [Poneridae]; Mayr, 1865: 15
[Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 43.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lobopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Leptogenyini: Forel, 1893a: 162; Ashmead, 1905b: 382;
Emery, 1911d: 101; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 653; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 658.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lobopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mayr, 1862: 733; Cresson, 1887: 258; Dalla Torre, 1893:
43; Bingham, 1903: 54. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lobopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptogenys</i>:
Forel, 1892k: 520; Forel, 1899c: 18; Forel, 1900d: 304; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
135; Emery, 1911d: 101; Arnold, 1915: 95; Forel, 1917: 238; Gallardo, 1918b:
85; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 653; Wheeler, W.M. 1923d: 1; Borgmeier, 1923: 75;
Creighton, 1950a: 50; Kempf, 1972a: 131; Smith, D.R. 1979: 1343 (anachronism). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Lobopelta</span></i><span

240; Bolton, 2003: 163.</span></p>

Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Prionogenys podenzanai</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

Wheeler, W.M. 1923d: 14 (New World <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L.
(Lobopelta)</i> species key); Creighton, 1950a: 51 (North America <i

&amp; Capco, 1951: 31 (Asia checklist); Wilson, 1958a: 113 (Melanesia &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Bolton &amp; Brown, 2002: 2.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

[Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 16.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
