<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>MYOPIAS<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Trapeziopelta</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 713
(diagnosis in key), 715. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera
maligna</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trapeziopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Mayr, 1862: 713 (in key) [Poneridae]; Mayr, 1865: 11
[Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 43.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trapeziopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Ashmead, 1905b: 382;
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d: 93 [subtribe Plectroctenini]; Forel,
1917: 238; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 650; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trapeziopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 185 [provisional]; Snelling, 1981: 390.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trapeziopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256 (anachronism).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Trapeziopelta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myopias</i>:
Willey &amp; Brown, 1983: 249; Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 1995b: 48.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bradyponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1886c: 362.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera nitida</i> (junior
primary homonym in Ponera, replaced by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trapeziopelta
mayri</i>), by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bradyponera</i> Smith, F.
1873: viii, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>nomen nudum</i>, attributed
to Mayr.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bradyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Trapeziopelta</i>:
Emery, 1911d: 93 [provisional]; Donisthorpe, 1932c: 468.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bradyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Snelling, 1981: 389.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bradyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Myopias</i>:
Bolton, 2003: 164. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

catalogues); Emery, 1900c: 313 (New Guinea Trapeziopelta species key); Bingham,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ODONTOMACHUS</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Odontomachus</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Latreille, 1804: 179.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica haematoda</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PACHYCONDYLA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 713
(diagnosis in key), 717. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera
pumicosa</i>, by subsequent designation of Emery, 1901a: 42. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Mayr, 1862: 713 (in key) [Poneridae]; Mayr, 1865: 13
[Poneridae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 35.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Pachycondylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Emery, 1911d: 75
[subtribe Pachycondylini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 648; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>:
Emery, 1895j: 767; Forel, 1900d: 325.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Emery, 1901a: 42; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d: 75; Arnold, 1915: 55;
Forel, 1917: 237; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 628.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Mayr, 1862: 717; Dalla Torre, 1893: 35; Bingham, 1903:
95; Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Wheeler, W.M. 1918c: 299 (footnote); Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 648; Wheeler, W.M. &amp; Chapman, 1925: 67; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951:
49; Bernard, 1953b: 187; Taylor, 1987a: 9; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 21;
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Bothroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 179 [provisional]; Snelling, 1981: 389; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson,
1990: 11; Brown, in Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003: 166.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Megaponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1862: 714
(diagnosis in key), 734. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica
foetens</i> (junior primary homonym in <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica</i>,
replaced by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica analis</i>), by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Megaponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae: Dalla Torre, 1893: 30; Mayr, 1862: 714 [Poneridae];
Mayr, 1865: 15 [Poneridae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Megaponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Ectatommini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Megaponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
135; Emery, 1911d: 67 [subtribe Pachycondylini]; Arnold, 1915: 46; Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 647; all subsequent authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Megaponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Brown, in Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003: 166. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Megaloponera</span></i>
Roger, 1863b: 17, incorrect subsequent spelling; misspelling repeated by
several authors, for example Emery, 1877b: 368; Forel, 1917: 237.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Euponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1895j: 767; Emery, 1911d: 79
[subtribe Pachycondylini]; Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 37; Arnold, 1915: 63; Forel,

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Euponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>:
Forel, 1891b: 126; Emery, 1895j: 767.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Euponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1901a: 46; Emery, 1909c: 364; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
135; Emery, 1911d: 79; Arnold, 1915: 63; Forel, 1917: 237; Gallardo, 1918b: 64;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 648; Borgmeier, 1923: 70; Clark, 1934b: 30; Creighton,
1950a: 44; Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 63; Bernard, 1953b: 189; Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 11.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Euponera</span></i><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1900c: 314 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>].
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera quadridentata</i>
(junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Formica stigma</i>),
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudoponera</i> also
described as new by Emery, 1901a: 42. Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ponera amblyops</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery,
1901a: 42; repeated in Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 171, Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 779;
Donisthorpe, 1943g: 723.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Pachycondylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 86 [subtribe Pachycondylini];
Forel, 1917: 238; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Emery, 1900c: 314; Emery, 1901a: 42. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Euponera</i>:
Forel, 1900c: 141; Forel, 1900e: 398; Emery, 1909c: 364; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
135.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Bingham, 1903: 91; Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Emery, 1911d: 86;
Forel, 1917: 238; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 649; Donisthorpe, 1943g: 722; Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 74.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 184 [provisional]; Snelling, 1981: 389; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson,
1990: 11; Brown, in Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003: 167.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Brachyponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1900c: 315 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Euponera</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Euponera (Brachyponera) croceicornis</i>, by
monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Brachyponera</i> also
described as new by Emery, 1901a: 43. Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ponera sennaarensis</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery,
1901a: 43, repeated in Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 160, Emery, 1911d: 84, Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 777, Donisthorpe, 1943f: 628, Wilson, 1958d: 346; Bolton, 1973a:
335; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 23.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Pachycondylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 83; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Euponera</i>:
Emery, 1900c: 315; Emery, 1909c: 366; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 135; Emery, 1911d:
83; Arnold, 1915: 72; Forel, 1917: 237; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 649; subsequent
authors to the following.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as genus: Bingham, 1903: 101; Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Wilson, 1958d:
346; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 23; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985:
256; Taylor, 1987a: 9; Ogata, 1987: 116; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 10.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Brachyponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Snelling, 1981: 389 [provisional]; Brown, in Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003:
167.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Mesoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1900d: 668 [as
subgenus of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Euponera</i>]. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera melanaria</i>, by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Mesoponera</i> also described
as new by Emery, 1901a: 43. Type-species not <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ponera caffraria</i>, unjustified subsequent designation by Emery,
1901a: 43, repeated by Emery, 1911d: 81, Wheeler, W.M. 1911f: 167, Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 775, Donisthorpe, 1943f: 661, Wilson, 1958d: 349; Kempf, 1972a:
141, Bolton, 1973a: 338; Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 35.] </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Pachycondylinae, Pachycondylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 382.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Mesoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Emery, 1911d: 80; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Donisthorpe, 1943g: 735.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Wadeura</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pachycondyla</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 185 [provisional]; Snelling, 1981: 389; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson,
1990: 11; Brown, in Bolton, 1994: 164; Bolton, 2003: 168.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pseudoneoponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Donisthorpe, 1943d:
439. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pseudoneoponera
verecundae</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoneoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Pseudoneoponerini: Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudoneoponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bothroponera</i>:
Wilson, 1958d: 361. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonyms of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PONERA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pseudocryptopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M.
1933g: 12. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cryptopone
tenuis</i>, by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudocryptopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Donisthorpe, 1943g: 722.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pseudocryptopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>:
Wilson, 1957b: 356.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Selenopone</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, W.M. 1933g: 19.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera selenophora</i>, by
original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Selenopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Ponerini: Donisthorpe, 1943g: 725.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Selenopone</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>:
Wilson, 1957b: 356.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Pteroponera</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Bernard, 1950a: 3.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Pteroponera sysphinctoides</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Pteroponera</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera</i>:
Brown, 1973b: 184 [provisional]; Brown, in Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

lang=EN-GB>[References before Taylor, 1967a refer to both <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ponera</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Hypoponera</i>.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Mayr, 1855: 386
(diagnosis); Smith, F. 1858b: 83 (diagnosis); Mayr, 1862: 721 (diagnosis);

species key); Bondroit, 1918: 81 (France &amp; Belgium species key); Gallardo,
1918b: 73 (Argentina species key); Mann, 1921: 419 (Fiji species key); Wheeler,
W.M. 1922a: 780, 1009 (Afrotropical, Malagasy catalogues); Menozzi, 1931b: 266
(Costa Rica species key); Wheeler, W.M. 1933g: 13 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Pseudocryptopone</i> species key); Smith, M.R. 1936: 420 (North America
species key); Stitz, 1939: 58 (Germany species key); Creighton, 1950a: 47
(North America species key); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 68, 73, 74 (Asia <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponera, Pseudocryptopone, Selenopone</i>

Taylor, 1964: 139 (*fossil species, review); Taylor, 1967a: 18 (diagnosis, all

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Archiponera</i> in Ponerinae,
*Archiponerini: Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Archiponera</i> in Ponerinae,

164; Bolton, 1995b: 75; Bolton, 2003: 172.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PONERITES</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Ponerites</i></b> Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2002: 423. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponerites eocenicus</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponerites</i> Dlussky, 1981b:
67 [collective group name].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Ponerites</i> in Ponerinae:
Ponerini: Dlussky, 1981b: 67; Bolton, 1995b: 363; Dlussky &amp; Rasnitsyn,
2002: 423.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i

<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

1911f: 171.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>AFROPONE</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Afropone oculata</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Afropone</i> in Ponerinae:
Dlussky, Brothers &amp; Rasnitsyn, 2004: 5.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Afropone</span></i>
references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>EOGORGITES</span></i>
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Eogorgites</i></b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>Hong,
2002: 525. Type-species: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Eogorgites
cingulatus</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

Hong, 2002: 525. [BB note: possibly Cerapachyinae.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Paraponerii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1901a: 36. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paraponera</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paraponerinae as poneromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003:
47, 178.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paraponerinae as poneroid subfamily of Formicidae: Ouellette, Fisher,
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 365; Brady, Schultz, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau, Bell <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Ward, 2007a: 555.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Paraponerini.</span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1901a: 36. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paraponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 10; Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Paraponerini as tribe of Ponerinae: Emery, 1901a: 36 [Paraponerii];

lang=EN-GB>Paraponerini as tribe of Paraponerinae: Bolton, 2003: 48; 178.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Paraponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Proceratii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895j: 765. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proceratium</i>.
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proceratiinae as poneromorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003:
48, 178.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proceratiinae as poneroid subfamily of Formicidae: Ouellette,
Fisher, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 365; Brady,
Schultz, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173; Moreau,
Bell <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102; Ward, 2007a:
555.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Tribes of Proceratiinae: Probolomyrmecini, Proceratiini.</span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily references<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Bolton, 2003:
48, 178 (diagnosis, synopsis); Ouellette, Fisher <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:

normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 18173 (phylogeny); Moreau, Bell <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 2006: 102 (phylogeny); Ward, 2007a: 555 (classification);
Fernández &amp; Arias-Penna, 2008: 31 (Neotropical genera key); Yoshimura &amp;

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>PROCERATIINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Proceratii</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1895j: 765. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proceratium</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proceratiini as tribe of Dorylinae: Emery, 1895j: 765 [Proceratii].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proceratiini as junior synonym of Ectatommini: Brown, 1958g: 176;
Taylor, 1980c: 354; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 78; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson,
1990: 10; Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proceratiini as tribe of Ponerinae: Emery, 1901a: 36 [Proceratii];
Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 136 [Proceratii]; Ashmead, 1905b: 382; Emery, 1911d: 49;
Wheeler, W.M. 1915h: 27; Arnold, 1915: 33; Forel, 1917: 236; Wheeler, W.M.
1922a: 638; Kusnezov, 1964: 51; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 49;
Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256; Jaffe, 1993: 8; Lattke, 1994: 112;
Bolton, 1995b: 15. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Proceratiini as tribe of Proceratiinae: Bolton, 2003: 49, 178.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <span
style='color:red'>PROCERATIINI<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Discothyrinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Clark, 1951: 15 (in key). Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Discothyrea</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Discothyrinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Clark, 1951: 15.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Discothyrinae as junior synonym of Ectatommini: Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Discothyrinae as junior synonym of Proceratiini: Lattke, 1994: 112
(synonymy implied (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Discothyrea</i>
included in Proceratiini) but not stated); Bolton, 1995b: 10; Bolton, 2003:
178.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera (extant) of
Proceratiini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Discothyrea,
Proceratium</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus (extinct) of
Proceratiini</span></b><span lang=EN-GB>: *<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bradoponera</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>Proceratiini</span> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 135 (diagnosis); Emery, 1911d: 49 (diagnosis, genera key); Arnold, 1915:

catalogue); Leston, 1971: 119 (Ghana); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b:
49 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Kugler, C. 1991: 158 (sting structure);
Lattke, 1994: 112 (phylogeny); Bolton, 1995b: 15 (catalogue); Bolton, 2003: 49,
178 (diagnosis, synopsis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i

lang=EN-GB> as genus: Emery, 1895c: 262; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 136; Forel, 1917:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Sysphingta</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proceratium</i>:
Mayr, 1886d: 437; Dalla Torre, 1893: 18; Brown, in Borgmeier, 1957: 118; Brown,
1958g: 241; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>[<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:purple'>Sysphincta</span></i>
Mayr, 1865: 12 (and most subsequent authors), incorrect subsequent spelling.]</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Proceratium</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Roger, 1863b:
16, 21 (catalogue); Mayr, 1863: 451, 455 (catalogue); Mayr, 1865: 12 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sysphingta, Proceratium </i>diagnoses);
Cresson, 1887: 258 (U.S.A. catalogue); Dalla Torre, 1893: 18 (catalogue);
Emery, 1911d: 50 (diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 50 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Sysphingta</i> diagnosis, catalogue); Arnold, 1915: 34 (<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Sysphingta</i> diagnosis); Emery, 1916b: 103
(Italy species key); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 761 (Afrotropical catalogue);
Kratochvíl, Novák &amp; Snoflák, 1944: 58, 88 (West Palaearctic species key);
Creighton, 1950a: 39, 41 (North America <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proceratium,
Sysphingta</i> species keys); Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 77 (Asia <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Proceratium, Sysphingta</i> checklists);
Brown, 1958g: 241 (review of genus); Bernard, 1967: 81 (diagnosis); Snelling,
1967: 8 (New World species key); Kempf, 1972a: 211 (Neotropical catalogue);
Brown, 1974a: 81 (species notes); Baroni Urbani, 1977d: 91 (European species,
synopsis); Smith, D.R. 1979: 1338 (North America catalogue); Brown, 1980b: 342
(New World species key); Terron, 1981: 102 (Afrotropical species notes); Taylor
&amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 39 (Australia catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 65 (Australia
checklist); Agosti &amp; Collingwood, 1987b: 264 (Balkans species key); Ward,
1988: 116 (New World species key); Morisita, Kubota, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>et al</i>. 1989: 14 (Japan species key); Brandão, 1991: 373
(Neotropical catalogue); Lattke, 1994: 113 (phylogeny); Bolton, 1995a: 1052
(census); Bolton, 1995b: 366 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 203 (Australia
synopsis); Xu, 2000c: 434 (China species key); Onoyama &amp; Yoshimura, 2002:
31 (Japan species key); Bolton, 2003: 179 (synopsis); Baroni Urbani &amp; De
Andrade, 2003b: 40 (diagnosis, all species revision, keys; Palaearctic species
key: 445; Indomalayan species key: 447; Oceanean species key: 449; Afrotropical
species key: 451; Nearctic and Neotropical species key: 452; world species key:
456); Xu, 2006: 153 (China species key); Sosa-Calvo &amp; Longino, 2008: 228
(Neotropical species key); Yoshimura &amp; Fisher, 2009: 13 (Malagasy males
diagnosis); Terayama, 2009: 97 (Taiwan species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>PROBOLOMYRMECINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmicinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Perrault, 2000: 271. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Probolomyrmex</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmecinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Perrault, 2000: 271
[Probolomyrmicinae]. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmecini as tribe of Proceratiinae: Bolton, 2003: 49, 180.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe and genus <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>Probolomyrmex</span></i>
references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1911d: 52
(diagnosis, catalogue); Emery, 1911d: 53 (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Escherichia</i>
diagnosis, catalogue); Arnold, 1915: 33 (diagnosis); Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 761,
762 (Afrotropical <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Probolomyrmex,
Escherichia </i>catalogues); Taylor, 1965d: 352 (diagnosis, all species
revision, key); Kempf, 1972a: 210 (Neotropical catalogue); Brown, 1975: 7
(diagnosis, review of genus); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 39 (Australia
catalogue); Taylor, 1987a: 64 (Australia checklist); Morisita, Kubota, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1989: 13 (Japan species key);
Bolton, 1995a: 1052 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 366 (catalogue); Agosti, 1995: 432
(Neotropical species key); O'Keefe &amp; Agosti, 1998: 190 (Neotropical species
key); Shattuck, 1999: 202 (Australia synopsis); Perrault, 2000: 253 (anatomy);
Xu &amp; Zeng, 2000: 214 (China species key); Bolton, 2003: 49, 180 (diagnosis,
synopsis); Bolton, 2003: 49, 180 (diagnosis, synopsis); Eguchi, Yoshimura &amp;
Yamane, 2006: 4 (Oriental species revision, key); Sosa-Calvo &amp; Longino,
2008: 233 (Neotropical species key); Yoshimura &amp; Fisher, 2009: 12 (Malagasy
males diagnosis).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>See also</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> general references under <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='color:red'>PONERINAE</span></b>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of <span
style='color:red'>Probolomyrmecini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PROBOLOMYRMEX</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Mayr, 1901b: 2.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Probolomyrmex filiformis</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Dorylini: Ashmead, 1905b: 381; Ashmead, 1906: 27.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Cerapachyini: Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 137.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Proceratiini: Emery, 1911d: 52; Arnold, 1915: 33;
Forel, 1917: 236; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 645; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 686; Chapman
&amp; Capco, 1951: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Platythyreini: Brown, 1952k: 1; Brown, 1975: 7;
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 10; Jaffe,
1993: 7; Bolton, 1994: 164.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Probolomyrmecinae: Perrault, 2000: 271.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Probolomyrmex</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Proceratiinae, Probolomyrmecini: Bolton, 2003: 49, 180.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>PROBOLOMYRMEX<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Escherichia</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Forel, 1910c: 245.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Escherichia brevirostris</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Escherichia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Proceratiini: Emery, 1911d: 53; Forel, 1917: 236;
Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 645; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 644.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Escherichia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Ponerinae, Platythyreini: Brown, 1952k: 1.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Escherichia</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Probolomyrmex</i>:
Taylor, 1965d: 346; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>Probolomyrmex</span></i> references</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in <span
style='color:red'>poneroid subfamilies</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>CRETOPONE</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Cretopone</i></b> Dlussky, 1975: 119. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone magna</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

Dlussky, 1975: 119.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone incertae sedis</i>
in *Sphecomyrminae: Wilson, 1987: 49.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone</i> in *Armaniidae:
Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 77.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone incertae sedis</i>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone incertae sedis</i>
in poneromorph subfamilies: Bolton, 2003: 49, 180.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone</i> as junior

&amp; Wilson, 1990: 9.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Cretopone</i> as genus:

Bolton, 1994: 187; Bolton, 1995b: 166; Grimaldi, Agosti &amp; Carpenter, 1997:

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

normal'>Petropone</i></b> Dlussky, 1975: 119. Type-species: *<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petropone petiolata</i>, by original
designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

in *Sphecomyrminae: Wilson, 1987: 49.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span

lang=EN-GB>*<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Petropone</i> as junior

   <w:HangulWidthLikeWW11/>
  </w:Compatibility>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>THE LEPTANILLOMORPHS: SUBFAMILY LEPTANILLINAE<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>SUBFAMILY <span style='color:red'>LEPTANILLINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>LEPTANILLINAE</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanillini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1910b: 32. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptanilla</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptanillinae as family: Bernard, 1951: 1053 [Leptanillidae].</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptanillinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Wheeler, W.M. 1923f: 335;
Wheeler, G.C. 1928: 89 (in text); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, E.W. 1930: 199;
Clark, 1951: 16; Brown, 1954e: 28; Petersen, 1968: 577; Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, J. 1972a: 37; Brown, 1973b: 166; all subsequent authors. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanillinae as
leptanillomorph subfamily of Formicidae: Bolton, 2003: 39, 151.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanillinae as
subfamily <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>incertae sedis</i> in
Formicidae: Ward, 2007a: 555.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribes of Leptanillinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: Anomalomyrmini, Leptanillini.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily and tribes references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Emery, 1904a:
107 (anatomy, affinities); Wheeler, W.M. 1910g: 138 (diagnosis); Wheeler, G.C.
1928: 85 (larva); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, E.W. 1930: 199 (diagnosis);
Morley, 1939: 114 (phylogeny); Kutter, 1948: 293 (diagnosis); Brown, 1954e: 28
(phylogeny); Bernard, 1967: 90 (diagnosis); Petersen, 1968: 577 (tribe, males);
Gotwald, 1969: 97 (mouthparts morphology); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J.
1972a: 37 (diagnosis); Brown, 1973b: 166 (genera, distribution); Wheeler, G.C.
&amp; Wheeler, J. 1976b: 46 (larvae, review &amp; synthesis); Baroni Urbani,
1977c: 430 (diagnosis, revision); Snelling, 1981: 392 (synoptic
classification); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 257 (synoptic
classification); Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79 (synoptic classification);
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 9 onward (synoptic classification, genera keys);
Bolton, 1990b: 269 (diagnosis, revision of tribes, synoptic classification,
key); Kugler, C. 1992: 103 (sting structure); Baroni Urbani, Bolton &amp; Ward,
1992: 316, 317 (phylogeny); Bolton, 1994: 69 (diagnosis, synoptic
classification, genera key); Bolton, 1995a: 1040 (census); Bolton, 1995b: 9, 12
(catalogue); Ogata, Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 32 (genera, classification);
Shattuck, 1999: 117 (Australia, synopsis); Bolton, 2003: 39, 151 (diagnosis,
synopsis); Ouellette, Fisher <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>.
2006: 359 (phylogeny) ; Terayama, 2009: 125 (Taiwan genera key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>ANOMALOMYRMINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anomalomyrmini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Taylor, in Bolton, 1990b: 278. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Anomalomyrma</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anomalomyrmini as tribe of Leptanillinae: Bolton, 1990b: 273;
Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Kugler, C. 1992: 107; Bolton, 1994: 70;
Bolton, 2003: 39, 151. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Anomalomyrmini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anomalomyrma, Protanilla</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe references</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Anomalomyrmini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>ANOMALOMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Anomalomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Taylor, in Bolton,
1990b: 278. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Anomalomyrma
taylori</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Anomalomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae, Anomalomyrmini: Bolton, 1990b: 278; Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 2003: 151. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Anomalomyrma</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bolton, 1995b: 66 (catalogue).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PROTANILLA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Protanilla</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Taylor, in Bolton, 1990b:
279. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Protanilla rafflesi</i>,
by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Protanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae: Anomalomyrmini: Bolton, 1990b: 279; Hölldobler
&amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Kugler, C. 1992: 107; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 2003:
152.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Protanilla</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Bolton, 1995b:
369 (catalogue); Xu &amp; Zhang, 2002: 140 (China species key); Xu, 2002a: 118
(China species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe <span
style='color:red'>LEPTANILLINI</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanillini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1910b: 32. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptanilla</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptanillini as tribe of Dorylinae: Emery, 1910b: 32; Wheeler, W.M.
1910g: 138 [Leptanillii]; Arnold, 1915: 113; Emery, 1916b: 94; Forel, 1917:
240; Bondroit, 1918: 16; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 633.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptanillini as tribe of Leptanillinae: Wheeler, W.M. 1923f: 335;
Chapman &amp; Capco, 1951: 17; Bolton, 1990b: 276; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton,
2003: 40, 152. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of Leptanillini</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptanilla, Phaulomyrma,
Yavnella</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Tribe references</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: see above.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genera of <span
style='color:red'>Leptanillini</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTANILLA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Emery, 1870: 196.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptanilla revelierii</i>,
by monotypy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae: Emery, 1870: 196 [Dorylidae]; Emery, 1904a: 116. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae: Emery, 1877a: 81 [Myrmicidae]; Emery &amp; Forel,
1879a: 456 [Myrmicidae]; André, 1882c: 268 [Myrmicidae]; Dalla Torre, 1893: 72.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Myrmicini: Emery, 1895j: 769.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Myrmicinae, Stenammini: Ashmead, 1905b: 383.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Dorylinae, Leptanillini: Emery, 1910b: 32; Wheeler, W.M. 1910g:
138; Forel, 1917: 240; Wheeler, W.M. 1922a: 636.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptanilla</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae, Leptanillini: Wheeler, W.M. 1923f: 335; Wheeler,
G.C. 1928: 89; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 656; Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 433; Wheeler,
G.C. &amp; Wheeler, J. 1985: 256; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; Bolton,
1990b: 276; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 2003:
152.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Junior synonym of <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:red'>LEPTANILLA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Leptomesites</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kutter, 1948: 286.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptomesites escheri</i>,
by original designation. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptomesites</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae: Kutter, 1948: 286; Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler,
J. 1985: 257.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Leptomesites</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> as junior synonym of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Leptanilla</i>:
Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 433; all subsequent authors.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Leptanilla</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>André, 1882c:
268 (Europe &amp; Algeria species); Dalla Torre, 1893: 72 (catalogue); Emery,
1904a: 107 (anatomy, affinities); Emery, 1910b: 32 (diagnosis, catalogue);
Emery, 1916b: 94 (Italy species); Bondroit, 1918 (France &amp; Belgium species
key); Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, E.W. 1930: 200 (catalogue); Chapman &amp;
Capco, 1951: 17 (Asia checklist); Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 434 (diagnosis, all species
revision, key); Taylor &amp; Brown, D.R. 1985: 53 (Australia catalogue);
Taylor, 1987a: 34 (Australia checklist); Morisita, Kubota, Onoyama, <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>et al</i>. 1989: 35 (Japan species key);
Ogata, Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 32 (diagnosis, males); Bolton, 1995a: 1050
(census); Bolton, 1995b: 229 (catalogue); Shattuck, 1999: 117 (Australia
synopsis); Xu &amp; Zhang, 2002: 142 and Xu, 2002a: 116 (China species key).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>PHAULOMYRMA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Phaulomyrma</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Wheeler, G.C. &amp;
Wheeler, E.W. 1930: 193. Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Phaulomyrma
javana</i>, by original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Phaulomyrma</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae, Leptanillini: Wheeler, G.C. &amp; Wheeler, E.W.
1930: 201; Donisthorpe, 1943f: 683; Dlussky &amp; Fedoseeva, 1988: 79; Bolton,
1990b: 277; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 2003:
152.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Phaulomyrma</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB>Petersen, 1968:
593 (review of genus); Baroni Urbani, 1977c: 480 (review of genus); Ogata,
Bolton, 1995b: 316 (catalogue); Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995: 32 (review of
genus).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>YAVNELLA</span></i> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Yavnella</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Kugler, J. 1987: 52.
Type-species: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Yavnella argamani</i>, by
original designation.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Yavnella</span></i><span
lang=EN-GB> in Leptanillinae, Leptanillini: Kugler, J. 1987: 52; Bolton, 1990b:
277; Hölldobler &amp; Wilson, 1990: 12; Bolton, 1994: 70; Bolton, 2003: 152.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='color:red'>Yavnella</span></i> references <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Bolton, 1995b: 424 (catalogue); Ogata, Terayama &amp; Masuko, 1995:
32 (review of genus).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB style='color:black'>SUBFAMILY</span><span lang=EN-GB> <span
style='color:red'>MARTIALINAE</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Subfamily <span
style='color:red'>MARTIALINAE<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Martialinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB> Rabeling &amp; Verhaagh, in Rabeling, Brown &amp; Verhaagh, 2008:
14913. Type-genus: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Martialis</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Taxonomic history<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><span
lang=EN-GB>Martialinae as subfamily of Formicidae: Rabeling &amp; Verhaagh, in
Rabeling, Brown &amp; Verhaagh, 2008: 14913.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of Martialinae</span></b><span
lang=EN-GB>: <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Martialis</i>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus of <span
style='color:red'>Martialinae</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN-GB>Genus <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='color:red'>MARTIALIS</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
lang=EN-GB>Martialis</span></i></b><span lang=EN-GB> Rabeling &amp; Verhaagh,
in Rabeling, Brown &amp; Verhaagh, 2008: 14914. Type-species: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Martialis heureka</i>, by original
designation.</span></p>
